K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30a-1: bi na ya bi bhang ga /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30a-5: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30a-6: dul ba'i rgyal po rje yi rigs su 'khrungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30a-7: slob ma 'dul mdzad nyes pa rab thul pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30a-8: sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i gtso la phyag 'tshal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30a-9: 'dul ba'i bsngags ba cung zad brjod par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-0: pha rol ma @30b mthong gting rtogs ma gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-1: glags pa'i mun gnag slob dpon tshogs rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-2: dbye bas tha dad 'dul ba rgya mtsho la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-3: yon tan kun bstod rtsol blo bdag la med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-4: ji ltar 'di na shing rtsa gtso bo ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-5: rnam par 'phel dang kun 'dzin gnyis kyi gzhi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-6: de bzhin dam chos tshogs rnams kun gyi yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-7: rgyu dang rtsa ba 'dul ba yin par gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-8: ji ltar sa ni skye rgu rnams kyi gzhi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-9: de las 'bru rnams skye bar 'gyur ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-10: de bzhin 'dul ba'ang sdom brtson rnams kyi gzhi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-11: de bzhin de las bsod nams rnams kyang skye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-12: tshul khrims yon tan rnams kyi gnas su dgongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-13: de yi gnas ni 'dul ba yin par gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-14: 'di la gnas par gyur na mthar phyin 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-15: 'di la mi gnas mthar phyin ga las 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-16: ji ltar chu lon mi phyed sra ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-17: chu klung che yang zlog par 'gyur ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-18: de bzhin 'dul ba 'phags pa chu lon 'dis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-19: tshul khrims 'chal ba'i chu klung zlog par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-20: sangs rgyas rnams dang rang rgyal rnams kyis kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-21: byang chub gang brnyes thub slob rnam dag pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-22: sems can dgra bcom yon tan ldan pa rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-23: de la'ang rgyu ni 'dul ba yin par gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-24: ji srid 'gro 'dir rgyal ba thams cad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-25: mdzod mchog 'dul ba rdzogs pa 'di gnas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-26: de srid chos sgron 'di ni gnas 'gyur zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-27: bzlog par gyur na zhi ba thob par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:30b-28: sangs rgyas mi bzhugs 'jig rten tshigs bcad dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-1: lag de dang de dag spyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-2: bslab 'jug med na 'dul ba'ang med 'gyur bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-3: de phyir rgyal ba dag pas chos 'di dkon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-4: 'jog bral sems glang lcags kyo 'di yin te; ;gdul bya ma dul ba yi srab 'di yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-5: ra ba'i mtshams kyi 'obs dang 'dra ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-6: zag ba kun gyi chu lon 'dul ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-7: rgyal ba ston pa de yi bstan bcos gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-8: mdo dang chos mngon yin gsungs 'dul ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-9: ston dang bstan bcos dngos yin de yi phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-10: gnyis 'gyur phyag bya sangs rgyas chos gcig bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-11: gang la brten te gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-12: de la gus bcas rje sar bcas gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-13: de ni mgon pas mgon yin skyabs gnas yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-14: de'i phyir rab bsgrims 'dul la phyag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-15: gang zhig ston pa thugs rje'i bstan pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-16: yang bar sems shing cung zad 'da' byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-17: de ni de las sdug bsngal gzhan dbang 'thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-18: smyigs tshal bregs pas aa mra'i tshal nyams bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-19: 'di na la las rgyal po'i tshig chen yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-21: thub pa'i bka' lung tshul min bzla byas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-23: so sor thar bya gang yin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-24: sangs rgyas 'dul ba gangs chen mtsho //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-25: gting mtha' med pa thams cad kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-26: gnas pa'i snying dang snying po yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-27: 'di ni dam chos rgyal po yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31a-28: chos rnams kun gyi 'dren pa mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-0: 'di ni dge @31b slong tshong tshogs kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-1: bslab zong tshong khang chen po yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-2: tshul khrims 'chal bas zin rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-3: gdug pa rnams sel sman 'di yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-5: rkang gnyis gzhon nu'i lcags kyo yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-6: mtsho bas zab pa'i 'khor ba las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-7: sgrol ba'i rgal thabs 'di yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-9: nges pa'i chu lon zam pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-10: 'di ni nyon mongs pham byed lam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-11: rgyal po yi ni 'dren pa mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-13: them skas gzhi dang 'dra bar gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-14: nga ni mya ngan 'das gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-15: 'di ni khyed kyi ston pa'o zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-16: rang byung nyid kyis gus bcas par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-17: nan tan dge slong tshogs mdun bstod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-19: rnam 'byed yin par dgongs pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-20: thar 'dong rnams kyis gus byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-21: 'di ni nan tan mnyan par bya; ;'dul ba la bstod pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-22: bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-24: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnyed dka' ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-25: bsgrub pa'ang shin tu rnyed par dka'; ;sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-26: chos bstan pa yang bde ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-27: dge 'dun mthun pa bde ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-28: mthun pa rnams kyi dka' thub bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-29: 'phags pa rnams ni mthong ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-30: dam pa dag dang 'grogs pa bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-31: byis pa rnams ni ma mthong na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-32: rtag tu bde ba nyid du 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-33: tshul khrims ldan pa mthong ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:31b-34: mang du thos pa mthong ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-2: dgra bcom pa dag mthong ba bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-3: 'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-4: chos la goms pa'i skye bo bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-5: shes rab thob par gyur pa bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-6: nga 'o nga rgyal zad pa bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-7: nges par byas shing dbang po thul ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-8: dgon pa zhi ba rnams su rgas gyur dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-9: mang du thos pa nags kyi nang dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-10: lang tsho yol ba rnams kyis gnas pa bde //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-11: sh'akya seng ge de la ni; ;sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-12: 'dul ba rab tu gdon par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-13: gdul ba'i don du nga la nyon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-14: thos nas drang srong chen po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-15: ji skad gsungs bzhin bsgrub bya zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-16: kha na ma tho phra rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-17: brtun cing byed pa nyid du gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-19: sems rta kha blan dka' ba la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-20: mthun pa gzer rnon brgya ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-22: che ba gang dag ngag tsam gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-23: ldog cing mtshams las mi 'da' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-24: de dag mi rta bzang po ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-25: nyon mongs g-yul las nges rgyal 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-26: su la srab 'di med pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-27: nam du'ang 'dod par mi 'gyur la; ;de dag nyon mongs g-yul gyis dkrugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun lo bcu gnyis su skyon med cing chu bur med la bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams kyi so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa yang mdor bsdus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-30: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32a-31: dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-0: rang gi sems ni yongs su @32b gdul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-1: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-2: lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-3: ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-4: yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-5: thams cad du ni sdom pa legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-6: kun tu bsdams pa'i dge slong ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-7: sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-8: ngag rnams bsrung zhing yid kyis rab bsdams te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-9: lus kyi mi dge ba dag mi byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-10: las lam gsum po 'di dag rab sbyangs na; ;drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni thob par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-12: lo bcu gsum la bab pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed dag na ka lan da ka'i grong na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-13: de'i tshe na ka lan da ka'i grong na ka lan da ka'i bu bzang byin zhes bya ba phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-14: nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-15: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-17: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-18: de dus gzhan zhig na sangs rgyas la mngon par dad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-19: chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-20: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-21: chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-22: des srog gcod pa spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-23: srog gcod pa las phyir log /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-24: ma byin par len pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-25: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:32b-28: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-1: bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-2: de dad pa snga ma de nyid rjes su spel zhing skra dang kha spu bregs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-3: gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas; yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-4: de de ltar rab tu byung nas 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-5: sngon khyim pa bzhin du nye du rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-6: de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-7: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-8: sngon khyim pa bzhin du nye du rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa ni bdag gis ma rnyed de rnyed pa ma yin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-9: nyes pa rnyed de legs par rnyed pa ma yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-10: bdag nye du rnams dang 'bral ba'i phyir lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-13: de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin nye du rnams dang 'bral ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-17: de'i tshe na mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-18: bya bar sems pa dka' na slong mo pa dag lta la smos kyang ci dgos pa byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33a-19: de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-0: da ltar mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu la @33b zas sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-1: bya bar sems pa dka' na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-2: slong mo pa dag lta la smos kyang ci dgos pa byung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-3: bdag la nye du longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dag yod pas bdag ka lan da ka'i grong du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-4: nye du rnams kyi gan du song la dge 'dun la zas dag sbyor du gzhug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-5: dge 'dun la skyo ma dag dang thug pa'i btung ba dag dang rtag res 'khor dag dang mgron du bos pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-6: brgyad ston dang bcu bzhi ston dang nya ston dang spyan gzigs phran tshegs sbyor du gzhug go snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-7: de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin ljongs su ji dgar 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-8: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ka lan da ka'i grong ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ba na mthar gyis rgyu ba'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-9: ka lan da ka'i grong du phyin nas ka lan da ka'i grong na dgon pa'i spyil bu na gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-10: de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin nye du rnams kyi gan du song ste phyin nas de dag gi mdun du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-11: dge 'dun la zas dag sbyor du 'jug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-12: dge 'dun la skyo ma dag dang thug pa'i btung ba dag dang rtag ras 'khor dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-13: mgron du bos pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-14: brgyad ston dang bcu bzhi ston dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-15: nya ston dang spyan gzigs phran tshegs sbyor du 'dzud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:33b-16: de'i che na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin dgon pa pa chos gos gsum pa phyag dar khrod pa bsod snyoms pa mthar chags kyis rgyu bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:34a-0: de dus gzhan zhig na dang po kho nar dge slong gi dge 'dun thug pa bsod pas @34a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:34a-1: tshim par byas nas snga dro sham thabs bgos te lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:34a-2: ka lan da ka'i grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na mthar gyis ka lan da ka'i grong du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba'i tshe rang gi khyim du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:34a-3: de rang gi khyim nas sbyin pa ma thob phyir gtong ba ma thob par myur ba myur bar phyir song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:34a-4: de'i tshe na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma bya ba 'ga' zhig la phyi rol tu song bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:34a-5: bran mo rnying pa rgan mo zhig gis ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin rang gi khyim nas sbyin pa ma thob phyir gtong ba ma thob par myur ba myur bar phyir song ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:34a-6: mthong nas kyang ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:34a-7: ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi ma la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:34a-8: jo mo mkhyen par mdzod cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-0: rkang pa dag kho nas ka @36a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-3: ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi mas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-4: mthong nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-5: ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-6: bu bzang byin gal te khyod mi 'dod pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-9: dge sbyong gi tshul don du mi gnyer ba ma yin pa'am /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-11: mus byung ba ma yin pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-12: the tshom za ba ma yin pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-14: khyod dge sbyong gi tshul yongs su gtong 'dod pa ma yin pa lta na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36a-17: de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyis sngar bslab pa'i gzhi ma bcas shing nyes pa ma mthong la bud med kyi yul gzhon nu kha dog bzang ba chags par gyur pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-0: 'dod chags kyis sems zil gyis non cing de @36b 'dod chags kyis sems zil gyis non pas yongs su gdung ba'i lus dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-1: yongs su gdung ba'i sems dang ldan zhing de yongs su gdung bzhin pa'i lus dang yongs su gdung bzhin pa'i sems kyis ma la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-2: yum bdag gis de ltar bgyir rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-4: sa bon gyi chos la brten nas shin tu rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-5: de nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyis ma las mnyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-6: sngon gyi chung ma'i lag pa gnyis nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-7: phyogs gcig tu song nas chos gos dag bzhag ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-10: srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-11: skye ba don du mi gnyer ba lus tha ma 'dzin pa zhig kyang lha'i ris bzang po zhig nas shi 'phos te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:36b-19: gal te khye'u yin na dku g-yas par rten cing 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-0: gal te bu mo yin na dku g-yon par @37a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-2: de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas sgyug mo la smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-5: de yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-6: kho mo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa tsha bo'i ngo mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-7: kho mo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-8: kho mo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-9: gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-11: kho mo'i rigs brgyud yun ring du gnas par 'gyur pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-13: mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-15: de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-17: steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs par grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37a-18: dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-5: des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'jud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-6: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa gsal ba gser gyi mdog 'dra ba mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba smin ma 'dzar ba sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-7: de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-8: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-9: de dag 'di snyam du sems te gang gi phyir khye'u 'di sa bon gyi chos la brten te rnyed pa de'i phyir khye'u yi ming sa bon pa zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming sa bon pa zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-10: khye'u sa bon pa ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-12: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-13: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-14: de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-15: mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi nying khu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-16: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:37b-17: rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-0: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang grangs dang rtsis dang lag rtsis @38a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-3: gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-4: de yi ge'i mthar phyin cing 'byed pa dang klog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-5: mkhas pa dang spyod pa gsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-6: brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-7: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-11: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-14: skyes pa brtag pa la mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-15: de dus gzhan zhig na sangs rgyas la mngon par dad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-16: chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-17: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-18: chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-19: des srog gcod pa spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-20: srog gcod pa las phyir log /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-21: ma byin par len pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-22: 'dod pa la log par g-yem pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-23: brdzun du smra ba dang 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-24: 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-25: de pha las byung ba'i dad pa snga ma de nyid rjes su spel zhing legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-26: de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig bu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtang bar gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38a-27: gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa brtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-0: rigs @38b kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-1: tshangs par spyad pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-3: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-5: khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-6: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-7: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-8: tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-9: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-10: srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-11: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dbang po dang nye dbang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-13: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sa bon pas dgra bcom pa thob cing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba so sor yang dag par rig pa na de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-15: chos rnams las ni skal ba thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-16: yab ni dkor gyis bdag mi gtong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-17: bdag gis ha cang phyin nas shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-18: bdag ni chu ngus shin tu 'das //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:38b-19: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na bzhugs shing nyan thos rnams la 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-1: par grol ba'i chos ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-2: zhe sdang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang gti mug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-3: shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-4: de'i tshe ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin 'khor de nyid du 'dug cing mthun par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-5: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-6: shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-7: zhe sdang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-8: gti mug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam bar grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-9: shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston pa de lta de ltar ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin cung zad 'gyod par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-11: rab tu 'gyod par gyur cing 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-13: 'gyod pa thob cing cang mi smra bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-17: sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39a-18: de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas nyul zhing rgyu ba na ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyi gnas ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-0: mtha' gcig tu 'khod @39b nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis ka lan da ka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-1: tshe dang ldan pa bzang phyin khyod sngon chad dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag mthong na bshes pa dang bcas pa nyid kyi tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-8: mchil lham dag len par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-9: khyod da ltar dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag mthong na cung zad 'gyod par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-11: rab tu 'gyod par gyur cing 'dug la 'gyod pa dang ldan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-12: 'gyod pa thob cing mi smra bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-17: sems khong du chud cing 'dug na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-19: sems kyi yongs su gdung ba 'ga' zhig med grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-20: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag la da ltar lus kyi gnod pa ni 'ga' yang med mod kyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:39b-26: phyir bzlog par yang ma byas par stan dag las langs nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:40a-11: ngas 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi legs par bcas par 'gyur ba'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:40a-17: don dang ldan pa rmed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:40a-18: don dang mi ldan par mi rmed pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:40b-0: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa @40b yin pas /
