K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-2: dran pa nye bar ma bzhag par bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-3: des grong ngam grong rdal de nyid du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-4: phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-5: lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gnas su zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-6: de'i sems gang gi tshe 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-7: des rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar byas te rang gi bshang ba'i lam du bcug nas rtsol bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-8: de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rab tu mang po gnas nyul zhing rgyu ba dag dge slong de'i gnas ga la ba der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-9: dge slong de dag gis dge slong de de ltar byed pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-10: mthong nas kyang yid mi dga' zhing mngon par ma mgu nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-11: dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-12: tshe dang ldan pa ci byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-13: reg pa bdag gir byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-14: tshe dang ldan pa 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos ma bkag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-15: tshe dang ldan pa dag bkag ste de ni gzhan gyi la yin gyi rang gi la ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-16: dge slong de dag de la mngon par bstod par yang mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-17: phyir zlog par yang mi byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-18: mngon par bstod par yang ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-19: phyir bzlog par yang ma byas par dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-20: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:52b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-2: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis skabs de rgyas par gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-4: dge slong dag ngas re zhig gzhan gyi la yang bkag na rang gi la lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-5: mi gti mug can de ni pham par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-6: dge slong gi sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-8: sten pa la bab par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-9: de sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-11: sten pa la bab pas rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-12: rang gi'am gzhan gyi bshang ba'i lam du bcug nas rtsol bar byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-13: bcug ma thag tu pham par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-15: de'i tshe na 'phags rgyal na ded dpon dga' bo zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnams thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-16: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-17: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-19: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53a-20: rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-0: de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang chu lha dang lus ngan dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dag la @53b gsol ba 'debs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-1: lha'i bye brag gzhan 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-2: kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-6: gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-7: lhan cig skyes pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-9: rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-10: 'jig rten na gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dag dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-11: de ni de lta ma yin te gal te de ltar gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-12: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-13: 'di ltar gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-14: gsum po de dag gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-15: pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-16: ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-17: dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-18: gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-19: de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-20: sems can zhig kyang lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-21: de'i skye dgu'i bdag mo'i mngal du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-22: bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-24: skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-25: dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:53b-26: mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-0: gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de @54a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-2: khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-3: gal te khye'u yin na dku g-yas par rten cing 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-4: gal te bu mo yin na ni dku g-yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-5: de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-8: bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-9: 'di ltar bdag gi dku g-yas par rten cing mchis pas nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-11: de yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste lag pa g-yas pa brkyangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-12: 'di skad ces kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-13: kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-14: kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-15: gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-16: bgo skal la spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-17: kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-18: bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu'am mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-19: 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis yon bshad pa byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-20: de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-21: mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54a-22: dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-0: sman pas bcas pa'i @54b zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-1: ha cang mi skyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-2: ha cang lan tshva mi che ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-3: ha cang mi mngar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-4: ha cang mi tsha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-5: ha cang mi bska ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-11: bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-14: rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-17: shod kyi sa gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-18: des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'jud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-19: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-20: khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa gsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-22: mgo bo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-26: sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-27: de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-28: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-29: yul dbus na gang gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa de la mdzes pa zhes bya'o zhes kun tu spyod pas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-30: gang gi phyir khye'u 'di gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-31: de ded dpon dga' bo'i bu yin pa de'i phyir khye'u yi ming mdzes dga' zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming mdzes dga' zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:54b-32: khye'u mdzes dga' ma ma brgyad po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-2: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-3: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-4: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-5: de ma ma brgyad po de dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-7: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skye par byed do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-8: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-10: rtsis dang lag rtsis dang dbyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-11: gzhug pa dang gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-12: de yi ge'i mthar phyin cing 'byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-13: klog pa dang mkhas pa dang spyod pa gsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-14: brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-15: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-19: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-22: skyes pa brtag pa la mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-23: phas de'i chung ma'i 'khor gsum po rab dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-25: tha ma dag rnam par bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-26: 'dug pa'i gnas gsum po dgun gyi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-28: dbyar gyi dag byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-29: skyed mos tshal gsum po dgun gyi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-31: dbyar gyi dag byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55a-32: de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na skyes pa med par sil snyan gyi rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-0: ded dpon dga' bo rtag tu rtsis la chags shing 'du ba dang 'god pa dag kyang sbyong bar @55b byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-2: yab khyod ci'i slad du rtag tu rtsis la chags shing bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-4: bu ci steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-5: rtse ba nyid kyis nor bsgrub par byar nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-6: ngas khyim gyi bya ba los kyang bsam dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-7: mdzes dgas don gyis 'dis bdag la bskul to snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-8: des de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-9: yab gal te de ltar rjes su gnang na yul gzhan du mchis la nor bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-11: bu nor gyi rnam pa mang po yod na ci'i phyir yul gzhan du 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-14: yab ngan bu gor ma bkum par mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-15: ded dpon dga' bos 'di 'dod pa la bab par bya'o snyam du bsams nas des lde mig dang lde mig kyog po la sogs pa blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-16: dbyig dang gser byas pa dang ma byas pa de'i mdzod gang ba bdun phye ste bstan nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-17: bu mdzes dga' nor gyi rnam pa 'di snyed yod kyis khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la 'dod pa la yang longs spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-18: sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-19: bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-20: yul gzhan du 'gro mi dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-22: yab khyod ngan bu la ston par mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-23: ngan bus bu rnams la ci zhig bstan par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-24: ded dpon dga' bos de zer ba bzang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-25: bdag 'das nas 'dis khyim gyi bya ba sbyong bar 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:55b-26: de'i phyir ji srid bdag gson pa de srid du zong mnos shing yul gzhan du 'gro la rag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-0: yul gzhan du 'di la pha'i grogs dag kyang mngon du gyur pas de lta na bdag 'das nas 'di'i 'go ba'i phyogs mun pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du @56a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-1: shes shing rig nas chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-2: bzang mo kho bo 'das nas mdzes dgas khyim gyi bya ba sbyong bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir ji srid kho bo gson pa de srid du zong mnos shing yul gzhan du 'gro la rag ste yul gzhan du 'di la pha'i grogs dag kyang mngon du gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-3: de ltar na kho bo 'das nas 'di'i 'gro ba'i phyogs mun pa med par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-6: ma nongs te de bzhin mchi la rag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-7: de nas ded dpon dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-8: mdzes dga' bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-9: bu khyod kyis zong mnos te yul gzhan du 'gro'o snyam du sems bskyed pa ma nyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-10: kho bo 'das nas khyod kyis khyim gyi bya ba sbyong bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir ji srid kho bo gson pa de srid du zong mnos shing yul gzhan du 'gro la rag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-11: yul gzhan du khyod la pha'i grogs dag kyang mngon du gyur pas de lta na kho bo 'das nas khyod kyis 'gro ba'i phyogs mun pa med par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-14: de nas ded dpon dga' bos 'phags rgyal du dril bsgrag pa byed du bcug ste 'phags rgyal na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-15: phyogs gzhan tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i tshong pa rnams la shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-16: ded dpon mdzes dgas zong mnos shing yul gzhan du 'gro'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-17: khyed cag las ded dpon mdzes dga' dang lhan cig tu sho gam med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-19: gru btsas med par yul gzhan du 'gro bar spro ba gang yin pa des yul gzhan du 'gro ba dang mthun pa'i zong bsdogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56a-20: tshong pa lnga brgyas yul gzhan du 'gro ba dang mthun pa'i zong bsdogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-0: ded dpon dga' bos tshong @56b pa de dag mgron du bos te zan byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-1: shes ldan dag ji ltar mdzes dga' 'di kho bo'i bu yin pa de kho na bzhin du khyed cag gi yang yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-2: tshong pa yul gzhan du dong ba rnams kyi bar chad ni gsum yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-6: khyed cag gi 'di gnod pa las nges par bzlog par bya zhing phan pa la yang dag par sbyar bar bya'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-7: gal te gnod pa las nges par bzlog cing phan pa la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa na rab tu gnas par gyur na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-8: gal te rab tu mi gnas par gyur na khyed kyis zong rnam par spangs shing rin mnos te 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-9: mdzes dga' la yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-10: bu mdzes dga' ji ltar khyod kho bo'i bu yin pa de kho na bzhin du tshong pa 'di dag gi yang yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-11: khyod kyis 'di dag gi tshig dad pas mnyan cing bya bar soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-12: ded dpon mdzes dgas yab bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ded dpon dga' bo las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-13: dge mtshan dang bkra shis dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-20: bong bu dag gis zong mang po blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-21: tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig yul gzhan du 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-22: de mthar gyis grong dang grong rdal dang yul 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-23: rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas dag tu khad kyis rgyu ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:56b-24: mnyan yod du mdzod cig tu zong btsud de 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-0: de'i tshe na mnyan yod na gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mo zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba blta na @57a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-1: sdug pa mdzes pa skyes bu dga' ba zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-2: de kar sha pa na lnga brgyas skyes pa dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-3: des 'phags rgyal na ded dpon dga' bo zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i bu mdzes dga' zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa de tshong pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu 'dir phyin nas mdzod che ge mo zhig tu zong mkhos su phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-5: thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-6: gal te bdag gis de'i zong thams cad ma 'phrogs na bzang mo zhes bya ba'i ming mi bzung ngo snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-7: des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa; bu mo ded dpon mdzes dga' zhes bya ba 'byor ba rgya chen po dang ldan pas zong khyer te 'ongs nas mdzod che ge mo zhig tu btsud kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-8: dri dang phreng ba rgyu thogs te de'i drung du song la 'di skad ces jo mo bzang mo khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-9: rje'i sras kyis ci'i slad du rang gi pho brang spangs te mi phal ba bzhin du mdzod na bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-10: 'di ni khyod nyid kyi pho brang lags kyis tshur spyon cig ces kyang mchi'o zhes gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-11: jo mo bka' bzhin du 'tshal zhes bu mo mngag gzhug ma des gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mo las mnyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-12: dri dang phreng ba rgyu thogs nas ded dpon mdzes dga' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-13: ded dpon mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57a-14: jo mo bzang mo khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing dri dang phreng ba rgyu 'di yang bskur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-0: rje'i sras @57b kyis ci'i slad du rang gi pho brang spangs te mi phal ba bzhin du mdzod na bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-1: 'di ni khyod nyid kyi pho brang lags kyis tshur spyon cig ces kyang mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-4: kho bo dri dang phreng ba rgyu 'di btags te 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-5: de nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma de gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-6: des ded dpon mdzes dga' dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed byas par gyur pa de dag thams cad gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mo la bsnyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-7: de nas gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mos bu mo mngag gzhug ma las thos nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-9: byi dor byed du bcug nas me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing 'dug spos zhim pos bdugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-10: bla res bres pa dang bcas pa'i mal bshams nas gtso cher ded dpon mdzes dga' la sdod cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-11: ded dpon mdzes dga' yang dri dang phreng ba rgyu dang rgyan gyis klubs te bzhon pa la zhon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-12: khye'u mngag gzhug pas yongs su bskor cing lang tsho'i gzugs mchog tu sdug pas rnam par mdzes shing gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mo'i gnas ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-13: gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mo ded dpon mdzes dga' lang tsho'i gzugs mchog tu sdug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-14: rnam par mdzes pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-15: mthong nas kyang bran mo mngag gzhug ma la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-16: bu mo 'di ded dpon mdzes dga' yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:57b-18: jo mo ded dpon mdzes dga' ni 'di kho na lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-0: @58a *// de nas gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mo dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-1: tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-2: rigs skyes rigs min skyes pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-3: nor nyams nor kyis 'byor pa'ang rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-4: gzugs kyis phyug pa mthong bas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-5: bud med rnams kyi yid 'phrog byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-6: de bzhon pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa dag kho nas gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mo'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-7: des myur ba myur bar khang thog nas babs te de bsu nas yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-8: khyim gyi nang du khrid nas bud med kyi khri la bzhag ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-13: ae ma'o khyod kyi mtshan ni gzugs dang 'dra la gzugs kyang mtshan dang 'dra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-14: gal te yab yum dag gis khyod kyi mtshan mdzes dga' zhes bgyi bar ma gsol bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-15: deng bdag gis khyod kyi mtshan mdzes dga' zhes bgyi par gsol par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-21: ae ma'o khyod kyi mtshan ni gzugs dang 'dra la gzugs kyang mtshan dang 'dra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-22: gal te yab yum dag gis khyod kyi mtshan bzang mo zhes bgyi bar ma gsol bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-23: deng bdag gis khyod kyi mtshan bzang mo zhes bgyi bar gsol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58a-25: bzang mo dgung gcig gi gla ji tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-0: rje'i sras kyis mi phal ba bzhin du mi @58b gsha' ba zhig bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-1: de'i bu mo mngag gzhug mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-2: dgung re zhing kar sha pa na lnga brgya lnga brgya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-3: des mi la khyod kyis nyin re zhing kar sha pa na lnga brgya lnga brgya bskur bar bya'o zhes bsgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-4: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-5: 'dod pa dag ni bsten pa na log pa'am ngoms pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-7: de nyi ma mang po 'das kyang ngoms par ma gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-8: mis kyang nyin re zhing kar sha pa na lnga brgya lnga brgya 'bul ba kho nar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-9: tshong pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-10: shes ldan dag ded dpon mdzes dga' mi snang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-11: de bdag cag la grogs pos gtad pas kun tu btsal bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-12: tshong pa dag gis de'i g-yog dag la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-15: ded dpon nyi ma gang kho na la mnyan yod du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la 'jud mthun ma'i khyim du zhugs te 'dug na khyed cag gis deng gzod dran nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-16: tshong pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-17: shes ldan dag yu bu cag gis ded dpon mdzes dga' yal bar bor ba ni ma legs par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-18: 'di'i phas yu bu cag la klan kar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-19: tshong pa dag gis mdzes dga' la don mthun rnams kyi mchid nas tshur spyon cig ces mchi'o zhes bang chen btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-20: bang chen des mdzes dga' la bsgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-21: mdzes dgas 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-22: bzang mos gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:58b-23: rje'i sras 'dod pa dag ni rgyu gnyis kyis bsten par bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-3: khyod ni gzugs bzang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-4: lang tsho la bab pa legs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-5: gzhon pa'i gnas skabs su re zhig rtse ba dang dga' ba dang dga' mgur spyod pa mdzod la bgres pa'i gnas skabs su nor bsgrub pa mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-6: mdzes dgas bang chen de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-7: kye khyo ga song zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-9: bang chen de song ste tshong pa rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-10: ded dpon gyi zhal nas song zhig dang 'ong ngo zhes gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-11: tshong pa de dag 'dus te sdod pa na mdzes dga' thogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-12: tshong pa de dag thams cad 'dus te 'jud mthun ma'i khyim du dong nas tshong pa de dag gis sgor bsdad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-14: kye khyo ga song la ded dpon la tshong pa'i tshogs rnams sgo na sdod cing ded dpon lta bar 'tshal lo zhes gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-15: mi des song ste mdzes dga' la brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-16: mdzes dgas 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-17: yang gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mos gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-18: rje'i sras tshong ba de dag kyang bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-19: de dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad du ga la rung bzhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-20: 'dod pa dag ni bsten pa na kun tu sbyor ba dag 'phel bar byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-22: gang gi tshe kho bo kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59a-23: mi des song ste tshong pa'i tshogs rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-0: ded dpon gyi zhal nas gang gi tshe kho bo kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe 'byung ngo @59b zhes gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-1: tshong pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-2: kye ma mdzes dga' 'di bya ba ma yin pa la zhugs kyis 'dong ngo zhes de dag gis zong rnam par spangs nas rin blangs te 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-3: de nas mi gang gis nyi ma re re zhing bzang mo la kar sha pa na lnga brgya phul bar gyur pa des phyin chad 'bul bar mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-4: de nas dus gzhan zhig na bzang mos mi de la dris shing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-5: kye khyo ga ci'i phyir phyin chad kar sha pa na dag 'bul bar mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-7: don mthun dag dong bas bdag gis ga las dbul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-8: ci don mthun dag gis mdzes dga'i zong yang khyer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-10: bzang mos mdzes dga' dang lhan cig nyi ma gnyis sam gsum dga' mgur spyad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-11: rje'i sras bdag la zhing yang ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-12: las kyi mtha' bgyid pa dag kyang ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-13: grong mi zong ma nos te yul gzhan du mchi ba dag kyang ma mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-14: khyod lta bu dag gi drung nas gang thob ba des bdag 'tsho bar 'gyur ba kho nar bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-15: yang na ni kar sha pa na dag stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-16: yang na ni skyes pa gzhan gyi skabs dbye ba mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-18: bzang mo khyod la sdug pa 'ga' yang med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-21: tshogs can rnams la sdug pa med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-22: de dag rang bzhin ring mi gnas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-23: bya rnams 'bras med ljon pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-24: de dag rnying pa rnam par spong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-25: zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:59b-27: bzang mo khyod la ji srid du nor sbyin par byed pa de srid du khyod skyes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-1: ji srid brgya byin char 'bebs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-2: de srid ri klung chu 'bebs ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-3: ji srid nor ni sbyin byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-4: de srid 'jud mthun skyes bu dbang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-5: zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-7: bzang mo khyod su la yang yid 'bebs par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-10: 'jud mthun dgongs kar rang lus bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-11: gcugs dang gtam gyis dga' bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-12: de nas nam phyed dbus gnas shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-13: nam langs phan chad rtsva bzhin spong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-14: zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-16: bzang mo khyod nor dang bcas pa'i mi dag la spyod par byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-19: nor dang bcas pa'i mi dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-20: nor ma spyad pa rnams la yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-21: sar pa'i rtsva la ba lang bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-22: bdag cag rnams kyis spyad par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-23: zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-24: mdzes dgas 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-26: mdzes dga' 'di ni gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin pas shin tu thag ring bar song yang skyes bu 'di lta bu 'di lta bu dang lhan cig rtse bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-28: dga' mgur spyod par bya ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-29: de'i phyir ji srid du gzhan kar sha pa na dag thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-30: ma 'ong ba de srid du 'di dang lhan cig rtse bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-32: dga' mgur spyad par bya'o snyam du shes shing rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60a-33: bzang mos mdzes dga'i gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-1: rje'i sras khyod la khab na bzhad gad dag mi bgyid dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-2: de ni bdag gis bzhad gad bgyis pa lags kyis bzhes shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-4: mdzes dga' 'dod chags shas chen pos 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-5: skyes pa gzhan zhig kar sha pa na lnga brgya thogs te der zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-6: des bzang mo dga' mgur spyad kyis bzhud ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-7: bzang mo mdzes dga' nyid kyi mdun du yol bas bcad de dga' mgur spyad par brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-8: mdzes dgas 'di bdag kho na'i mdun du skyes pa 'di dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed do snyam du shes shing rig nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-9: mdzes dga' lam po che la mi mkhas pas gang du 'gro bar bya ba mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-10: ji tsam na dge slong zhig mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas phyir byung ba de mdzes dgas mthong nas dge slong de'i phyi thog thag rjes su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-11: de nas dge slong de gtsug lag khang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-12: lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-13: snam sbyar sprugs te rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te chu btsags nas lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-14: mdzes dga' de'i mdun na 'greng ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-15: dge slong des mdzes dga' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-16: bzhin bzang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:60b-17: mdzes dgas gal te ma zos na bkres pas 'chi bar 'gyur bar shes shing rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-0: dge slong des mdzes dga' la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma @61a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-6: 'phags pa bdag ni yul srung byed dag na grong khyer 'phags rgyal zhes bgyi ba de na ded dpon dga' bo zhes bgyi ba mchis pa de'i bu mdzes dga' zhes bgyi ba lags te bdag zong mang po 'tshal te mchis pa las 'jud mthun mas tshul ma lags pas gnod pa bsgrubs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-8: bzhin bzang ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-9: mdzes dgas gal te bdag 'phags rgyal du song bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-10: su zhig mchil ma dag sa la 'dor bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-11: bdag kho na'i steng 'ba' zhig tu'o snyam du shes shing rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-13: dge slong des mdzes dga' rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas de'i 'og tu nyi ma gnyis sam gsum du kun tu spyad pa'i chos dag slob tu bcug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-14: bzhin bzang ri dvags kyis ri dvags mi sos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-15: mnyan yod rgya che la rang gi spyod yul dang yab kyi yul yin gyis bsod snyoms bsgrubs la 'tsho bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-16: mdzes dga' snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-17: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61a-18: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-0: gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mo yang 'gyod pa skyes te bdag gis kar sha pa na 'dod pa'i rgyus ded dpon mdzes dga' de tsam du mdzes shing lang tsho la bab pa de bskrad pa ni ma @61b legs pa byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-1: shin tu thag ring bar song yang skyes bu de lta bu lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya ba yin par shes shing rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-2: bu mo mngag gzhug ma la bu mo gal te ded dpon mdzes dga' mthong na yang 'jug tu chug cig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-3: mdzes dga' spyod yul la mi mkhas pas bsod snyoms sgrub pa na 'jud mthun ma'i khyim de nyid du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-4: bu mo mngag gzhug ma des mthong nas yongs su dga' bas bzang mo la jo mo mdzes dga' khab sgor mchis so zhes sbran to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-10: rab tu byung yang 'jug tu chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-11: mngag gzhug ma des mdzes dga' 'jug tu bcug nas gzugs 'tsho ma bzang mos mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-12: bzang mos brang brdungs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-13: mdzes dga' khyod kyis ci'i slad du ngan bu spangs te rab tu byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-15: skal chad ma khyod kho bo kho na'i mdun du skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed na kho bo ji ltar rab tu mi 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-17: rje'i sras bud med kyi yul ni rtag tu nongs pa mchis pas bdag nongs pa mchis pa de bzod par mdzad cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-18: da ni bdag dang rdzas kyang khyod kyi lags kyis tshur spyon bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:61b-20: de'i yang khyod kyis kho bo re zhig nor dang don mthun dag las yongs su nyams pa byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-0: ci da tshul khrims las kyang yongs su nyams par byed @62a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-3: 'phags pa slad rol du drud cing nang du pho la nang du drud cing slad rol tu pho zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-4: 'di la tshul khrims 'chal ba ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-5: mdzes dgas dge slong gnas brtan no cog 'dir bsod snyoms la 'jug pa de dag kyang gor ma chag par 'di ltar byed pas des na 'di skad zer ro snyam du shes shing rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-6: mdzes dgas lhung bzed dang chos gos mtha' gcig tu gzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-7: phyi rol du drud cing nang du pho nang du drud cing phyi rol du pho nas ya mtshan dang bral bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-8: de nas bzang mos bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-9: bza' ba gtsang ma bsod pas lhung bzed 'gengs su bcug ste byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-10: 'phags pa gal te yang bzhed par gyur na spyon cig ces kyang smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-11: mdzes dgas bsod snyoms blangs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-12: ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-13: shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-14: zhe sdang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-15: gti mug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-16: shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-17: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-18: shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62a-19: zhe sdang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-0: gti mug 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir sems rnam par @62b grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-1: shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos ston pa de lta de ltar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-2: tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' cung zad 'gyod par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-4: rab tu 'gyed par gyur cing 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-12: sems khong du chud cing 'dam bu sngon po brngas pa rnyings par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-14: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-15: tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' khyod la lus kyi gnod pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-16: sems kyi yongs su gdung ba 'ga' zhig med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-17: de ngo tsha bas smra bar mi byed cing 'ga' yang med do zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-18: sman pa zhig phyogs der 'ongs pa de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-19: bzhin bzang gzhon nu 'di nad ci yin pa de ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-20: sman pa des de brtag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-21: dbang po gsal ba mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-22: 'phags pa dag 'di'i dbang po dag gsal bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-23: 'di la lus kyi nad ni 'ga' yang ma mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-24: 'di la sems kyi yongs su gdung ba ni gor ma bkum par mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-25: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-26: bzhin bzang 'di'i sems kyi yongs su gdung ba ji lta bu yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-28: 'phags pa bdag cag sman pa dag ni lus gso bar bgyid pa lags kyi sems gso bar bgyid pa ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-29: 'di ltar 'phags pa dag nyid sems gso bar mdzad pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:62b-30: 'phags pa dag nyid kyis mkhyen par 'gyur ro zhes smras te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-0: @63a *// dge slong rnams kyis mdzes dga' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-1: tshe dang ldan pa 'di na khyod kyi pha yang med ma yang med rtsa lag gzhan yang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-2: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa nged cag kho nar zad pas nges kyis khyod kyi bsnyen bkur byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-3: ji ltar gyur pa smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-4: mdzes dgas dge slong de dag la skabs de rgyas par brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-5: dge slong de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-6: tshe dang ldan pa ni 'bras bu kho nas tsha bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-7: tshe dang ldan pas rab tu byung ba tsam nyid kyis bstan pa la chu bur phyung bar gyur to zhes dge slong de dag mdzes dgas smras pa la mngon par bstod par yang mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-8: phyir zlog par yang mi byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-9: mngon par bstod pa yang ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-10: phyir bzlog pa yang ma byas par dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-11: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-13: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de dag gi skabs de rgyas par gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-15: dge slong dag des kyang mi gti mug can de pham par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-16: dge slong gi sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-18: sten pa la bab par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-19: de sems sten pa la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-21: sten pa la bab pas zag byed zag byed kyi phyi rol tu drud cing nang du 'bo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63a-22: nang du drud cing phyi rol tu 'bo bar byed na pham par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-0: @63b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-1: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa dang chung ma de rang gi las dag gis dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-2: gnyis pa blangs pa dang de yang dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-3: de bzhin du chung ma bdun pa'i bar du blangs pa dang de yang dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-4: khyim thab de yang skur pa gdab par 'gyur ba'i las dag gis chung ma gsod pa chung ma gsod ces bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-5: khyim bdag des yang bu mo blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-6: mi ster cing nged kyis ci'i phyir bu mo yongs su gtang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-7: mi sbyin no zhes kyang zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-8: khyim bdag des yugs mo dag blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-9: yug sa mo de dag kyang kho mo cag gis ci'i phyir bdag yongs su gtang na khyod kyi khyim du 'jug ces zer ro; ;khyim bdag de rnam pa thams cad du yi chad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-10: rang nyid kyis khyim gyi so tshis dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-11: dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de'i chung po grogs shig 'ongs nas des khyim bdag de mthong nas dris pa khyod ci byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-13: khyim gyi so tshis dag byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-15: khyod ci'i phyir rang nyid kyis khyim gyi so tshis dag byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-17: kho bos chung ma gcig blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-18: de rang gi las dag gis dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-19: gnyis pa blangs pa dang de yang dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:63b-20: de bzhin du bdun pa'i bar du blangs pa dang de yang dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-1: pa; gzhan dag ci'i phyir mi slong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-3: bslangs na mi ster cing nged kyis ci'i phyir bu mo yongs su gtang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-4: mi sbyin no zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-5: des smras pa; yug sa mo dag ci'i phyir mi slong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-7: bslangs te de dag kyang kho mo cag gis ci'i phyir bdag yongs su gtang na khyod kyi khyim du 'jug ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-8: khyim bdag de'i khyim gyi ha cang yang mi ring ba na tshogs can ma rgan mo zhig 'dug nas chung po grogs des khyim bdag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-9: tshogs can ma rgan mo de ci'i phyir 'jug tu mi gzhug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-10: khyim bdag gis smras pa; ci kho bos 'jud mthun ma'i khyim bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-12: tshogs can ma de sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de las phyir ldog gis 'jug tu chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-13: khyim bdag de chung po grogs des nan gyi mnan pa na tshogs can ma de'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-14: bde legs bde legs zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-16: byon pa legs so ci bzhed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-20: bdag la zas dang gos sbyin pa gang lags pa'i'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-22: khyod sngon gyi nyon mongs pa dag kun tu mi spyod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-24: ci bdag gis skyes pa ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64a-25: bdag sdig pa can dam pa ma lags pa'i chos de las ni phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-0: tshur spyon bzhud bdag gis khyod kyi na bza' dang @64b bshos gsol gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-1: khyod kyis bdag gi khyim gyi so tshis dag mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-2: khyim bdag des tshogs can ma rgan mo de khyim du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-4: lde mig 'khyog po dag gtad nas smras pa; 'di khyod kyi khyim yin gyis khyod kyis byin pas kho bo bya ba byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-5: tshogs can ma rgan mo des khyim bdag de'i khyim gyi so tshis dag bya bar brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-6: de'i 'og tu gos dang zas bzang pos dus yun mi ring ba zhig gis pags pa dang sha dang khrag dag rtas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-7: de'i sgo'i nye 'khor nas bu mo rab tu mang po dag cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong ba tshogs can ma rgan mos mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-9: bu mo dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-10: rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-12: kho mo gos dang rgyan thogs kyi bar du re zhig sdod cig //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-13: rgan mo gos dang rgyan thogs pa de'i bar du bu mo dag thal te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-14: rgan mo yang gos dang rgyan thogs nas phyi bzhin myur ba myur bar 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-15: ji tsam na bu mo de dag gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-16: gtsug lag khang de na dge slong zhig gnas khang sgo ma bcad pa na gnyid log par gyur pa de'i gos rnam par 'thor bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-17: de'i yan lag gi rnam pa yang las su rung bar gyur pa bu mo de dag gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-18: bu mo de dag dgod cing gtsug lag khang nas phyir byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:64b-19: tshogs can ma rgan mo yang 'jug cing rgan mos bu mo de dag mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-1: pa de so sto mar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba khyed kyis ma thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-2: bu mo de dag cang mi smra bar nyid du byung ste dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-3: tshogs can rgan mos bu mo de dag gis 'dir bya gag gam spre'u zhig mthong bar gyur gor ma chag snyam du shes shing rig nas sems gtod cing nges par rtog bzhin du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-4: ji tsam na dge slong de de ltar rnam par gyur pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-5: mthong nas kyang de la 'dod pa'i chos skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-6: tshogs can ma rgan mo des dge slong de'i steng du bgrad de brtsal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-7: dge slong de gnyid stug pos non pas phyir ma sad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-8: tshogs can ma rgan mos bdag cag tshogs can ma dag gis ni sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi mngon par shes na rab tu byung ba 'dis ko sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa lnga shes te 'di ltar reg pa ni bdag gir byed la tshig ni mi ster to snyam du shes shing rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-9: gang gi tshe tshogs can ma rgan mo des kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe dge slong de sad par byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-10: 'phags pa bdag gi sdum pa phyogs ga ge mo zhig na mchis kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-11: gal te yang bzhed par gyur na spyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-13: skal chad ma bsti gnas su na par byed pa de yang re zhig kho bo bdag gir mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-14: khyod kyi khyim du 'ong bar 'gyur re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65a-15: dge slong de bdag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas des dge slong rnams la skabs de rgyas par brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-0: dge slong rnams kyis @65b bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-2: dge slong khyod kyis reg pa bdag gir ma byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-4: btsun pa bdag gis reg pa bdag gir ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-5: bdag dang po nyid nas gnyid stug pos non pas bdag reg pa bdag gir bgyid par ga la 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-7: dge slong dag dge slong reg pa bdag gir ma byas pa 'di la ni ltung ba med mod kyi 'on kyang ngas dge slong grong mtha' ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-8: dge slong grong mtha' pa nyin par glos phab ste gnyid log pas sgo sgo gtan gyis gcad par bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-9: srung ma dge slong gzhag par bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-11: sgo sgo gtan gyis gcod par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-12: srung ma dge slong 'jog par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-13: gos 'ching bar mi byed par nyin par de bzhin du glos phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-14: gnyid log par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-16: mnyan yod na dge slong dgon pa pa bsam gtan bzhi pa thob pa zhig 'dug pa de yang dang yang du bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:65b-17: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro bas de dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag gis ngo shes par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-0: de la dus gzhan zhig na g-yan pa'i nad @66a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-2: de la dge slong gsar bu gsar bu de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-3: gnas brtan khyod la g-yan pa'i snyun byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-5: bzhin bzang dag de de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-7: gnas brtan ci'i slad du sman pa la rmas te bya ba mi mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-9: bzhin bzang dag skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-10: skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-11: skye bo mang po la mi sdug ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-12: skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad dang thun mong ba 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-13: 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ong bar 'gyur zhing des nad 'di dang kho bo yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu khrid par 'gyur bas bya ba byar ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-15: gnas brtan 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yun ring po ji srid du 'tsho ba de srid du bsod nams mang po 'phel zhing ji srid du bsod nams mang po 'phel ba de srid du yun ring por mtho ris dag tu dga' bar 'gyur ro zhes ma gsungs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-16: bzhud la bya ba mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-17: de de dag gis nan gyis mnan pa na sman pa'i gan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-18: sman pas de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-19: 'phags pa khyod la g-yan pa'i snyun byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-22: de'i don kho nar kho bo 'ongs kyis bdag la sman ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-23: 'phags pa bshos bsod pa gsol la yungs mar gyis sku dag bskus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66a-24: gdugs la bzhugs shig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-0: bzhin @66b bzang kho bo la yungs mar stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-1: 'phags pa bdag cag sman pa dag ni sman ston pa lags kyi 'bul ba ni ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-2: gal te re re la yang 'bul na bdag cag la 'tshal ma yang ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-3: rad pa yang ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-4: 'di ltar khyim bdag che ge mo zhig la bro nad 'di lta bu byung bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-5: bdag gis de'i g-yan pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i yungs mar bskol gyis; de'i gan du bzhud la slongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-6: bzhin bzang mi ster bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-8: de dad pa can lags pas 'bul bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-10: don gyis na khyod nyid kyis byin no zhes smras te song nas khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-11: khyim bdag des de thag ring po nas mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-12: 'phags pa khyod la g-yan pa'i snyun byung ngam; bzhin bzang de de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-13: 'phags pa yungs mar gyis sku dag bskus te gdugs la bzhugs shig dang khyod sos par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-14: bzhin bzang de'i don kho nar kho bo 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-15: kho bos khyod la g-yan pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i yungs mar yod par shes kyis de byin cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-16: khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-17: 'phags pa dam tshig la dbul bar bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:66b-18: gal te bdag las bsod snyoms gsol bar 'gyur na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-0: khyim bdag des de zas bsod pas tshim par byas nas g-yan pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i yungs mar gyis @67a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-1: lhung bzed chung ngu 'gengs su bcug ste byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-2: dge slong des aa rog gya zhes brjod de song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-3: dgon pa'i gnas su song ste dam dum dag gyon nas yungs mar des lus dag bskus te nyi ma la 'dug pa dang de la bde ba'i 'du shes skyes par gyur nas gnyid log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-4: de'i yan lag gi rnam pa srog chags aud tsa ting gas zin cing las su rung bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-5: de'i gos kyang 'thor bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-6: ji tsam na gzhon nu ma chen mo zhig lci ba thu ba na phyogs der son pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-7: des dge slong de de ltar rnam par gyur pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-8: mthong nas de la 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-9: des dge slong de'i steng du brtsal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-10: dge slong de sad na nyams chung bas phyir bzlog par ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-11: gang gi tshe de kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-12: 'phags pa bdag gi sdum ba phyogs ga ge mo zhig na mchis kyis gal te yang bzhed par gyur na spyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-14: skal chad ma bsti gnas sun par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-15: kho bo re zhig de yang bdag gir mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-16: khyod kyi khyim du 'ong bar 'gyur re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-17: dge slong de bdag la pham par gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-18: des dge slong rnams la skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67a-19: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-0: de nas bcom @67b ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-1: dge slong khyod kyis reg pa bdag gir ma byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-3: btsun pa bdag gis reg pa bdag gir ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-4: bdag dang po nyid nas 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bas bdag reg pa bdag gir ga la bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-6: dge slong dag dge slong reg pa bdag gir mi byed pa 'di la ni ltung ba med mod kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-7: 'on kyang ngas dge slong dgon pa pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-8: dge slong dgon pa pa nyin par glos phab ste gnyid log pas phyogs de yal ga dag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-10: re lde dag gis bskor bar bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-11: srung ma dge slong gzhag par bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-13: phyogs de yal ga dag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-15: re lde dag gis bskor bar mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-16: srung ma dge slong 'jog par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-17: gos 'ching bar mi byed pa de bzhin du glos phab ste gnyid log par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-18: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-19: btsun pa gal te dge slong 'di re zhig 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba lags na ci'i slad du de'i yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:67b-21: dge slong dag 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i yan lag gi rnam pa ni rgyu lngas las su rung bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-1: chags dang bral ba'i ni rgyu bzhis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-2: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i rgyu lnga gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-3: bshang bas nye bar non pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-4: gci bas nye bar non pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-5: rlung gis nye bar non pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-6: srog chags au tsa ting gas zin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-7: 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa nyid ni lnga pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-8: 'dod chags dang ma bral ba ni rgyu lnga po de dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-9: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rgyu bzhi po gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-10: bshang bas nye bar non pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-11: gci bas nye bar non pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-12: rlung gis nye bar non pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-13: srog chags au tsa ting gas zin pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-14: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rgyu ni bzhi po de dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-15: dge slong 'di'i yan lag gi rnam pa ni de'i tshe na srog chags au tsa ting gas zin pas des na 'di'i las su rung bar gyur to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-18: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-20: btsun pa ka lan dka'i bu tshe dang ldan pa bzang byin gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun skyon ma mchis shing chu bur ma mchis pa la de'i dang por 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-21: mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen gyis chu bur phyung ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68a-23: dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad kyi 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis 'jig rten skyon med cing chu bur med pa la de'i dang por 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-0: mi tshangs par spyod @68b pa'i rkyen gyis chu bur phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-2: dge slong dag 'jig rten 'di 'jig pa'i dus gang yin pa de yang yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-4: sems can dag phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-5: de dag de ni gzugs can yid las byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-8: yan lag nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-9: bzang ba kha dog dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-10: rang las 'od 'byung ba; nam mkha' la 'gro ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-12: dga' ba'i zas dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-13: tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-14: de'i tshe na sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig dang rgya mtsho 'ba' zhig tu gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-15: sa chen po chu 'ba' zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-16: rgya mtsho 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma kun tu 'chags par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-18: kun tu khyab par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-19: 'di lta ste dper na 'o ma bskol ba grang par gyur pa'i steng du yang rlung gis spris ma kun tu 'chags par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-21: kun tu khyab par byed pa de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-22: sa chen po chu 'ba' zhig dang rgya mtsho 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa'i steng du yang rlung gis spris ma kun tu 'chags par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-24: kun tu khyab par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-25: de ni sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dri phun sum tshogs pa ro phun sum tshogs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-26: kha dog gis ni 'di lta bu ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-27: 'di lta ste dper na mar lta bu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:68b-29: 'di lta ste dper na sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba lta bu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-1: rten 'di 'chags pa'i dus gang yin pa de yang yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-2: 'jig rten 'chags pa na 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad las zad bsod nams zad pas shi 'phos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-3: 'di lta bu nyid du mi rnams dang skal ba mthun pa nyid du 'ong zhing 'dir yang gzugs can yid las byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-6: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-12: dga' ba'i zas dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-13: tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-14: de'i tshe na 'jig rten du nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang ma byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-15: 'jig rten du rgyu skar dag kyang ma byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-16: mtshan mo dang nyin mo dag kyang ma byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-17: skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam dag kyang ma byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-19: zla ba phyed dang dus tshigs dang lo dag kyang ma byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-22: sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig gi grangs su 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-23: de nas sems can brkam pa'i rang bzhin can zhig gi sor mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-24: ji lta ji ltar myang bar byed pa de lta de ltar 'dod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-25: ji lta ji ltar 'dod par byed pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas kyi rtsom pas zos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-26: sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de sor mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69a-27: ji lta ji ltar myang bar byed pa de lta de ltar 'dod par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-0: ji lta ji ltar 'dod @69b par byed pa de lta de ltar khams kyi zas kyi rtsom pas zos par gyur pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-1: mthong nas sems can de dag kyang sor mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myang bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-2: ji lta ji ltar myang bar byed pa de lta de ltar 'dod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-3: ji lta ji ltar 'dod par byed pa de lta de ltar khams kyi zas kyi rtsom pas zos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-4: gang gi phyir sems can de dag gis sa'i bcud kham gyi zas kyi rtsom pas zos par gyur pa de'i phyir de dag gi lus la sra ba nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-5: lci ba nyid byung zhing de dag gi kha dog gsal ba bzang po gang yin pa de yang med par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-6: 'jig rten du mun pa yang byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-7: dge slong dag chos nyid kyis na 'jig rten du mun pa byung na 'jig rten du nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-8: 'jig rten du rgyu skar dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-11: skad cig dang thang gcig dang yud tsam dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-12: zla ba dang zla ba phyed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-13: dus tshigs dang lo dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-14: de dag de za zhing zas de dang ldan la tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-15: de dag las gang zas ches chung ngu za ba de ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-16: gang zas ches cher za ba de ni kha dog ngan par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-17: de ltar zas rnam gnyis nyid la brten nas kha dog rnam gnyis nyid du mngon la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-18: kha dog rnam gnyis nyid du gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-19: sems can gyis sems can la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:69b-20: kva'e sems can nga ni kha dog dang ldan pa yin la khyod ni kha dog ngan pa yin no zhes khyad du gsod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:70a-0: de dag kha dog gis mngon pa'i @70a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:70a-1: nga rgyal can du gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:70a-2: sdig pa can mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud med par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:70a-3: dge slong dag sems can de dag sa'i bcud med par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:70a-4: 'dus shing lhags nas mya ngan byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:70a-7: 'di skad ces kye ma'o bcud kye ma'o bcud ces kyang zer cing 'di lta ste dper na; deng sang mi dag zas zhim pa bzang po cung zhig rnyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:70a-8: yi ge dang sbyar ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101a-21: bla yi grvar yang de bzhin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101a-22: khyim gyi gzhi la'ang rnam gnyis dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101a-23: zong gi gzhi yang rnam gnyis yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101a-28: zhing gi sa gzhi ni rnam pa gnyis kyis brkus pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101a-29: shags kyis dang yongs su bskor bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101a-30: ji ltar shags kyis she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-0: dge slong gis zhing gi sa gzhi'i phyir khyim @101b pa dang lhan cig 'og zur shags 'gyed par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-1: gal te dge slong khyim pas pham par byas na dge slong la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-2: gal te dge slong gis khyim pa pham par byas na; ji srid du khyim pas sbyor ba ma btang ba de srid du dge slong la nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-3: khyim pas sbyor ba gtang na brkus par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-4: rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-5: dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-9: dge slong dag rgyal po ni rtsod pa thams cad kyi dpon po yin pas brkus par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-10: rin thang brtse bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-12: ji ltar yongs su bskor bar zhe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:101b-20: mtshams kyi sna dang mtshams kyi snar phrad na brkus par brjod par bya ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:102a-2: zhing gi sa gzhi la ji lta ba bzhin du khyim gyi sa gzhi dang zong gi sa gzhi yang de bzhin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:102a-5: klag cor pha ma mdun byung slong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:102a-6: yug chen rgan gzhon rung bya dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:102a-7: dri bya sge'u chung smod pa'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:102a-9: dge slong dag spa bkong sla zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:102a-10: khyim bdag spa bkong dka' ba'i tshe /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:102b-19: yang dge slong gis sar phyin pa'i sho gam bzlar gzhug par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:102b-20: dge slong gis sar phyin pa'i sho gam bzlar 'jug par byed na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104a-20: bdag cag gis bzla bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-0: @104b tshong pa rnams kyis 'phags pa 'di dag ni mi mthun par byed pa yin pas bzla bar mi byed kyis thabs kyi rnam pa bya'o snyam du shes shing rig nas de dag gis phan tshun gros byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-1: 'phags pa dag deng bdag cag brel bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-2: khyed cag la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i rngo mi thog gis bzhud la grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-3: dge slong de dag grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang; tshong pa de dag gis dge slong bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gi gtur bu dag dang lhung bzed kyi snod dag dang par bur snod dag tu sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-4: dge slong dag bsod snyoms brgyus nas grong nas phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-5: de dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas gang gi tshe sho gam gyi gnas nas 'das pa de'i tshe tshong pa de dag gis dge slong de dag gi snod la nom par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-6: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-8: tshong pa dag gis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-14: 'phags pa dag 'di la khyed kyi lus kyis las kyang ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-15: ngag gi las kyang ma mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:104b-16: ji ltar khyed cag ltung ba dang bcas pa lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-0: dge slong de dag bdag cag @105a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-1: la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas de dag mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyir phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-2: de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-5: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-6: khyed cag sho gam pa dag dang la gcan pa dag dang gru btsas gcod pa dag gis yongs su gtses par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-8: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag de dag gis yongs su gtses par ma gyur mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-9: 'on kyang bdag cag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dag gi gtur bu dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-10: chos gos kyi snod dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-11: bar bur snod dag tu tshong pa dag gis sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas bcug pa de bdag cag gis ma shes nas sho gam gyi gnas nas bzlas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-12: de'i phyir bdag cag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-13: dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-15: dge slong dag dge slong de dag la ni ltung ba med mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-16: yang dge slong gis snod dag yal bar bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-17: 'gro bar mi bya bar 'di ltar srung ma dge slong gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-18: de dag gis dge slong bzhag ste bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105a-19: dge slong de gang gi tshe bshang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105b-0: tshong pa de dag @105b gis de kho na bzhin du sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas dag gtur bu dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105b-2: bar bur snod dag tu 'jug par byed cing de kho na bzhin du sho gam gyi gnas nas 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105b-3: de'i tshe tshong pa dag dge slong de dag gi snod dag la nom par byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105b-4: dge slong dag 'gyod par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105b-5: dge slong rnams la brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105b-6: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:105b-11: srung ma dge slong gnyis bzhag ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-0: @110b 'phags pa'i ras yug chen ni sho gam ma bcad pas bdag kho nas sho gam gzhal dgos par 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod pas bdag nyid kyi snod du gzhug par bya'o snyam du shes nas /
