K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-2: 'phags pa ras yug chen slar stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-5: khyod 'gyod pa skyes par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-7: 'phags pa bdag la 'gyod pa ma mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-8: 'di ltar bdag gi rdzas ni sho gam bkum la khyod kyi ras yug chen 'di ni sho gam ma bkum pas gal te sho gam pa dag ras yug chen gyi sho gam 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-9: don gyis bdag kho nas gzhal bar bgyi ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-10: sho gam gyi gnas nas bzlas te dbul bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-12: bzhin bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas sho gam gyi gnas nas bzla bar mi bya'o zhes bslab gzhi bca' ba mdzad pas bdag ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na mi rung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-14: ded dpon des 'phags pa dag ni mi mthun pa byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-15: 'di la bdag gis dus shes par 'gyur ro snyam du shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-16: ded dpon des dge slong de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-17: 'phags pa des bdag brel bas khyod kyi bsod snyoms 'ga' yang sgrub par rngo mi thog gis bzhud la grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:110b-18: dge slong de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-0: ji srid du de zhugs pa de'i bar du ded dpon des ras yug @111a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-1: chen de bdag nyid kyi snod du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-2: ji tsam na dge slong de la sho gam pas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-3: 'phags pa khyod la sho gam gzhal 'tshal ba'i rdzas cung zad mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-5: bzhin bzang ras yug chen gcig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-8: dge slong des gtur bur brtags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-9: ras yug chen mi snang nas de bzhin bsgyur zhing lag pa gnyis 'dril bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-11: 'phags pa ci'i slad du 'di ltar mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-13: bzhin bzang kho bo'i ras yug chen de ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-15: 'phags pa de ni khyod kyis ma brkus kyi 'di ltar bdag gis brkus pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-16: des na bdag gis sho gam ma thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-17: gang gi tshe dge slong de sho gam gyi gnas nas 'das pa de'i tshe ded dpon des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-18: 'phags pa ci'i slad du sems khong du chud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-19: bzhin bzang khyod la yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i bsod nams skyes mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-20: yongs su longs spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ni ma skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-22: kho bo'i ras yug chen de ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-24: 'phags pa de ni ma byin par len par len pa dag gis ma brkus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-25: 'di ltar bdag gis sho gam gyis 'jigs pas rang gi snod du stsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111a-26: 'tshal te mchis na ji ltar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-2: bzhin bzang bdag la ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus pa ni legs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-3: bdag ltung ba dang bcas par gyur pa ni ma legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-4: 'phags pa 'di la khyod kyi lus kyi las kyang ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-5: ngag gi las kyang ma mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-6: ci'i slad du khyod ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-7: dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyir phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-8: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-9: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-11: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-12: dge slong des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-13: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-15: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-16: 'on kyang ngas dge slong lam du zhugs pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-17: dge slong lam du zhugs pa grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug pas snod la mtshan ma btab ste 'gro bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-18: phyir 'ongs nas kyang so sor brtag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-19: dge slong lam du zhugs pas kun tu spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-22: de'i tshe na dge slong rgan po zhig dang gzhon nu zhig ljongs rgyur 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:111b-23: de na rgan po ni shes pa che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-1: mang ba yo byad mang ba yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-2: gzhon nu ni shes pa chung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-3: chos gos gsum la 'chel ba yin pas rgan po la sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas yod nas ji tsam na mthar gyis sho gam gyi gnas kyi drung du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-4: rgan pos bdag la sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas yod pas gal te sho gam pa dag 'phags pa la sho gam gzhal 'tshal ba'i rdzas cung zad mchis sam zhes 'dri na gal te med do zhes brjod na ni brdzun du smra bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-5: gal te yod do zhes brjod na ni nges par sho gam gzhal dgos par 'gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-6: de'i phyir gang gis sho gam yang gzhal mi dgos la brdzun du smra bar yang mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam du shes nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-7: gzhon nu 'di la sbyin zhing sho gam gyi gnas nas 'das na blang bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-8: des gzhon nu de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-9: tshe dang ldan pa re zhig yud tsam zhig lhung bzed dang chos gos long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-10: gzhon nu des gnas brtan ngal bar gyur pas des na bdag la sbyin gor ma chag snyam du shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-11: des blangs shing des de khyer te mdun du 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-12: sho gam pas mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-13: 'phags pa khyod la sho gam gzhal 'tshal ba'i rdzas cung zad mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-16: sho gam pa des dge slong de yal bar bor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112a-17: sho gam gyi gnas nas 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-0: rgan @112b po yang stong par 'brang zhing 'ongs nas sho gam pa des rgan po de la ni ma dris so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-1: rgan po de gang gi tshe sho gam gyi gnas nas 'das pa de'i tshe smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-2: tshe dang ldan pa rdzas khyer shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-7: tshe dang ldan pa kho bo ngal bas khyod la byin pa ni ma yin gyi 'di ltar kho bo la sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas yod pas gal te kho bo la sho gam pa 'phags pa la sho gam gzhal 'tshal ba'i rdzas cung zad mchis sam zhes 'dri na gal te med do zhes brjod na ni brdzun du smra bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-8: gal te yod do zhes brjod na ni nges par sho gam gzhal dgos par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i blo skyes pas de'i phyir kho bos lhung bzed dang chos gos byin pa yin pas de ni sho gam gyi gnas las 'das pas des na yang phyir len to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-10: de lta na gnas brtan gyis bdag nyid thar par mdzad la ngan bu ni ltung ba dang bcas par bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-12: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis mi shes pas 'di la khyod kyis ltung ba ci zhig yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-13: dge slong gzhon nu de 'gyod pa skyes nas mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyir phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-14: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-17: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:112b-20: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir de skad zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-0: @113a *// dge slong des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-1: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-3: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-4: yang dge slong lam du zhugs pas ma dris par rdzas blang bar mi bya bar len pa nyid na 'di na sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas cung zad med dam zhes dri bar bya ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-5: ma dris par len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-6: gzhan yang dge slong gis sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas lam du bzla bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-7: zlo bar byed na 'gal tshabs can 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sho ga ma gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas lam du bzla bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-9: dge slong drug cu ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba'i tshe; ri brags shig tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-10: ri brags de na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug cing de yang dad pa dang ldan pa yin pas des dge slong de dag mgron du bos te; zas byin nas re re la gos phrugs re bskon par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-11: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-12: khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas lam du bzla bar mi bya'o zhes dgag pa mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-13: de'i phyir bdag cag gis ji ltar blang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-14: khyim bdag de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113a-15: dge slong rnams kyi yon bshad pa byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-0: dong nas mthar @113b gyis mnyan yod du phyir phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-1: de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-2: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-4: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-7: 'on kyang khyim bdag gcig gis bdag cag la zan byin te gos phrugs re bskon par byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-8: de la bdag cag gis khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas lam du bzla bar mi bya'o zhes dgag pa mdzad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-9: de'i phyir bdag cag gis ji ltar blang bar bya zhes ma blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-10: dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-12: blang bar bya zhing blangs nas rung bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-14: dge slong dag tshon rtsi dang shing dang zangs dang bum pa dag tshol ba na lam gyis dub cing sgyid lug pa dang don mthun dang bral bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-17: tshom rkun pa dag gis bgrod par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-18: dge slong rnams kyis skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-20: mtha' chag gam rang chag byas te 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-21: nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-23: ba lang gi lci ba btsir bas rung bar bya ba'am bkru bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-24: de lta na'ang nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:113b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-1: phun tshar yang gcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-2: ngas phongs pa dag tu rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de gnas skabs tha mal pa dag tu lhag par spyad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-3: lhag par spyod par phyed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-5: de'i tshe na dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-6: de dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos ma rnyed pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du 'phags pa dang; de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-7: tshe dang ldan pa chos gos kyis rnyed pa ma thob kyi bar du khyod ma rings shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-8: de mngon par mi dga' bas mi sdod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-9: de la dge slong zhig gis ras yug chen byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-10: des gal te 'di rung bar byed na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag mi mthong bar 'gyur bas dge slong bshes pa zhig la rung bar byed du gzhug go snyam du shes nas des dge slong bshes pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-11: kho bo tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la lta ba'i bar du ras yug chen 'di rung bar gyis la gtur bur chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-12: de le lo can zhig pas des rung bar ma byas pa kho nar gtur bur bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-13: ji tsam na dge slong des gtor bu thogs te 'phags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114a-14: mthar gyis sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-0: 'phags @114b pa khyod la sho gam gzhal 'tshal ba'i rdzas cung zad mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-3: des bzhag nas des brtag par brtsams pa dang ras yug chen mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-4: 'phags pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung na ji ltar ras yug chen gyi slad du brdzun du smra ba gsung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-6: bzhin bzang kho bos mi shes te kho bo 'phags pa na ras yug chen 'di rnyed nas kho bos bshes pa la kho bo tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la lta ba'i bar du ras yug chen 'di rung bar gyis la gtur bur chug cig ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-7: de le lo can zhig pas des 'di rung bar ma byas pa kho nar gtur bur bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-9: 'phags pa de ni khyod kyi bshes pa ma lags kyi 'di ltar de ni bdag gi bshes pa lags te des na bdag la sho gam byung gis stsol la bzhud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-10: dge slong de 'gyod pa skyes nas de mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-11: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-12: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so; ;'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-13: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-15: tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-17: tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir de skad zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-18: des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-19: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:114b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-0: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med @115a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-2: yang dge slong gis ma dris par blang bar mi bya bar ci khyod kyis rung bar byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-3: 'on te ma byas zhes dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-4: ma dris par len na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-6: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-7: dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni rkang pa spre'u zhag gis bskus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-8: 'gro na yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-9: 'ong na yang glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-11: yu bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-12: gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa 'thob pa dang skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-13: yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyis yu bu cag kyang 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-15: gang du don mthun 'grub par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-16: de dag gis don mthun btsal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-17: de dag gis byang lam du 'gro ba'i don mthun mthong nas de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-18: bzhin bzang dag khyed gang du 'phags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-20: bzhin bzang kho bo cag kyang khyed dang lhan cig 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-21: 'phags pa dag byang lam ni mtho dman can khyi za ba bud med kyi yul gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115a-22: khyed cag der dges par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-0: bzhin bzang dag gal te de @115b lta bu yin du zin kyang yul mthong bar 'gyur bas 'dong bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-1: 'phags pa dag gal te de lta na tshur spyon bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-2: drug sde dag don mthun de dang lhan cig byang lam du 'phags nas mthar gyis byang lam du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-3: nyi ma gang kho na la byang lam du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-4: de dag nang par sngar langs te lam srang du 'dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-5: tshong pa de dag gis drug sde dag mthong nas de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-7: khyed cag mngon par mi dges par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-8: bzhin bzang dag nyi ma gang kho na la byang lam du phyin pa'i nyi ma de nyid la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-10: khyed la dang po kho na nas byang lam ni mthon dman can khyi za ba bud med kyi yul gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-11: khyed cag der dges par mi 'gyur ro zhes ma bgyis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-12: bzhin bzang dag ci de lta na 'gro'am 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-13: 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis zong ma bsgyur te; de lta lags mod kyi 'on kyang bdag cag dang bshes pa'i tshong pa gzhan dag mchis pa de dag gis zong bsgyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-14: de dag la gtad par bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-15: de dag dang thabs cig bzhud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-16: drug sde dag gis smras pa de ma nongs kyi de bzhin bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:115b-17: drug sde dag don mthun de dag gis gtad pa'i don mthun de dang lhan cig 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-0: drug sde dag gis kun tu spyod pa ni rdul gyis 'jigs pas @116a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-1: yang na ni don mthun gyi mdun du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-2: yang na ni phyi nas 'gro bas de dag phyi nas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-3: ji tsam na yul dbus nas phyir 'ong ba'i don mthun 'ongs nas tshong pa de dag gis tshong pa don mthun phyir 'ongs pa de dag la 'ongs pa legs so zhes brjod pas so sor yang dag par dga' bar byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-5: yul dbus nas so; ;shes ldan dag ji ltar yul dbus su khe spogs mang po grub bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-6: sho gam mam la gcan nam gru btsas kyis yongs su yi chad pa med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-8: shes ldan dag yul dbus su khe spogs mang po grub mod kyi 'on kyang de na gos dkar po can chom rkun pa lta bu sho gam dang la gcan dang gru btsas kyi lce rten gyis bden pas mi mgu ba dag 'khod pas rdzas thams cad 'phrog par byed pas sho gam dang la gcan dang gru btsas kyis yongs su yi chad pa yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-9: de dag gis thos nas 'tsher zhing phyogs gcig tu dong nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-10: drug sde dag lhag nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-11: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-12: tshong pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-13: 'phags pa dag bdag cag grang ba na grang bas sbrebs bzhin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-14: tsha ba na tsha bas gdung bzhin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116a-15: bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis gnod bzhin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-0: sha sbrang dang sbrang bu dang rlung dang @116b nyi ma dang sdig sbrul gyi reg ba dag gis nyen bzhin du longs spyod dag mngon par sgrub pa'i slad du spro bar bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-2: rtsol par bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad bdag cag yul dbus su 'phags pa lags te yul dbus su khe spogs mang po 'grub pa lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-3: 'on kyang bdag cag gi don mthun slar mchi ba dag las thos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-4: de na gos dkar po can chom rkun pa lta bu sho gam dang la gcan dang gru btsas kyi lce rten gyi bden pas mi mgu ba dag 'khod pas rdzas thams cad 'phrog par bgyid pas sho gam dang la gcan dang gru btsas kyis yongs su yi chad par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-6: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-7: bzhin bzang dag gang dag la kho bo cag bshes su bdog pa khyed kyang sems khong du chud cing 'khod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-9: khyed kyis bdag cag gi slad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-10: rgyal po la gsol ba bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-11: bzhin bzang dag rgyal po la ni gsol bar mi byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-12: 'on kyang mnyan yod ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-13: de la sgo ni bco brgyad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-14: sge'u chung ni sum cu rtsa drug yod pas khyed cag sge'u chung nas 'jug tu gzhug gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-16: tshong pa de dag yongs su mgu nas 'phags pa dang mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba'i ri brags shig tu phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:116b-17: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-0: bzhin bzang dag re zhig ngal bsos la mnyan @117a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-1: yod du mtshan mo 'jug par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-2: rnga mo dang glang dang bong bu dag thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-3: tshong ba de dag gis de dag btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-4: ji tsam na nyi ma nub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-5: dus yin no zhes re zhig ngal bso bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-6: mnyan yod na sho gam pa dag gis byang lam nas don mthun phun sum tshogs pa 'ongs so zhes thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-7: de dag gis gnod sbyin la gtor ma byas te sgo dag mnan te sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-8: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-9: shes ldan dag mig lam chad kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-12: yongs su mi shes par sge'u chung nas bde bar 'jug tu gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-13: de dag 'phags te mthar gyis bong bu dang rnga mo dang glang dag 'debs shing sge'u chung nas mnyan yod du zhugs nas mtshan mo nam langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-14: srang du dong ste byang lam pa'i zong bkram nas btsongs par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-15: mi zhig don mthun de nyid dang bral ba sgo nas zhugs pa sho gam pa dag gis mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-18: ri brags che ge mo zhig nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-20: kye nang rje ri brags de na byang lam pa'i don mthun 'dug ces grags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-21: khyod kyis de ma mthong ngam; mi des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-22: shes ldan dag kho bo ni don mthun de nyid dang bral zhing 'gro ba yang yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117a-23: de ni sngar song zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-0: sho gam pa dag gis thos nas yid mi bde bar gyur te smras @117b pa; kye nang rje kho bo cag sgo gnon cing 'khod na de ga las zhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-2: shes ldan dag gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na tshur shog srang du 'dong dang rang nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-3: de dag de dang lhan cig srang du dong ba dang don mthun dag byang lam pa'i zong bkram zhing 'tshong ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-5: shes ldan dag khyed cag gang gis zhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-6: don mthun dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-8: sho gam pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-9: khyed cag ji ltar rkang pa dag gis zhugs par lta kho bo cag gis kyang shes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-10: 'di ltar khyed cag gang gis 'jug tu bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-11: sgo gang nas zhugs pa de 'dris smros shig dang khyed cag dang bshes par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-12: don mthun dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-13: 'phags pa drug sde dag gis sge'u chung nas 'jug tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-14: sho gam pa de dag sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-15: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-16: gang la da ltar gzhan gyi 'tsho ba la yang gnod par byed do zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-18: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; dge slong gis gzhan gyi 'tsho ba la gnod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:117b-20: gnod par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-0: sho gam pa dag gis drug sde 'di dag ni dge sbyong mi srun pa dag @118a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-1: yin pas do bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-2: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-3: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-4: sho gam pa zhig gis mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-6: lhung bzed na cung zad mchis sam gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-9: lhung bzed na sho gam gzhal dgos pa'i rdzas med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-11: 'phags pa sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-12: bdag de snyam mi sems kyi 'di ltar bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa cung zad mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-13: de khyod las bslangs te 'tshal snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-15: bzhin bzang ci chu klung rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'bab bam; khyod kyis kho bo la sbyin par bya ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-16: kho bos khyod la sbyin par bya ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-19: tshur spyon khyim du bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-20: sho gam pa des nye dga' khyim du khrid nas bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-21: 'phags pa bdag la bka' stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-22: bka' bzhin bgyid cing; 'phags pas bka' stsal pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118a-23: nye dgas bzhin bzang khyod nad med par gyur cig ces smras te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-0: drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni @118b 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-1: rgol ba dag tshar gcad par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-2: rang gi grags pa bsgrag par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-3: rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bya'o zhes yang na ni sgo drung du btsug [*gtsug] lag khang nod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-4: yang na ni lam dang nye bar gtsug lag khang nod par byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-5: nye dgas lam dang nye bar gtsug lag khang mnos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-6: de de'i steng du nam gyi cha stod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-7: nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson par gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-8: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gtsug lag khang dang ha cang thag mi ring ba nas 'dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-9: nye dga' sgra la mkhas pas des de dag gi rting sgra thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-10: yongs su g-yo ba dang bcas bzhin du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-12: tshong pa de dag cang mi smra par sdod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-13: nye dga' myur ba myur bar gtsug lag khang gi steng nas babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-14: tshong pa de dag gi drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-15: shes ldan dag mtshan mo nor dang bcas pa kho nar 'dong ba 'di dag su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-16: tshong pa de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-17: 'phags pa bdag cag ni tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-18: nye dgas smras pa bkren pa dag kho bo cag la rgyal po yo byad thams cad kyis nye bar gnas pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:118b-19: gnas brtan kun shes ko'u di n+ya yang de la 'di skad ces ji nas kyang rgyal po 'di'i longs spyod ma byung ba dag ni 'byung bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-0: byung ba dag ni rgyas pa dang @119a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-1: 'phel ba dang yangs par gyur cig ces yon bshad pa byed pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-2: khyed cag de dbang ba'i sho gam dral te 'dong na kho bo cag gis ci'i phyir yal bar dor bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-3: deng khyed la gnod pa byed du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-4: de dag skrag nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-5: 'phags pa khyed ni thugs rje can dag lags pas bzod par mdzod cig dang bdag cag gis 'phags pa la mkho ba dag bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-6: nye dgas smras pa ci zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-7: bca' ba'i cha ba rin dag dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-11: de dag de nas dong ste nye dga'i drung nas bral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-12: 'di skad ces yu bu cag ko sa la ra byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la yang sho gam mi 'jal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-13: dge sbyong mgo reg nye dga' la 'jal ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes kun tu brjod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-14: nye dga' yang myur ba myur bar zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-15: sgo drung na lhung bzed 'khru zhing phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-16: gzhon nu zhig gis nye dga' phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar byed pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-18: gnas brtan ci'i slad du phan tshun rnam par gzigs pa mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-20: tshe dang ldan pa kho bo'i mdza' bshes tshong pa dag zong thogs te mnyan yod du zhugs pa de dag lta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119a-21: gzhon nu des smras pa; gnas brtan khyod ji tsam na zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa de tsam na de dag dong lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-0: nye dga' mi bzod pa skyes nas kho bo yang de dag gis bslus te spu gri la khu tshur gyis brdegs shing rang thags @119b kyi rdo la rtsvas phug gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-1: kho bos de dag la gang bya ba shes so snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-2: ji tsam na tshong pa de dag yang de kho na bzhin du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-3: nye dgas kyang de kho na bzhin lan gnyis su bzung ste khyed kyis kho bo yang bslus so zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-4: tshong pa de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-5: 'phags pa bdag cag la bgyi ba cung zhig byung bas des na bdag cag ma zhus par mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-6: da ni de dang gzhan yang thams cad 'bul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-10: de dag de dag de nas dong ste nye dga'i drung nas bral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-11: 'di skad ces yu bu cag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la yang sho gam mi 'jal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-12: dge sbyong mgo reg nye dga' la 'jal ba lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes kun tu rjod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-13: nye dgas tshong pa de dag gis bdag la mang po zhig khas blangs pas yang de kho na bzhin du mi lta bar song na mi rung gis mtshan ma dang bcas pa kho nar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-14: de dag gi drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas des snam sbyar bgos te srang du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-15: tshong pa de dag kyang zong bkram ste 'tshong bar byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-16: nye dgas de dag la mtshan ma brtan par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-18: 'phags pa je zong bsgyur bar bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-20: bdag cag mchis te dbul bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:119b-24: 'phags pa khyod ni 'da' bar bgyi ba ma lags kyis bzhud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-0: myur ba myur bar gtsug lag khang du song nas @120a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-1: zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-2: lhung bzed 'khru zhing phyogs su rnam par lta bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-3: de bzhin du gzhon nu zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-4: gnas brtan ci'i slad du phan tshun rnam par gzigs par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-6: tshe dang ldan pa kho bo'i mdza' bshes tshong pa dag zong thogs te mnyan yod du zhugs pa de dag lta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-8: gnas brtan khyod ji tsam na zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa de tsam na de dag dong lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-9: nye dga' rgya cher mi bzod pa skyes nas mgo bsigs te kho bo de dag gis lan gnyis su bslus kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-10: da ni gal te de dag mthong na gang gis phyin chad tshong par mi 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i khrims 'char gzhug go snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-11: ji tsam na yang tshong pa de dag de kho na bzhin du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-13: shes ldan dag khyed kyis yang dang yang du kho bo bslus pas da ni gang bya ba de ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-16: bdag cag tshong pa dag ni rtag tu 'jal tshongs kyis sems g-yengs pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-17: da ni sngar mchid kyis 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-18: slad kyi mchid kyis 'tshal ba gang lags pa de dang gzhan thams cad kyang dbul bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120a-19: nye dgas gal te 'di dag la gzu lums su 'jug par byas na shes par 'gyur gyis mthun par brjod par bya'o snyam du shes shing rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-0: bzhin @120b bzang dag nges par 'bul lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-2: gal te de lta na khyed cag la nyes dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-3: kho bo cag la yang gtsug lag khang gi drung du tshong pa dag tshong pa ma yin par rnam par gzhag par gyur na ma legs kyis re zhig lam lta ba de srid kyi bar du sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-4: de dag sdod pa dang nye dga' de na sho gam pa dag gi drung du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-5: de'i tshe na sho gam pa dag shes ldan dag tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gis sho gam dral cing dral cing sge'u chung nas 'jug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-8: rgyal po ni gtum pas bdag cag bu dang chung ma dang rtsa lag dag dang bcas pa btson rar bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-9: gsad par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do zhes zer zhing sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-10: de dag de ltar sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa na nye dgas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-11: khyed cag ci'i phyir 'di ltar sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-12: 'phags pa ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-13: tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gis sho gam dral cing dral cing sge'u chung nas 'jug pas lo thang 'du ba mi 'byung la dus la ni bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-15: bdag cag bu dang chung ma dang rtsa lag dag dang bcas pa btson rar bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:120b-16: gsad par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-0: bkren pa dag khyed cag sus sho gam gyi @121a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-2: khyed cag ni lcag rgod mang pos brims las skyed pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-3: shing 'chag tu gzhug par bya ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-4: ci'i phyir khyed kyis tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba gcig tsam yang nor thams cad dang bral bar mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-5: 'phags pa mnyan yod ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-6: nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ma lags pas ji ltar nor thams cad dang bral bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-7: bkren pa dag mnyan yod ni nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can yin gyi kun shes pa'i sho gam can ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-8: 'phags pa bdag cag gis yun de srid du sho gam bsgrubs na lan 'ga' yang nyes pa bgyid pa'i sho gam can ma lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-9: da ji ltar nyes pa bgyid pa'i sho gam can du 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-10: bkren ba dag sdod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-11: nga song la tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gtang bar byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-12: de dag khyed kyis zung la nor thams cad dang bral bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-13: gal te mnyan yod ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can yin gyi nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ni ma yin no zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-14: mnyan yod ni nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can yin gyi kun shes pa'i sho gam can ni ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-15: gal te yun de srid du kho bo cag tshong pa'i tha snyad byed pa na lan 'ga' yang mnyan yod nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ma yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121a-16: da nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-0: tshur shog tshong pa'i tshogs kyi nang du @121b 'dong ngo zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-1: rgyal po'i pho brang du bkri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-2: gal te rgyal po na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-3: shes ldan dag yun de srid du nga'i rgyal srid byed du bcug na lan 'ga' yang ngas mnyan yod nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du ma thos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-4: da nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du gyur tam zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-5: rgyal po aa ra da tshangs byin tshong pa'i tshogs dang bcas pas gang skyed mos tshal lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-7: lha'i gnas che ge mo nas mnyan yod du 'jug pa de la ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-10: lha'i gnas che ge mo nas mnyan yod du 'jug ba de la nyes pa byed ba'i sho gam can yin no zhes khrims su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa gang lags pa de lha la btsan nam zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-11: gal te btsan no zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-12: lha mdzod che ge mo zhig na sgrom mchis pa de na zangs ma'i glegs bu la yi ge bris pa mchis pa de lhas gzigs su gsol zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-13: ji tsam na sho gam pa de dag gis tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba de dag bzung ste nor thams cad dang bral bar byas pa na tshong pa de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-14: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir kho bo cag nor thams cad dang bral par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-15: mnyan yod ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can yin gyi nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-16: sho gam pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-17: mnyan yod ni nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can yin gyi kun shes pa'i sho gam can ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:121b-18: tshong pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-1: bo cag tshong pa'i tha snyad byed byed na lan 'ga' yang mnyan yod nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can ma yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-2: da nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-3: tshur shog tshong pa'i tshogs kyi nang du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-4: sho gam pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-5: tshong pa'i tshogs kyi nang du mi 'gros /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-6: tshur shog rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo zhes de dag 'khang bzhin du mthus rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-7: de dag gis tshong pa'i tshogs la shes ldan dag kho bo cag sho gam pa dag gis nor thams cad dang bral bar byas kyis grogs gyis shig ces ra mda' bzlog pa'i skad phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-8: tshong pa'i tshogs kyang de dag dang lhan cig rgyal po'i spyan sngar song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-9: lha khyod kyi rgyal srid la sho gam pa dag gis tshong pa glo bur du lhags pa dag nor thams cad bral bar bgyis kyis yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-10: rgyal pos blon po rnams la shes ldan dag sho gam pa dag khug cig ces bsgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-11: blon po rnams kyis sho gam pa dag pa bkug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-13: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir khyed kyis tshong pa dag nor thams cad dang bral bar byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-14: sho gam pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-15: lha tshong pa 'di dag ni sho gam 'dral ba lags la mnyan yod ni nyes pa bgyid pa'i sho gam can lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122a-16: de'i slad du bdag cag gis 'di dag nor thams cad dang bral bar bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-0: shes ldan dag yun de srid du nga'i rgyal srid byed du bcug na lan @122b 'ga' yang ngas mnyan yod nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du ma thos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-1: da nyes pa byed pa'i sho gam can du gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-2: sho gam yang dag pa long la thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-3: sho gam pa dag gis smras pa; rgyal po aa ra da tshangs byin tshong pa'i tshogs dang bcas pas gang skyed mos tshal lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-5: lha'i gnas che ge mo nas mnyan yod du 'jug pa de la ni kun shes pa'i sho gam can yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-8: lha'i gnas che ge mo nas mnyan yod du 'jug pa de la ni gnod pa byed pa'i sho gam can yin no zhes khrims su bya ba rnam par gzhag pa gang lags pa de lha la btsan nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-10: shes ldan dag nga'i yab kyis mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brgya byin gyis mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-11: tshangs pas mdzad pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-13: sho gam pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-14: lha mdzod che ge mo zhig na sgrom mchis pa de na zangs ma'i glegs bu la yi ge bris pa mchis pa de lhas gzigs su gsol; rgyal pos gtogs par byas bdag la zangs ma'i glegs bu de 'on cig ces bsgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-16: rgyal pos pha'i bsngags pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-17: mchi ma dang bcas pa'i skad kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:122b-18: shes ldan dag nga'i yab kyis mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni brgya byin gyis mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-0: tshangs pas mdzad pa yin te gal te nor thams cad dang bral bar @123a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-2: tshong pa de dag re ba med par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-3: mchi ma dang bcas pa'i skad kyis dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-4: de dag gis sho gam pa de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-5: shes ldan dag khyed la sus sbran pa smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-6: sho gam pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-7: kho bo cag la su zhig sbran par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-8: kho bo cag nyid kyis shes mod kyi 'on kyang kho bo cag khyed la snying rje bas yal bar bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-9: khyed cag ha cang bya ba byed par brtsams pas des na kho bo cag mi bzod pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-10: tshong pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-11: khyed la snying rje ga la yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-12: smros shig dang kho bo cag khyed dang mdza' bor 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-13: sho gam pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-14: 'phags pa drug sde dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-15: tshong pa de dag sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-16: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-17: gang la da ltar gzhan gyi 'tsho ba la yang gnod par byed do zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-19: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-21: dge slong gis gzhan gyi 'tsho ba la gnod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-22: gnod pa byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-24: rkang med dang ni rkang gnyis dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-25: rkang bzhi pa dang rkang mangs kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-26: sde tshan yang dag bsdus pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-27: rkang med ces bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123a-30: srog chags dre'u srin dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-0: de dag ni @123b gsum gyis sogs par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-1: sbrul khas bsdigs pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-2: rgyal po'i sman pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-3: kha lungs pa'i yab na dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-4: ji ltar sbrul khas bsdigs pa dag gis she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-5: 'di ltar sbrul khas bsdigs pa dag sbrul la brten te 'tsho bar byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-6: de ltar sbrul khas bsdigs pa dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-7: ji ltar rgyal po'i sman pa dag gis she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-8: 'di ltar rgyal po'i sman pa dag pad pa la brten te 'tsho bar byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-9: de ltar rgyal po'i sman pa dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-10: ji ltar kha lungs pa'i ya ba na dag gis she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-11: 'di ltar kha lungs pa'i ya ba na dag srog chags dri'u srin dag bag bye son par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-12: sa 'byin par byed cing sla nga la rngo bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-13: de dag de 'cha' zhing myos pa 'gyur ba'i btung ba rnam pa du ma 'thung bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-14: de ltar kha lungs pa'i ya ba na dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-15: dge slong gis srog chags rkang med dag rku bar byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-16: srog chags rkang med dag gi rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-17: dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-18: rkang gnyis zhes bya ba ni mi rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-20: mi rnams ni rnam pa gsum gyis rku ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-24: ji ltar yul phyogs kyis she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:123b-25: gang gi tshe na kho bo skyed mos tshal lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-0: lha'i gnas che ge mo zhig tu mthong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis bya ba de byas par shes par gyis shig @124a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-2: de ltar yul phyogs kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-4: gang gi tshe kho snga dro'am gung tshigs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-5: phye ma bred mthong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis bya ba de byas par shes par gyis shig ces bya ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-7: ji ltar mtshan mas she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-8: gang gi tshe kho bo skra dang kha spu bregs nas ring por ma lon pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-10: zha nye'i dbyar 'dab kyis glan pa'i lhung bzed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-12: zhun mar gyi lhung bzed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-15: bu ram gyi dbu ba'i lhung bzed thogs par mthong ba de'i tshe khyod kyis bya ba de byas par shes par gyis shig ces bya ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-17: dge slong gis mi rku bar byed na mi'i rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-18: dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-19: bya ni rnam pa gnyis kyis rku ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-21: mngon sum du babs pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-22: ji ltar spar bas she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-23: 'di ltar dge slong gis bya spar te rku bar byed na bya'i rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-24: dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-26: ji ltar mngon sum du babs pas she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124a-28: bya ba'i slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis bya drungs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-0: @124b chud gzan par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-1: tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir nags mes btang bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-2: de na bya kha cig du bas khyab cing 'khrugs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-3: dge slong rnams kyi 'chag sa dag tu babs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-5: sgo khang dag tu babs par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-6: dge slong gis de ltar babs pa'i bya rku bar byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-7: bya'i rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-8: dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-9: de ltar mngon sum du babs pas so ////

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-25: ji ltar khyu nas dgar bas she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-26: dge slong gis glang po che khyu nas dgar bas rku bar byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-27: ji srid mig sngar snang ba de srid du nyes pa sbom por 'gyur la /
