K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-31: de ltar khyu nas dgar bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-32: ji ltar brtod pas she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:124b-33: dge slong gis glang po che brtod pa sna tshogs shing ljon pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-2: ji srid mig sngar snang ba de srid du nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-3: mig sngar mi snang bar gyur na brkus par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-4: rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos bo tshang na pham par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-5: dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-7: glang po che la ji lta ba bzhin du rta la sogs pa rkang bzhi pa lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin no; ;rkang mangs zhes bya ba ni grog ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-9: til dang phub ma dang rul ba za ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-13: de dag ni gsum gyis sogs par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-15: grong khyer srung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-16: rgya mtsho'i tshong ba dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-17: ji ltar gnod byed dag gis she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-18: 'di ltar gnod byed dag gis srog chags rkang mngas dag gis bum pas so btang ba bkang ste 'jog par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-19: de dag gis gang gi tshe chad pas gcad pa dag khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-21: lag pa bum pa de dag gi nang du 'jug par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-22: de dag de dag gis zin pa na myur du dpya dang gsug mang po 'jal bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-23: de ltar gnod byed dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-24: ji ltar grong khyer srung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag gis she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-25: 'di ltar grong khyer srung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag gis srog chags rkang mangs dag gis bum pa so ma btang ba bkang ste 'jog par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125a-26: de dag gis gang gi tshe pha rol kyi dpung 'ong ba de'i tshe de dang lhan cig g-yul sprod par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-0: gal te de dag @125b gis 'joms par nus na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-1: gal te mi nus na srog chags rkang mangs dag gis bkang ba'i bum pa so ma btang ba ra ba la gnas pa 'phen par byed cing de dag srog chags rkang mangs dag gis zin pa na 'byer bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-2: de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i sna chen po la gtogs pa dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-3: ji ltar rgya mtsho'i tshong pa dag gis she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-4: 'di ltar rgya mtsho'i tshong pa dag gis srog chags rkang mngas dag gis bum ba so ma btang ba bkang ste rgya mtsho'i gru sbyar nas nor sgrub pa dag rgya mtsho chen por rgal ba na der de dag la chom rkun pa rtags mtshan sngon po'am nag po can dag 'ong zhing gru 'joms par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-5: tshong pa dag gis de dag dang lhan cig g-yul sprod par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-6: gal te de dag gis 'joms par byed nus na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-7: gal te mi nus na srog chags rkang mngas dag gis bkang ba'i bum pa so ma btang ba 'phen par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-8: de dag srog chags rkang mngas dag gis zin pa na 'byer bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-9: de ltar rgya mtsho'i tshong pa dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-10: dge slong gis srog chags rkang mangs dag rku bar byed na srog chags rkang mangs dag gi rin thang brtsi bar bya zhing dngos po tshang na pham par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-11: dngos po ma tshang na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-13: gdol pa dang ni bag rdzangs can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-14: snam sbyar re zhig dus dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-15: mtshan bzang dang ni nor gyis byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-16: rang gir shes pas lhung bzed len //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-17: mi pham dang ni zla bas sbas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:125b-18: bdag nyid sun 'byin rku ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-2: mnyan yod na dge slong gdol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-3: bag rdzangs can zhes bya ba gtam 'dre ba phebs par smra ba 'grogs bshes smos 'drin gnas skabs mnyam par spyod pa gnyis shig 'khod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-4: de la gdol pa ni grags pa dang bsod nams che ba yin mod kyi lus chung ste de la lhung bzed dang chos gos dang 'dra ba dang phor bu dang ska rags lhag pa dag yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-5: bag rdzangs can ni lus che ba yin mod kyi grags pa dang bsod nams chung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-6: chos gos gsum lhur len cing de'i chos gos gsum ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-7: dge slong rnams kyis bag rdzangs can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-8: tshe dang ldan pa khyod te bor 'dod pa chung bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-9: ci'i phyir bdag nyid gcer bur ston par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-12: bag rdzangs can gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-17: dge 'dun spangs te su zhig kho bo la sbyin par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-19: khyod kyi gtam 'dre ba phebs par smra ba 'grogs bshes smos 'drin yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-20: de la lhung bzed dang chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bu dang ska rags lhag pa dag yod na ci'i phyir de la mi slong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-21: bag rdzangs can gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126a-23: ci khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' bslangs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-0: ci chu'i @126b sgra kho nas lham dag 'bud par byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-1: song la slong shig dang ster ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-2: bag rdzangs can de dge slong de dag gis spro bar byas nas gdol pa'i gan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-3: gdol pa med nas bag rdzangs can gyis gdol pa ni lus chung ba yin pas ji 'di'i chos gos gzhal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-4: gal te bdag gi lus kyi tshad du 'gyur na bslang bar bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-6: ci'i phyir de drin bgrang du gzhug par bya snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-7: bag rdzangs can gdol pa'i gnas khang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-8: snam sbyar lta bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-9: ji tsam na chos gos kyi gdang la snam sbyar dmar ser 'dug pa mthong nas bag rdzangs can gyis phog ste gyon zhing bsnyams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-10: ngos dang ngos la rtog par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-11: gdol pa 'ongs te mthong ma thag tu smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-12: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis snam sbyar 'di rku sems kyis blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-13: bag rdzangs can gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-14: tshe dang ldan pa kho bos rku sems kyis ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-15: 'di ltar kho bo la gdol pa ni lus chung ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-16: je 'di'i chos gos gzhal par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-17: gal te bdag gi lus kyi tshad du 'gyur na bslang bar bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-18: gal te mi 'gyur na yo byad don med pa 'dis ci bya snyam pa'i blo skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-20: tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir gzhan nas gzhan du 'phro bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-21: khyod kyi rku sems kyis blangs pas khyod la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:126b-22: bag rdzangs can bdag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-2: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-4: dge slong khyod kyi bsam pa ji lta bus snam sbyar de bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-5: bag rdzangs can gyis ji ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-7: dge slong dag dge slong dpyod pa'i bsam pa can 'di la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-8: yang dge slong gis yid gcugs pa ma yin pa la yid gcugs pa bskyed par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-9: 'di ltar mdza' bshes ni gsum ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-10: tha ma dang 'bring dang chen po'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-11: 'di la mdza' bshes tha ma la ni yid gcugs pa chung bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-14: mdza' bshes 'bring la ni yid gcugs pa chung ngu dang 'bring bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-16: mdza' bshes chen po la ni yid gcugs pa chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po yang bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-17: dge slong gis yid gcugs pa ma yin pa la yid gcugs pa skyed par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-19: mnyan yod na dge slong mtshan bzang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-20: nor gyis byin zhes bya ba gtam 'dre ba phebs par smra ba 'grogs bshes smos 'drin mtshungs par 'don pa gnyis shig 'khod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127a-21: mtshan bzang gi lhung bzed ni mdzes pa gsal ba zlum pa longs spyod bzod pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-0: @127b nor gyis byin gyi lhung bzed chung ngu yang mdzes pa gsal ba zlum pa longs spyad bzod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-1: de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-2: 'chags na lhung bzed 'khru ba'i tshe mtshan bzang gis nor gyis byin dbang ba'i lhung bzed chung ngu rang gi lhung bzed du bcug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-3: tshe dang ldan pa nor gyis byin gang la lhung bzed dang lhung bzed chung ngu 'di lta bu bdog pa de ni snying las chung ngu dge ba'i phyogs spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-4: nor gyis byin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-5: gal te thob na khyer shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-6: ji tsam du gzhan zhig na nor gyis sbyin la ri brags shig tu bya ba cung zhig byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-8: tshe dang ldan pa mtshan bzang kho bo la ri brags shig tu bya ba cung zhig byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-9: kho bo'i bya ba de byed pa de la kho bos lhung bzed chung ngu sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-14: mtshan bzang gis thabs kyis yin no zhes byas nas bdag la gzhi 'dis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mtshan bzang ni gla rngan gyis las byed do zhes zer bar 'gyur ro snyam nas 'gyod pa skyes te ma song ngo; ;ji tsam du gzhan zhig na mtshan bzang la ri brags der bdag nyid kyi bya ba zhig byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-15: des song la de gnyi ga byas te phyir 'ong ngo snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-16: mtshan bzang song ste gnyi ga byas nas phyir 'ongs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-17: tshe dang ldan pa nor gyis byin kho bos khyod kyi dgos pa de bsgrubs kyis lhung bzed chung ngu byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:127b-18: nor gyis byin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-0: khyod bdag nyid kyi dgos pa la song ba yin @128a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-1: gyi kho bo'i dogs pa la song ba ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-4: gal te mi sbyin na kho bo rang nyid kyis blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-6: ji tsam na nor gyis byin phyir byung ba de na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-7: mtshan bzang gis lhung bzed chung ngu blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-8: rang gi lhung bzed du bcug ste bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-9: ji tsam na nor gyis byin 'ongs pa na lhung bzed chung ngu mi snang nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-10: tshe dang ldan pa kho bo'i lhung bzed chung ngu sus blangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-15: nor gyis byin gyis spyos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-16: khyod kyis rku sems kyis blangs pas khyod la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-17: mtshan bzang bdag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-18: des skabs de dge dge slong rnams la brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-19: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan bzang la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-21: dge slong khyod kyis bsam pa ji lta bus lhung bzed chung ngu de blangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-22: des ji ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-24: dge slong dag dge slong rang gir 'du shes pas lhung bzed chung ngu blangs pas 'di la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128a-25: yang dge slong gi gla rngan gyi las mi bya bar 'di ltar lag pod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-0: dge slong gis gla rngan gyis @128b las byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-2: mnyan yod na dge slong mi pham dang zla bas sbas zhes bya ba gtam 'dre ba phebs par smra ba 'grogs bshes smos 'drin gnyis shig 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-3: zla bas sbas ni grags pa dang bsod nams che ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-4: de la lhung bzed dang chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bu dang ska rags lhag pa dag yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-5: mi pham ni grags pa dang bsod nams chung ste chos gos gsum lhur len cing de'i chos gos gsum ngan cing snam sbyar yang yongs su rnyings pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-6: dge slong rnams kyi mi pham la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-7: tshe dang ldan pa khyod te por 'dod pa chung bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-8: ci'i phyir bdag nyid gcer bur ston par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-14: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun spangs te su zhig kho bo la sbyin par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-15: dge slong zla bas sbas de khyod kyi gtam 'dre ba phebs par smra ba 'grogs bshes smos 'drin yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-16: de la lhung bzed dang chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bur dang ska rags lhag pa dag yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-17: ci'i phyir de la mi slong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-20: ci khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' bslangs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-22: ci chu'i sgra kho nas lham dag 'bud par byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:128b-23: song la slongs shig dang ster ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-0: @129a *// mi pham de dge slong de dag gis spro bar byas nas zla bas sbas kyi gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-1: tshe dang ldan pa zla bas sbas bdag la lhung bzed byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-2: zla bas sbas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-5: gal te lhung bzed mi sbyin na chos gos byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-6: zla bas sbas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-7: ci kho bo khyod kyis khyim bdag mgo reg tu mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-8: khyod la kha tshar yang yongs su mi gtang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-9: chos gos lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-11: kho bo 'di'i 'phral gyi bya ba thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-12: 'di de skad ces kha tshar yang khyod la yongs su mi gtang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-13: chos gos lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes zer ro snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-15: deng gos thams cad ma phrogs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-16: mi pham zhes bya ba'i ming mi bzung ngo zhes mi pham de nam zhig na 'di'i chos gos dag rku bar bya snyam du skabs tshol zhing de lhur len bzhin du sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-17: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na zla bas sbas la btso blag gi las nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-18: mi pham de zla bas sbas kyi drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-19: tshe dang ldan pa zla bas sbas kho bos kyang grogs bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-20: zla bas sbas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-21: ma nyes kyis de bzhin gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-22: mi pham de zla bas sbas kyi chos gos dag 'tsheng par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129a-24: 'dren par byed cing bzlog cing bzlog cing rtog par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-0: zla bas sbas kyis 'di 'di ltar lta bas bdag gi chos gos dag bzlog cing bzlog cing rtog par byed pa las na @129b gdon mi za bar bdag gi chos gos 'di dag rku bar byed do snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-1: zla bas sbas dogs pa dang bcas pas chos gos dag kha bsgyur nas gtur bur bcug ste de dag sngas su bcug nas nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-2: dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par spyod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-4: tshe dang ldan pa zla ba sbas tshur shog dge ba'i phyogs byed du 'dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-5: zla bas sbas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-7: kho bo ngal bas phyi bzhin 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-8: mi pham pa tshe dang ldan pa shog cig ces zer te phyir byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-10: gal te 'gro na ni chos gos dag brlag par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-11: 'on te mi 'gro na ni bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-12: gang gi phyir bdag gi chos gos dag kyang brlag par mi 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-13: dge ba'i phyogs kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i thabs ci yod snyam du sems shing rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-14: bdag nyid kyi gtur bu mi pham gyi sngas su bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-15: mi pham dbang ba'i gtur bu bdag nyid kyi sngas su bcug nas nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-16: dge slong dag gis nam gyi cha smad la kha ton bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-17: zla bas sbas kyis mi pham la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-18: tshe dang ldan pa mi pham longs la dge ba'i phyogs spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-20: kho bos dge ba'i phyogs byas zin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-21: da khyod song la dge ba'i phyogs spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-22: kho bo ngal ba ngal sos so zhes zla bas sbas dge ba'i phyogs kyi ched du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:129b-23: mi pham gyis re zhig dus ni snang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-1: dus yin nam ma yin snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-2: dus bzang po mthong ba dang des zla bas sbas kyi snga nas bdag nyid kyi gtur bu khyer te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-3: ji tsam na mtshan mo nam nangs par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-4: des re zhig gos ci 'dra ba dag gis bdag pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung ba blta'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-5: ji tsam na bdag nyid kyi rnyang rnying dag mthong nas yid mi bde bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-6: bdag nyid kyi chos gos dag kho nas bdag pham par gyur gyis lcags kyi thu lum 'cha' bas ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-8: des yang je bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-9: gal te skal pa yod par 'gyur na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-10: 'on te skal pa med na ni phyir 'babs so snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-11: de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-12: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor gyi mdun na chos ston pa'i phyir bzhugs shing chos ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mi pham thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-14: gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-15: dge slong dag khyer gyis thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba'i dge slong de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130a-17: dge slong dag mi pham mi gti mug can 'di ni rang gi chos gos rnyang rnying dag gis nyes pa sbom po'i ltung ba byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-0: dge slong dag de ltar rku sems la ni nyes @130b dmigs 'di dang gzhan dag kyang yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-1: de'i phyir dge slong gis rku sems kyis rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang blang bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-2: dge slong gis rku sems kyis rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos len na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-4: snam sbyar 'phyang bar gyur pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-5: bgam phyir 'bru mar slong ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-6: khyim bdag bu dang tsha bo dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-7: lha 'bangs pi li da yi bu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-9: mnyan yod na dge slong ma shar nas skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-10: lho nas skyes pa gnyis shig 'dug ste; shar nas skyes pa ni mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-11: lho nas skyes pa ni phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-12: de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing spyan sngar song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis la chos bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-15: de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-16: shar nas skyes pa mdun du 'gro ba de'i snam sbyar phrag pa la gyon pa 'phyang bar gyur nas lho nas skyes pa phyi bzhin 'ong bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-17: 'phags ma aa ba sa tha aa ba sa tha /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-18: shar nas skyes pa de chos kyi shugs thob pas mi sems pas snam sbyar lhung bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-19: lho nas skyes pas blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:130b-20: des 'di ltar bdag gis de phul na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-1: su nyams par 'gyur bas dbyar khang du phyin nas dbul bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas de gnyis dbyar khang du son pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-2: shar nas skyes myur ba myur ba kho nar gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-3: gtsug lag khang du zhugs te skyil mo krung phyed kyis 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-4: lho nas skyes pas gal te phul na nyes dmigs de kho na bstab par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-5: re zhig phyis langs pa la dbul lo snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-6: des snam sbyar de rang gi gnas khang du khyer te chos gos kyi gdang la bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-7: ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig na mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-8: shar nas skyes pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-9: gzhon nu ma snam sbyar khyer shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-11: gzhon nu ma de gnas khang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-12: chos gos kyi gdang la bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-15: 'phags ma snam sbyar ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-16: shar nas skyes pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-17: lho nas skyes pa'i gnas khang du ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-18: gzhon nu ma de lho nas skyes pa'i gnas khang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-19: chos gos kyi gdang la snam sbyar bzhag pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-20: mthong nas kyang sus 'phags ma'i snam sbyar 'di 'dir khyer snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-21: lho nas skyes pas thos nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-23: ci'i phyir lho nas skyes pas ji ltar gyur pa de la go bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131a-24: dge slong ma de de la nang dang bcas pas gshe zhing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-0: khyod kyis rku sems kyis @131b rang gi gnas khang du bcug ste bzhag pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-1: khyod la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-2: lho nas skyes pa'i dge slong ma de bdag la yang dag pa kho nar pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-3: des skabs de dge slong ma rnams la brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-4: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-6: dge slong ma khyod kyis aa ba sa tha zhes brjod pa ci'i tha tshig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-7: btsun pa yul dbus na nar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-8: lhung ba gang lags pa de la bdag cag aa ba sa tha zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-10: dge slong dag dge slong ma 'di la ni skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-11: yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-12: ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig gis ltung ba med mod kyi; 'on kyang nyes dmigs gang yin pa de thams cad gzhan gyi dngos po lhung ba yun ring du 'chang ba las gyur pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-13: de lta bas na dge slong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-14: dge slong mas gzhan gyi dngos po lhung ba yun ring du bcang bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-17: dge slong mas gzhan gyi dngos po lhung ba yun ring du bcang bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-18: dge slong zhig gis gzhan gyi dngos po lhung ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-19: 'di dge slong che ge mo zhig gi yin no zhes ngo shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:131b-20: dge slong de'i gnas khang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-1: khad kyis sgo gtan la brdungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-2: dge slong de ting nge 'dzin las langs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-5: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dngos po lhung ba 'di kho bos mthong gis longs zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-7: tshe dang ldan pa kho bo la dngos po de ma byin par len pa dag gis brkus par gyur pa ni bla'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-8: kho bo khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma bzang po 'di 'dra ba las bslang ba ni ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-9: dge slong de bdag la dge slong ting nge 'dzin las bslang bas ltung ba dang bcas par ma gyur tam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-10: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-12: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-13: yang dge slong gis dge slong don de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin las bslang bar mi bya bar 'di ltar de'i mngon sum du gzar thag la btags te gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-14: dge slong zhig gis gzhan gyi dngos po lhung ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-15: des 'di dge slong che ge mo zhig gi yin no zhes ngo shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-16: des de khyer te dge slong de'i drung du song nas tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi dngos po lhung ba 'di kho bos mthong gis long zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-17: dge slong de de la nang dang bcas pa yin pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132a-18: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis 'di lhung ba mthong ba ma yin gyi 'di ltar khyod kyi rku sems kyis brkus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-0: dge slong de bdag ltung ba dang bcas par ma gyur tam snyam @132b du 'gyod pa skyes par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-1: des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-2: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-4: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-5: 'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong gi yo byad lhung ba mthong na dge skos la gtad par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-6: dge skos kyis kyang nyi ma gnyis sam gsum du dge 'dun gyi nang du brim par bya zhing gal te ngo shes pa yod na de gtad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-7: gal te med na dge 'dun gyis ci bder bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-9: mnyan yod na dge slong ma ri ma zhes bya ba dgra bcom pa rnam par rgyal bar bya ba las rnam par rgyal ba zhig 'dug pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-10: spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig mngon par dad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-11: des de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-12: 'phags ma khyod la ci dang ci 'tshal ba de'i slad du bka' stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-13: thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-14: des kyang bzhin bzang aa rog gya de ltar bya'o zhes dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-15: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong ma ri ma na bar gyur nas bsod snyoms la ma song zhing dge slong ma dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-17: de dag la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:132b-18: 'phags ma dag 'phags ma ri ma re zhig mi gda' na gar bzhud zhu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-4: 'phags ma de la bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-5: des bdag la lan 'ga' yang cung zad kyang ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-6: de'i slad du gal te de la 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig mchis na spyon la snyoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-8: bzhin bzang aa rog gya de bzhin bya'o zhes smras te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-9: des de bzhin lan gsum gyi bar du bstabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-10: de na gzhon nu ma zhig gis spos 'tshong gi khye'u 'di yang dang yang du stobs par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-11: ci 'di'i yang dag par stobs pas stobs par byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-12: 'on te rtog pas stobs par byed pa bgam par bya'o snyam du bsams nas des de la 'phags ma ri ma la 'bru mar dgos so zhes lhung bzed chung ngu phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-13: des de nyid la 'phral la btsir ba'i 'bru mar gyis lhung bzed chung ngu bkang ste byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-14: 'phags ma gal te yang de la 'tshal ba cung zad mchis na spyon la snoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-16: bzhin bzang aa rog gya de ltar bya'o zhes smras te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-17: des 'bru mar de dge slong ma ri ma'i lag pa'i bsku mnye dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-19: mgo dang lus kyi bsku mnye dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-20: mar me'i 'bru mar du spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133a-21: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong ma ri ma nad sos te bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang spos 'tshong gi khye'u des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-0: 'phags ma ha cang yun ring @133b zhig mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-2: bu bdag bro 'tshal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-3: 'phags ma bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-4: khyod kyis lan 'ga' yang cung zad kyang bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-5: 'di ltar 'phags ma gcig cig mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-6: 'phags ma ri ma la 'bru mar 'tshal lo zhes mchi nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-7: bdag gis de nyid kyi sug par 'bru mar 'phral la btsir bas lhung bzed chung ngu bkang ste stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-9: aa rog gya ma nongs so zhes smras te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-10: bsod snyoms brgyus te dbyar khang du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-12: gzhon nu ma khyed kyis kho mo'i ming gis spos 'tshong gi khye'u che ge mo zhig las lan cig 'bru mar blangs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-13: gzhon nu ma des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-14: 'phags ma bdag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-15: des lan gsum gyi bar du 'phags ma ri ma la bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-16: des bdag la lan 'ga' yang cung zad kyang ma bslangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-17: gal te 'phags ma la 'tshal ba cung zad mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-18: spyon la snoms shig ces mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-19: bdag la 'di yang dang yang du stobs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-20: ci 'di yang dag par stobs pas stobs par bgyid dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-21: 'on te rtog pas stobs par bgyid pa bag ma mo snyam pa'i bsam pa byung nas bdag gis de la 'phags ma ri ma la 'bru mar 'tshal lo zhes lhung bzed chung ngu phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:133b-22: des 'bru mar gyi lhung bzed chung ngu gtams te stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-0: bdag gis de 'phags ma'i phyag dang zhabs dang dbu dang sku'i bsku mnye @134a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-1: dang zhugs mar gyi 'bru mar du spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-3: ci kho mos khyod la lan 'ga' zhig de'i gan du song la 'bru mar khyer te shog cig ces smras sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-4: lan 'ga' yang bka' ma stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-5: de la nang dang bcas pa'i dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-6: 'phags ma ci 'di 'ba' zhig tu bas snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-7: 'dis 'phags ma ri ma rgyur bgyis te mnyan yod thams cad khyab par bgyis pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-8: pham par gyur pa dag gis lto gang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-9: dge slong ma de bdag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-10: des skabs de dge slong ma rnams la brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-11: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-12: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma de la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-14: dge slong ma khyod kyis bsam pa ji lta bus 'bru mar blangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-15: bcom ldan 'das bgam pa'i bsam pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; dge slong dag dge slong ma bgam pa'i bsam pa can 'di la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-18: dge slong mas nad pa la ma dris par sman sbyor du gzhug par mi bya bar 'di ltar dge 'dun gyi nad pa'i sman khang nas bslang bar bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134a-19: 'on te dad pa can las sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-0: nye du mang ba nyid yin na yang gang sbyor du gzhug ces nad pa la dri bar bya zhing des gang brjod pa de las @134b blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-1: dge slong ngam dge slong mas nad pa la ma dris par sman sbyor du bcug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-4: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-5: mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-6: de'i tshe na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag klog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-7: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag klog pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-8: mthong nas kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-9: khyim bdag khye'u dag ci klog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-10: 'phags pa slad rol gyi bstan bcos dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-11: khyim bdag phyi rol gyi bstan bcos dag ni lcags kyi se'u dang 'dra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-12: rtogs par dka' zhing rtogs na yang de dag gis nges pa la 'jug par yang mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-13: zag pa zad par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-14: sangs rgyas kyi bkar ni thog ma dang bar dang tha mar dge ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-16: rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-17: mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:134b-19: 'phags pa sus de klog tu stsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-1: go ;'phags pa ma nongs kyis klog tu stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-2: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-3: khye'u de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-4: khye'u dag 'phags pa'i drung du rgyal byed kyi tshal du deng la sangs rgyas kyi bka' klogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-5: khye'u de dag nyi ma re re zhing rgyan gyis klubs te khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag gis yongs su bskor nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-6: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la sangs rgyas kyi bka' bklag par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-7: mnyan yod na ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can zhes bya ba chom rkun pa dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni de dag dgag dbye byas ma thag tu shes ldan dag bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-8: des btsal mi dgos par lo bskor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-9: de dag la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag nyi ma re re zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-10: rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag gis bskor nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong zhing 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po las sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par byed kyis lam gyi bar du bsdad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-11: de dag bzung na 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos ni khye'u dag khyim na 'khod do snyam du shes la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135a-12: khyim bdag gis kyang 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i drung na 'khod do snyam du shes pas gal te khye'u dag dbrog par nus na ni bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i bar gyi 'tsho ba yod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-0: ji ste ma nus na rgyan @135b dbrog par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-1: des kyang bdag cag brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i blo skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-2: de dag brda byas te lam gyi bar du dong nas 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-3: khye'u de dag kyang rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-4: chom rkun pa de dag gis khye'u de dag khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-5: khye'u de dag gi phyi bzhin khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag 'dong ba de dag gis khye'u de dag chom rkun pa dag gis brkus pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-6: de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du brgyugs te sbran pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-7: khyim bdag khyod kyi sras bu dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-8: ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis brkus kyi; thabs dgongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-9: khyim bdag mgon med zas byin brgyugs te ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi gan du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-10: lha bdag gi bu dag ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis phrogs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-11: bu'i slong mo stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-12: rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal bu gzhon nu 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-13: song la khyim bdag gi bu rnams dang chom rkun pa dag myur du khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-14: 'phags skyes po yun ring po nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nang dang bcas par gyur pas de'i mod la ma song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:135b-15: de nas lha gang dag tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la mngon par dad pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-0: khyod kyi nye gnas dag ston zla tha chung gi @136a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-1: g-yon can dag gis phrogs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-3: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gal te khye'u dag la ma bsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-4: re zhig khye'u dag pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing pha ma dag kyang bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-5: ma dad pa dag gis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur zhing dad pa rnams kyang 'di ltar dong ngo cog ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gi 'phrog par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-6: phyin chad su zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes gzhan du gyur pa nyid du 'gyur gyis bdag gis rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par bya'o snyam du bsams shing rig nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-7: 'phags skyes po'i dpung mngon par sprul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-8: phyogs bzhir rnga pa ta ha brdungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-9: ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis shes ldan dag bdag cag dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos phyogs bzhi nas bskor gyis zin par gyur na mi rung gis bor la 'dong ngo snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-10: de dag gis khye'u de dag bor te byer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-11: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir brtul nas lam dang nye bar shing ljon pa'i drung du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-12: khye'u de dag kyang 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136a-13: 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-0: khye'u dag khyed cag gar @136b dong dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-1: 'phags pa bdag cag ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis brkus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-4: khye'u dag de ring khyed cag gi pha ma dag yid mi bde bar 'khod kyis deng la sang lhogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-5: khye'u de dag khyim du 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-6: dmag dpon 'phags skyes po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che ba'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-9: dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te mnyan yod nas byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-10: 'phags skyes pos khye'u de dag mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-11: khye'u dag khyed cag gar dong dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-13: rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-14: bdag cag ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis brkus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-15: 'o na khyed cag sus thar bar byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-17: 'phags skyes pos bdag da ltar 'gro bas bdag gis ji ltar 'di dag thar bar byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-18: 'phags pa rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba 'ga' zhig gis 'di dag thar bar byas gor ma chag snyam du bsams shing rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-19: khye'u ngag khyed cag gis phyogs de na su mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-20: 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-21: 'phags skyes po des 'di dag thar bar byas kyi; gzhan su zhig gis nus snyam du bsams shing rig nas yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:136b-22: bdag cag gi yul na 'phags pa de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba 'tshe 'di'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-2: tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don la skyabs mdzad pa bzhugs pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed do; ;de bsngags pa brjod cing mnyan yod du 'jug pa na drug sde dag kyang phyir 'byung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-3: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-8: 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis phrogs pa thar par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-9: bkren pa dag kho bo cag de 'dra yang 'on kyang 'di na la la byi bo gcer bu dag la mngon par dad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-10: gal te gcer bu dag gis mthong bar gyur du zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-11: de dag gis lam yang nye bar bstan par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-12: de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-13: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-14: dga' bo nye dga' de dag la go bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-15: don nyung ngu la ltung ba byung gis dong la 'chags su bzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-16: drug sde dag gtsug lag khang du dong ste zas kyi bya ba byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-18: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-19: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-21: tshe dang ldan pa dag aa rog gya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137a-22: gnas brtan je skabs phye shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-0: ltung ba sde lnga po @137b dag la skabs phye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-1: gnas brtan gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu dag ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis phrogs pa thar bar bgyis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-2: de bzhin te thar par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-3: gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan go bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-4: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong bar mdzad cing bzhugs par 'tshal gyis bdag cag gis thugs rje phyogs gcig pa dang ldan zhing nye gnas la thugs rje bar mdzad la ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag la thugs rje bar mi mdzad par ma 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-5: gzhan dag gis bdag gir bgyis pa'i nor dag thar par bgyis pa'i ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du slar mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ltung ba ma mthong ba'i phyir gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes gsungs kyis khang skyong su snang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-9: 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o zhes khang skyong gi gan du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-11: tshe dang ldan pa gand'i rdungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-13: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du phyir mi byed pas de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-14: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed cing bstan pa la chos kyi sgyu thabs kyis mi mthun pa 'ga' mi 'byung ngam zhes kun tu spyod pa'i chos rmed par byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:137b-15: des khang skyong la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-0: tshe dang ldan pa su zhig yongs su gnas @138a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-2: gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-4: gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-6: gnas brtan su yang mi bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-7: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin slar mi bgyid pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-8: de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i slad du gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-9: tshe dang ldan pa dge slong gnas brtan la mtho ma 'tsham par 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-11: mkhyen pa dang shes bya dag la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-12: the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa yin gyis de'i gan du song la zhus shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyed cag la ji skad lung ston par mdzad pa de de bzhin du zungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-14: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la rmas pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138b-1: phyin chad su zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes gzhan du gyur pa nyid du 'gyur gyis /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:138b-8: mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing mag pa'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-4: 'phags pa sus de klog tu stsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-5: kho bos klog tu gzhug go ;'phags pa ma nongs kyis klog tu stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-6: mag pa des khye'u de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-7: khye'u dag 'phags pa'i drung du 'od ma'i tshal du deng la sangs rgyas kyi bka' lhogs shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-10: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu las sangs rgyas kyi bka' bklag par brtsams so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-12: des brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-13: de dag la 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu'i tsha bo dag nyi ma re re zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-14: rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag gis bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-15: 'od ma'i tshal du 'dong zhing 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu las sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog par byed kyis lam gyi bar du bsdad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139a-16: de dag bzung na 'phags pa pi lin da'i bus ni khye'u dag khyim na 'khod do snyam du shes la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-2: des kyang bdag cag brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i blo skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-3: de dag brda byas te lam gyi bar du dong nas 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-4: khye'u de dag kyang rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-5: chom rkun pa de dag gis khye'u de dag grur bcug ste khyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-6: khye'u de dag gi phyi bzhin khye'u mngag gzhug pa dag 'dong ba de dag gis khye'u de dag chom rkun pa dag gis brkus pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-7: de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i mag pa'i drung du brgyugs te sbran pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-9: bram ze yang brgyugs te ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i gan du song nas smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-11: song la bram ze'i bu rnams dang chom rkun pa dag myur du khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-12: ma skyes dgra yun ring po nas bram ze de dang nang dang bcas par gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-13: de'i mod la ma song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:139b-14: de na lha gang dag tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la mngon par dad pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-1: ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-2: mthong nas kyang lag pa dang rkang pa dag bkrus te stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go ;de nas ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-3: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-5: rang nyid kyis ral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-7: rgyal po chen po rab tu byung ba ni rang nyid kyis byed pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-8: bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba yin pas gzhan su zhig byed par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-9: 'phags pa gal te de lta na bdag gis 'phags pa la zham ring ba dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-10: rgyal po chen po aa rog gya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-11: de bzhin lan bzhi'i bar du smras nas lan lnga pa la yang de kho na skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-12: bdag gis 'phags pa la zham ring ba dbul lo zhes zer ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-13: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i lhan cig gnas pa bden pa dang mthun pa dang ngo zlog phod par smra ba zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-14: rgyal po chen po gang tshun chad nas rgyal po chen pos mkhan po la zham ring dag gis bstabs pa nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143a-15: mkhan pos gal te gtsug lag khang 'di yal bar bor du lags na da tsam ngos rdib par yang gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-1: bdag cag gis yang dang yang du khas blangs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-2: rgyal po chen po lan cig tu ma bas kyi 'di ltar 'di ni lan lnga pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-3: rgyal po de brjed ngas pas rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni gang yang rung ba la cung zad khas blangs pa ci yang rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-4: de thams cad phyi na 'dug pa'i mis yi ger 'dri bar byed pas rgyal po des mi de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-5: kva'e nang rje kho bos yang dang yang du khas blangs pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-7: 'di ni lan lnga pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-8: de lta na kho bo chad pa'i las la thug gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-9: kho bos 'phags pa la zham ring pa lnga brgya dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-10: des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-11: 'phags pa la zham ring pa lnga brgya phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-12: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-13: rgyal po chen po kho bo rang gi g-yog nyid spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-14: rab tu byung ba la g-yog dag gis ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-15: 'phags pa dge 'dun gyi don du bzhes shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-16: rgyal po chen po gal te de lta na bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-17: 'phags pa de ma nongs kyis zhus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-18: skabs de tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-19: bcom ldan 'das la zhus par gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-21: dge 'dun gyi don du g-yog dag blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-22: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus g-yog de dag blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-23: g-yog de dag yang dang yang du rgyal po'i pho brang du las byed du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:143b-24: de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-0: 'phags pa bdag cag 'phags pa dag gi zham ring par phul @144a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-1: ba ni bdag cag glo ba dga' na ci'i slad du bdag cag yang dang yang du rgyal po'i pho brang du sug las bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-2: bzhin bzang dag 'khrug longs ma byed cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-3: kho bos rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-4: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-5: ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang tshe dang ldan pa bi lin da'i bu'i drung du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-7: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-8: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-9: rgyal po chen po khyod dge 'dun gyi don du g-yog dag phul bas 'gyod par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-10: 'phags pa bdag la 'gyod pa 'ga' yang ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-11: 'o na ci'i phyir g-yog de dag yang rgyal po'i pho brang du las byed du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-12: rgyal pos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-13: shes ldan dag 'phags pa rnams kyi zham ring ba dag phyin chad rgyal po'i pho brang du las byed du ma gzhug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-14: blon po rnams kyis gang yang rung ba dag la rgyal po'i pho brang du las gyis shig ces bsgo ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-16: bdag cag 'phags pa dag gi yin no zhes zer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-17: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-18: lha gang la yang mchid stsal bar rngo ma thog ste; gang yang rung ba dag la rgyal po'i pho brang du sug las tshol cig ces bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144a-19: de dag bdag cag 'phags pa rnams kyi lags so zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-0: song la thams @144b cad las byed du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-1: de dag thams cad yang rgyal po'i pho brang du las byed du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-2: de dag gis yang tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-3: 'phags pa bdag cag yang de kho na bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang du sug las bgyid du stsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-7: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-8: ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang de kho na bzhin 'ongs pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-9: rgyal po chen po ci lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-10: khyod kyang 'gyod pa skyes par gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-12: g-yog dag yang de kho na bzhin du las byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-13: 'phags pa gang la yang mchid stsal par rngo ma thog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-14: gang yang rung ba la mchid stsal ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-15: de dag bdag cag 'phags pa dag gi lags so zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-16: ae ma 'phags pa dag gi lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa logs shig tu brtsig tu stsal na 'di dag ni rgyal po'i 'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-17: 'di dag ni 'phags pa dag gi'o zhes 'tshal bar 'gyur ro; ;tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus don de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:144b-21: de lta bas na lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa brtsig tu 'jud par rjes su gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-0: dge slong dag gis gnas gang du lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa brtsig tu 'jug pa mi shes @145a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-3: rgyal po'i pho brang gi phyi rol dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-4: 'od ma'i tshal gyi phyi rol gyi bar gang du skad kyis bos pa thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-5: dge 'dun gyi don sgrub par 'gyur ba der lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa brtsig tu gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-6: dge slong rnams kyis zhang blon dag la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs 'dir lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa brtsig tu chug cig ces bka' stsal gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-8: de khyed cag gis shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-9: zhang blon dag gis rgyal po'i khab tu dril gyi sgra sgrog tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-10: gang dag 'phags pa rnams kyi zham ring pa yin pa de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi phyi rol dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-11: 'od ma'i tshal gyi phyi rol gyi bar du 'dug par chad kyis deng la der sdum pa rtsigs shig ces bsgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-12: de dag der dong ste sdum pa brtsigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-13: lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa brtsigs nas de dag gtsug lag khang du dong ste las byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-14: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la las 'di ni rung ba yin gyis khyed kyis bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-15: 'di ni rung ba ma yin gyis khyed kyis mi bya'o zhes las bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-16: de dag las rung ba byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-17: lha 'bangs lha 'bangs zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-18: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba skyong bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-19: rtse rgod rtse rgod ces bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145a-20: de dag thams cad gtsug lag khang du 'jug pas klag cor gyi sgras dge slong dag gis sems rtse gcig pa nyid mi 'grub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal @145b pa; ji snyed dag gis las 'grub pa de snyed 'jug par bya'i thams cad mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-1: dge slong dag gis de dag thams cad la zas dang gos sbyin par byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; gang dag las byed pa de dag la zas dang gos sbyin par bya'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-4: dge slong rnams kyis de dag na ba yal bar bor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-6: gang dag na ba de dag la zas dang gos sbyin par bya zhing bsnyen bkur yang bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-7: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-8: nye dga' dge skos byed pas des lha 'bangs de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-9: bzhin bzang dag kho bo dge skos byed kyis khyed cag nang par sngar shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-10: rgyal po'i khab na ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can zhes bya ba chom rkun pa dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni de dag dgag dbye byas ma thag tu shes ldan dag bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na des brtsal mi dgos par lo bskor du longs spyod cing bde bar gnas par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-11: de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig 'dug pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-12: shes ldan dag 'phags pa dag gi g-yog gang dag grong khyer gyi phyi rol na 'khod pa de dag gzhom par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:145b-14: re zhig de dag gi jo bo gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sgo 'phar brgya snyed bzla ba byas kyang lto khengs pa 'grub par dka' bas de dag la yang cung zad kyang med na de dag gi g-yog de dag lta lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-1: slong gi rgyus shes pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-2: shes ldan dag khyed mi shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-3: de dag ni zan gzhan las za zhing rang gi las rjes su bsgrub pa de lhur len te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-4: thabs du ma dag gis nor sgrub par byed pas de dag la gang yod pa de ni grong khyer 'di na yang med kyi cung zhig gzhom par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-5: de dag gis brda byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-6: dong nas de dag gzhom par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-7: de nas lha gang dag tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la mngon par dad pa de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-9: khyed kyi zham ring ba dag ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis 'joms par 'gyur gyis brtson par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-10: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus gal te g-yog dag la ma bsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-11: g-yog dag kyang re zhig nor dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-12: ma dad pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-13: dad pa rnams kyang 'di ltar sbyin par bya ba'i chos byin pa dag yongs su skyong bar mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-14: phyin chad su zhig sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la sbyin pa dang bya bar sems zhes gzhan du gyur pa nyid du 'gyur gyis rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par bya'o snyam du bsams shing rig nas tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-15: lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa de lcags kyi ra bas bskor to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146a-16: chom rkun pa dag gis rkun rdzas thogs te 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-0: lcags @146b kyi ra ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-1: de dag gis phan tshun kun tu 'gro bar brtsams na lam ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-2: de dag gis rkun rdzas bor te 'phags pa dang lcags kyi ra ba de yang mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-3: de dag gis yang rkun rdzas blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-4: lcags kyi ra ba de yang yang phyir byung ste lan bdun gyi bar du de ltar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-6: shes ldan dag 'phags pa rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba 'ga' zhig gis 'di dag la dgongs pa 'dra'i rkun rdzas bor la 'bros par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-7: de dag gis rkun rdzas phyogs gcig tu bor te bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-8: lha 'bangs de dag sad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-9: shes ldan dag bdag cag bcom mo; ;bdag cag bcom mo zhes ku co 'don zhing de dag nor dang bral ba las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba dang ldan zhing thams cad 'dus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-10: lha 'bangs kyi sdum pa kun tu byul bar brtsams pa dang; phyogs gcig na rdzas thams cad spungs te bzhag pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-11: de nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-12: rang rang gi rdzas de blangs nas khyim khyim du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-13: de dag gis so so'i khyim srung ba bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-14: gnyid log pa na lha des de dag gi rmi lam du sbran pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-15: shes ldan dag khyed cag ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis ma bcom pa 'di thams cad ni 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu'i mthu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:146b-16: de nas mtshan mo nam langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-0: shes ldan dag lhas rmi lam du khyed cag ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis ma bcom @147a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-2: 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu'i mthu yin no zhes bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-3: de ni de kho na bzhin yin gyi gzhan du na 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig bdag cag la snying rje bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-4: de'i tshe de dag byi dor byas la phyis gtsug lag khang du 'dong zhes de dag khrus byas shing gos dkar po dang dri dang phreng ba brgyus brgyan te; byi dor byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-5: gtsug lag khang du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-6: nye dga' yang nang par sngar langs nas lde mig dang lde mig kyog po thogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-7: gtsug lag khang gi sgo phye ste mar me'i kong bu bsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-8: gtsug lag khang du chag chag dang byug pa byas te gnas mal bshams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-9: mchod rten gyi 'khor sar bdug spos brims nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-10: khang steng du 'dzegs te gand'i rdung zhing phyogs bzhir rnam par blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-11: des de dag gos dkar po dang dri dang phreng ba brgyus brgyan pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-12: de 'di dag nor can dag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-14: ded dpon gtsug lag khang ltar 'ong ba su zhig yin snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-15: gang gi tshe mchod rten gyi 'khor sar zhugs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-16: des de dag ngo shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-17: nye dgas gshe zhing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-18: ngas khyed cag la sang nang bar sngar shog cig ces ma bsgo 'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147a-21: 'phags pa gal te bdag cag la 'phags pa pi lin da'i bus ma dgongs su lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147b-0: @147b bdag cag deng kho nar ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gis tshul ma lags pas sdug bsngal bsgrubs par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147b-1: nye dgas gshe zhing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147b-2: khyed cag re zhig gang gi mthus snyem pa de la yang je khrims bca' bar bya'o zhes rig nas drug sde dag sbran te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:147b-3: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bu ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-5: kye sems can khyod tshur spyon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-6: khyod kyis bdag cag las gang chad pas gcad par bya ba yang chad pas chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-7: phan gdags par bya ba la yang phan thogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-8: bdag cag gi zhing dag las ci 'byung ba de las kyang bdag cag gis khyod la chos dang mthun pa'i thog shas dbul lo zhes smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-9: de ltar skye bo mang pos bkur zhing skye bo mang pos bkur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-10: de mang pos bkur ba mang pos bkur ba zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-11: zhing rnams kyi bdag po dang smas pa las skyob par byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-12: rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-13: tshul khrims kyi spyod pa kun tu spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-14: shes rab kyi spyod pa kun tu spyod pas chos kyi skye dgu dga' bar byed pas rgyal po rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-15: dge slong dag 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i dang po rtsom pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-16: de yang chos kyis yin gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-18: de la chos ni 'di yin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-20: dge slong dag bram ze'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i dang po rtsom pa gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:156b-21: dge slong dag de nas sems can kha cig gis yongs su 'dzin pa ni nad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-0: @157a *// yongs su 'dzin pa ni zug rngu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-1: yongs su 'dzin pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba'o zhes bya bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-2: grong nas dgon pa'i gnas su dong ste yal ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-3: lo ma'i spyil po dag byas nas gnas bcas te 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-4: de dag dgongs kar yang dgongs ka'i zas 'dod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-5: grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-7: nang par gyi zas 'dod pas grong du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-8: de nas sems can gzhan dag 'di snyam du shes ldan 'di dag gis 'di ltar yongs su 'dzin pa ni nad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-10: yongs su 'dzin pa ni zug rngu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-11: yongs su 'dzin pa ni sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba'o zhes bya bar rig nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-14: grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-15: nang par yang nang par gyi zas 'dod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-16: grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157a-17: de dag la te por sbyin pa dag bya bar sems so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157b-2: rig byed dag sbyor bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157b-3: de nas de las sems can kha cig gis bsam gtan de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157b-4: rab tu dben pa de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157b-5: gsang sngags kyi gzhung de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157b-6: rig byed sbyar ba de mngon par rdzogs par ma rtogs pa na yang phyir dgon pa nas grong mthar lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:157b-7: khang khyim sgo bzhi pa dag brtsigs nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:158a-4: las kyi gnas dag la brtson pa dag la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:158a-11: dge slong dag chos nyid kyis na dkyil 'khor gsum po dag 'jig rten du byung bas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:158b-18: 'dis de'i tshe yang 'jig rten skyon med cing chu bur med pa la de'i dang por 'di lta ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:158b-23: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:158b-25: 'dod chags spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:158b-26: zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:158b-27: gti mug spang ba'i phyir 'bad par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:158b-28: dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:158b-30: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-0: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ni ltung ba med @159a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-1: do; ;pham par 'gyur ba gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-4: pham par 'gyur ba gsum pa'i spyi sdom la; bran pa dang ni bdag nyid dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-5: dug dang ro langs bsro khang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-7: bran pa dang ni skyong ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-8: mchu can dang ni shi ri ka /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-9: lhung bzed dang ni chos gos dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-10: mngal na gnas dang tshong dpon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-12: mnyan yod na dge slong bran pa dang skyong ba zhes bya ba phan tshun gtam 'dres pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-14: 'grogs bshes smos 'drin mthun par brjod pa gnyis shig 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-15: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na skyong ba na bar gyur nas de'i nad g-yog bran pa byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-16: skyong bas mtshan mo sgra bsgrag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-18: tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba ci'i phyir sgra sgrogs par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-23: tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba rab tu byung ba'i sems nye bar gzhag par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-24: gal te da ltar sman yod du zin kyang re zhig byin len stobs pa yang med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-25: khyod la sman lta smos kyang ci dgos te med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-26: skyong ba de so sor rtog pa mi mnga' ba yin pas de kho bo skom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159a-28: zhes sgra sgrogs bzhin pa las nam nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-1: tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba kho bos sman pa la dris te 'ong gi bar du khyod kyis re zhig so shing 'or cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-2: bran pas sman pa'i gan du song te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-3: bzhin bzang gzhon nu zhig na na de la 'phrod pa'i sman ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-5: 'phags pa dge slong de'i sman ni 'di dang 'di lta bu lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-6: bran pa sman pa'i gan du ji srid song ba de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-7: tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba khri las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-8: sham thabs gyon nas 'dag rdzas dang ri la ba spyi blugs dang so shing thogs te bang rim du byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-9: so shing dor par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-10: de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-11: tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba ci'i phyir mtshan mo te bor sgra sgrogs par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-13: tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo te bor skom pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-15: de nas dge slong zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-16: tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba kho bo la chu'i thug pa yod na ci mi 'thung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-18: ma nongs kyis btung ngo zhes des de 'thungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-19: dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:159b-20: kho bo cag la 'o thug dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:160a-12: tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba ci'i phyir mi za /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:160a-17: skom mo zhes kho bo la mtho btsams na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:160a-19: da khyod dus la bab bo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:160a-21: tshe dang ldan pa bran pa 'di la bag byos shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:160a-23: 'o thug dang zho thug dag 'thungs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:160a-25: sha dang spyan gzigs dag zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:160a-27: tshe dang ldan pa skyong ba khyod kyis de lta byas pa bden nam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:160b-6: bdag de ltar mi mthun pa byed pas bdag gis dug zos pa ni bla'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:160b-7: de ltar mi mthun pa byed pa ni ma yin pas /
