K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-0: bdag de ltar mi mthun pa @161a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-1: byed pas bdag gis dug zos par gyur pa ni bla'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-2: de ltar mi mthun pa zos pa ni ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-3: bdag gis dug za'o snyam pa'i blo skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-4: bdag gi snod du brtag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-5: bar bur snod na dug gi dum bu mthong nas bdag gis de zos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-6: bran pas yi chad pa'i bzhin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-7: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis ma legs pa byas so zhes smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-8: sman pa'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-9: dug de rnon po zhig yin pas gzung bar ma nus te de dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-10: bran pas sman pa khrid de 'ongs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-11: de dus la bab pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-12: bran pa bdag gis 'chir bcug par ma gyur tam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-13: des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-14: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-16: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-17: yang dge slong gis nad pa la gang thos na nad pa 'chi ba'i phyir rtsol bar byed pa de lta bu'i gtam nye bar brjod pas nye bar brjod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-18: dge slong gis nad pa la gang thos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-19: nad pa 'chi ba'i phyir rtsol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gtam nye bar brjod pa nye bar rjod par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-20: 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro; ;'di ni re zhig byung ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' ba mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na @161b rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-1: mnyan yod na dge slong mchu can dang shi ri ka zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-3: phebs par smra ba 'grogs bshes smos 'drin mtshungs par brjod pa gnyis shig 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-4: mchu can ni rngon pa las rab tu byung ba yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-5: shi ri ka ni khyim bdag las rab tu byung ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-6: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na mchu can gyi tsha bo gnyis shig pha ma dang bral bas de dang der 'khyam pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-7: rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin te sgo na sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-8: mchu can phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-9: des de gnyis bzhin gzugs las ngo shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-10: des de gnyis la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-11: khyed gnyis kyi pha ma dag gar dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-14: de nye du la mnyes gshin pas thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-15: mchi ma dang bcas pa'i skad kyis 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-16: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-17: tshe dang ldan pa mchu can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-20: bdag gi tsha bo gnyis yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-21: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-22: ci'i phyir 'di gnyis sdud par mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-24: bdag kyang re zhig dka' bas bsod snyoms sgrub par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-25: 'di gnyis ci zhig gis bsdu bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-26: dge slong dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:161b-27: 'di gnyis 'dod na dge slong rnams la 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang so shing dag 'bul du chug cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-0: dge slong dag gis kyang 'di gnyis la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par @162a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-2: mchu can gyis de gnyis blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-3: de gnyis kyang grims pa le lo med pa sgrub phod pa yin pas dge slong rnams la 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-4: so shing dag 'bul bar byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-5: dge slong rnams kyis kyang de gnyis la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-6: de gnyis gos dang zas bzang po dus yun mi ring bas pags pa dang sha dang khrag rtas shing de gnyis stobs dang snyems pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-7: de gnyis dus gzhan zhig na rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na rtse zhing 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-8: de gnyis kyi nye du dag lag na mda' gzhu thogs shing rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-9: ri dvags shor du 'dong ba de dag gis de gnyis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-13: sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong gi nang 'di na bdag cag gnyis kyi zhang po rab tu byung ba de'i gnas na 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-15: khyed gnyis kyi zhang po de yang re zhig sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong las med pa'i ngang tshul can rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-16: ci khyed gnyis kyang las med pa'i ngang tshul can du byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-18: pha'i las rjes su sgrubs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162a-20: kho bo cag gnyis la zhang pos phan btags pas je de la dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-0: zhes de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa mchu can ga la ba der dong ste phyin @162b nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-1: tshe dang ldan pa mchu can la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-2: zhang po bdag cag gnyis pha'i las rjes su sgrub tu mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-4: kho bos khyed gnyis dad pas sbyin par byas pas bskyed bskyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-5: da ci'i phyir nyes par spyod pa'i las 'di lta bu byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-7: zhang po bdag cag gnyis mgo la gser gyi phreng bas bcings pa ni ngo tsha'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-8: pha'i las rjes su sgrub pas ni de lta ma lags kyis mchi'o zhes de gnyis kyis de'i tshig tshig ma yin par byas te dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-9: de gnyis ri dvags gsod cing 'tsho bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-10: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-11: shi ri ka na bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-12: mchu can de'i nad g-yog byed pa na shi ri ka sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag gis nyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-13: bdag re zhig tshul khrims dang ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-14: bdag yul gzhan du song na lo legs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-15: mtho ris ni dar gyis chod pa tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-16: thar pa ni yol bas bsgribs pa tsam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-17: lus zhig na yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur bas rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid gsad par bya'o snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-18: yang bdag nyid gsod par byed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-19: sdug bsngal ba yin gyis gsod par byed pa zhig btsal lo snyam du sems shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-20: de bdag gi srog gcod bar byed pa su yod snyam du dpyod pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-21: de la mchu can gyi tsha bo gnyis drag shul can lag pa dmar pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-22: bsnun pa dang rab tu bsnun pa la zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:162b-23: gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa gzhan gyi srog gcod du 'jud pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-0: @163a *// gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin pas de gnyis kyi bdag gsod par nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-1: gzhan sus kyang mi nus so snyam pa'i blo skyes shing rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-2: tshe dang ldan pa mchu can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-3: tshe dang ldan pa mchu can khyod kyi tsha bo de gnyis mi snang na gar dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-5: khyod de gnyis kyi ming ma 'dzin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-6: de gnyis ni 'di lta bu'i sdig pa byed pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-7: de gnyis kho bos dad pas sbyin par bya bas bskyed bskyed na de gnyis da nyes par spyod pa'i las bya ba la zhugs shing pha'i las rjes su sgrub par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-9: gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-11: de gnyis la kun nas mnar sems ma skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-12: de ni 'du 'dzi'i rigs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-13: gang gi tshe de gnyis rgyal byed kyi tshal na 'khod pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-14: de gnyis kyis grog spur phra mo'i srog kyang ma bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-15: de gnyis de lta bu dag dang lhan cig gnas pas de lta bu'i nyes par spyod pa dag byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-16: de gnyis de dag dang shin tu dbral bar bya zhing 'di ltar gang gi tshe khyod ga shed du 'gro ba de'i tshe na kho bo srung bar byed pa 'ga' yang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-17: gal te de gnyis snang na kho bo'i gan du thong la de gnyis kho bo srung du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-18: ji tsam na mchu can bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163a-19: de'i tsha bo de gnyis tshong 'dus na sha 'tshong zhing 'dug pa des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-0: de gnyis langs te de'i @163b rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-2: khye'u gnyis kho bo khyed gnyis kyi cir 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-6: de dus de srid du na na khyed gnyis de la ltar ma dong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-7: zhang po bdag cag gis ma 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-9: bdag cag gnyis kyis bgyi ba ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-10: de ci zer ba de bzhin du gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-11: de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa shi ri ka ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-12: de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-14: khye'u gnyis mchu can khyed gnyis kyi cir 'ong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-18: kho bo dus de srid du na na khyed gnyis kyis kho bo lan 'ga' yang ma bltas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-19: zhang po bdag cag gnyis kyis ma 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-20: bdag cag gnyis kyis da gzod thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-21: de'i slad du bdag cag gnyis mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-22: tsha bo gnyis khyed gnyis kho bo lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-23: zhang po bdag cag gnyis gzhan yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'tshal na; zhang po lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-24: tsha bo gnyis gal te de lta na kho bo yul gzhan du song na lo legs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-25: mtho ris ni dar gyis chod pa tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-26: thar pa ni yol bas bsgribs pa tsam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:163b-27: lus zhig na yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur na bdag la rtsom par byed pa sdug bsngal ba yin gyis khyed gnyis kyi kho bo sod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-0: zhang po gal te gzhan 'ga' zhig gis khyod dgrongs par @164a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-1: bgyid na yang bdag cag gnyis kyis de dgum par bgyi na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-2: bdag cag gnyis kyis zhang po dgrongs pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-3: mchu can gyis khyed gnyis la ji skad bsgo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-4: zhang po ci gsung ba de bzhin gyis shig ces so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-5: tsha bo gnyis gal te de lta na kho bo 'di skad zer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-6: kho bo sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen gyis kho bo sod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-7: de gnyis kyis 'di dang zhang po sngar bgros par gyur gor ma chag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-8: des na zhang pos bdag cag gnyis 'di'i gan du btang ngo snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-9: de gnyis las gcig ches drag shul can yin pas mtshon rnon pos de'i mgo bcad nas de'i 'og tu ras kyis g-yogs te 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-10: mchu can yang spyod yul nas phyir 'ongs te des de ras kyis g-yogs pa mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-11: tsha bo gnyis khyed gnyis 'khod bzhin du yang 'di nyal lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-12: zhang po 'di ltar nam yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-13: mchu can gyis 'di gnyis sngon ma byung ba'i tshig smra na dri'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-14: des de gnyis la dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-15: de gnyis kyis skabs de rgyas par mchu can la brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-16: mchu can yid mi bde ba skyes nas ras de bshus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-17: de mthong nas de bdag gis mtshon thogs pa gnyer bar ma gyur tam snyam du 'gyod pa yang skyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164a-18: bshes pa dang bral bas 'gyod pas gdungs pa'i sems kyis yid mi bde bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-0: des skabs de dge slong rnams @164b la rgyas par brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-1: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-3: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-4: yang dge slong gis nad pa'i nad g-yog mi mkhas pa bzhag ste 'gro bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-5: gal te 'gro dgos pa'i rkyen de lta bu zhig byung na nad g-yog mi mkhas pa la gal te 'di mer mchong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-8: bdag nyid g-yang sar mchong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-10: gzhan yang mi 'phrod pa za bar byed na bzlog par bya'o zhes bsgo ste 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-11: dge slong gis nad g-yog mi mkhas pa la ma bsgo bar de bzhin du 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-12: 'di yang byung ba yin gyi re zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-14: mnyan yod na dge slong zhig 'dug pa de'i lhung bzed la btsa' zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-15: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-16: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi lhung bzed 'di btsa' zhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-22: yo byad gzhan yang mang du dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-23: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:164b-25: lhung bzed med pas 'grub par 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-0: kho bo lhung bzed med pas @165a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-2: 'di ltar khang khyim che ge mo zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-3: dge slong zhig nad kyis btab cing sdug bsngal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-4: na tshabs che ba yun mi ring bar dus byed par 'gyur ba de'i lhung bzed gsal ba zlum pa longs spyad par bzod pa de blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-5: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-6: tshe dang ldan pa khyod lhung bzed kyi phyir gdol ba dang 'dra bar drag shul gyi sems 'di lta bu bskyed du rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-7: dge slong de ngo tsha bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-9: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-11: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-12: yang dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi phyir gdol ba dang 'dra bar drag shul gyi sems de lta bu bskyed par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-13: dge slong gis lhung bzed kyi phyir gdol pa dang 'dra bar drag shul gyi sems de lta bu skyed par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-15: gzhan yang dge slong gis lhung bzed mig bzhin du yongs su bcang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-16: glan par 'os pa ni glan par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-17: bsreg par 'os pa ni bsreg par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-18: dge slong gis lhung bzed glan par 'os pa glon par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165a-19: bsreg par 'os pa sreg par mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-0: 'di yang byung ba yin gyi re zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni @165b mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-2: mnyan yod na dge slong zhig 'dug pa de'i snam sbyar rnyings shing dri mas gos la rdol bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-3: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-4: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyi snam sbyar 'di rnyings shing dri mas gos la rdol bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-13: yo byad gzhan yang mang du dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-14: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-16: snam sbyar med pas 'grub par 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-18: kho bo snam sbyar med pas 'grub par mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-19: 'di ltar khang khyim che ge mo zhig na dge slong zhig nad kyis btab cing sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che ba yun mi ring bar dus byed par 'gyur ba de'i snam sbyar nyis rim dmar ser tshon sar pas kha bsgyur ba longs spyod par bzod pa de blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-20: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-21: tshe dang ldan pa khyod snam sbyar gyi phyir gdol ba dang 'dra bar drag shul gyi sems 'di lta bu bskyed du rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-22: de ngo tsha bar gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-23: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:165b-25: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-0: yang dge slong gis snam sbyar gyi phyir gdol ba dang 'dra bar drag shul gyi sems @166a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-1: de lta bu bskyed par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-2: dge slong gis snam sbyar gyi phyir gdol pa dang 'dra bar drag shul gyi sems de lta bu skyed par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-4: gzhan yang dge slong gis snam sbyar pags pa bzhin du yongs su bcang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-5: bkru bar 'os pa ni bkru bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-6: btsem par 'os pa ni btsem par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-7: kha bsgyur bar 'os pa ni kha bsgyur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-8: dge slong gis snam sbyar bkru bar 'os pa 'khru bar mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-9: btsem par 'os pa 'tshem par mi byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-10: kha bsgyur bar 'os pa kha bsgyur bar mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-12: 'di yang byung ba yin gyi re zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-14: mnyan yod na khyim bdag stobs sde zhes bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-15: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-16: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-18: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-19: rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-20: sems can zhugs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-21: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166a-22: btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-0: nyi ma bdun @166b gsum nyi shu gcig tu de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-1: khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-2: nye du rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-3: gang gi phyir khye'u 'di khyim bdag stobs sde'i bu yin pa de'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-4: khye'u sde pa zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming sde pa zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-5: khyim bdag stobs sde de yang rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu zhig btsas nas de'i ming ni nye sde zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-8: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag stobs sde'i chung ma dus la bab nas de de dag gis gos sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag gis khyogs brgyan te dur khrod du bskyal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-9: bsregs te mya ngan bsangs ba byas te 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-10: khyim bdag stobs sdes de'i shid dag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-11: gal te bdag gis chung ma gzhan zhig blangs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-12: khye'u gnyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-13: bdag gis sde pa'i phyi ma dbub par bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-15: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag stobs sde na bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-16: de la rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman dag gis bsnyen bkur byas kyang nad de nye bar zhi bar ma gyur cing nyam dmas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-17: des sde pa dang nye sde gnyis la snying bzhos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-18: bsags pa kun gyi mtha' 'dzad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-19: mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-20: phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:166b-21: gson po'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-0: zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur @167a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-1: to; ;de khye'u gnyis kyis gos sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag gis khyogs spyil brgyan te dur khrod du bskyal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-2: bsregs te de'i 'og tu mya ngan bsangs pa byas nas shid dag byas te 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-4: gang gi tshe bdag cag pha gson pa de'i tshe na ni gzhan gyis srog gso ba byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-5: da ni de'i dus la bab pas khyim gyi bya ba sbyang bar bya dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-6: gal te khyim gyi bya ba dmas pa yal bar bor na nye du rnams kyis khrel bar 'gyur bas bdag zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-7: nye sde la smras pa; nu bo gang gi tshe bdag cag pha gson pa de'i tshe na ni gzhan gyis srog gso bar byed na da ni de'i dus la bab pas khyim gyi bya ba sbyang bar bya dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-8: gal te khyim gyi bya ba dmas pa yal bar bor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-9: nye du rnams kyis khrel bar 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-10: khyod ni 'di nyid na khyim gyi bya ba gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-11: kho bo ni zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-14: sde ba zong mang po thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-15: yul gzhan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-16: des der khe spogs mang po grub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-17: sde pas nu bo nye sde la nu bo kho bos khe spogs mang po grub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-18: ring por mi thogs par 'ong gis brtan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-20: spro ba chen por gyis shig ces spring yig bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167a-21: sde pas phyir zhing yang khe spogs mang po grub nas des phyis kyang de kho na bzhin du spring yig bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-0: yang sde @167b pas phyi phyir zhing yang khe spogs mang po grub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-1: des yang de kho na bzhin du spring yig bskur te sde pa de de bzhin du dus dang mthun pa'i dus su spring yig skur bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-3: gang phyir rnyed pa de phyir chags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-4: rnyed las chags pa skye bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-5: chags pas zil non mi yis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-6: bya dang bya min rtogs mi 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-7: zhes bya ba yin pas sde pa shin tu thag ring por song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-8: phyin chad spring yig skur bar mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-9: de nas sde pa'i chung ma gos dang zas bzang bas nyon mongs pa dag gis gnod par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-10: des nye sde la mtshan ma ston par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-11: nye sdes dbang po rnams phyir bslan te 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-12: sde pa'i chung ma de ngo tsha med par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-16: nye sdes rna ba bkab ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-17: khyod kho bo'i ma dang 'dras phyin chad de skad ma zer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-18: bud med kyi yul ni ma bslabs par mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-19: sde pa'i chung ma de nye du'i khyim du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-20: gos dri ma can dag bgos te khri zhig pa la 'dug cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-21: de la ma dang nang mi dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-23: sde pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-24: ci bud med kyi yul la gang gnod pa de mi shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-25: kho mo nyon mongs pa dag gis shin tu gnod par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-26: de dag gis smras pa khyod kyi skud po nye sde gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin na ci'i phyir de la 'chol bar mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:167b-27: sde pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-3: bud med gzhan gang dag khyim thab dag ches yun ring nas dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-4: dus su ma 'khor ba de dag ches dka' ba byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-5: sde pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-6: de dag la ni khyim thab dag gis dus dang mthun pa'i dus su gtam rmed par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-7: kho mo la yang gang gi tshe khyim thab gson par gyur pa de'i tshe na ni dus dang mthun pa'i dus su spring yig bskur bar yang gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-8: da skur bar mi byed pas dus la bab gor ma chag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-9: de dag gis sde pa'i chung ma de la thabs du ma dag gis yid bzhos kyang khri las ldang bar mi byed cing des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-10: gal te kho mo gzhan la mi sbyin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-11: kho mos nges par rigs gnyi ga la mi snyan pa 'byung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-12: de nas sde pa'i chung ma'i pha ma dang nye du dang rtsa lag gi tshogs dag gis gros bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-13: 'di de ltar zlog tu ma btub pas nges par rigs gnyi ga la mi snyan pa 'byung bar byed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-14: nye sde mgron du bos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-15: zan byin la de la 'di sbyin par bya ba ni 'dir dus la bab pa yin no zhes gros byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-16: de dag gis nye sde mgron du bos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-18: nye sde khyod kyi phu bo'i chung ma 'di nyon mongs pa kun tu spyod pas shin tu g-yen spyo bar gyur pas nges par rigs gnyi ga la mi snyan pa 'byin par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168a-19: gal te khyod 'di dang lhan cig tu spyod par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-0: gal te mi byed na bdag cag gis @168b 'di gzhan la sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-2: 'di bdag cag gis byis pa nas bskyed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-3: gal te gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing rigs gnyi ga la mi snyan pa 'byin par 'gyur na; ma legs kyis bdag gis 'di bdag gir bya'o snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-4: des dang du blangs par khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-5: de nas nye sdes sde pa'i chung ma rang gi khyim du khrid nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-6: de la mngal na gnas pa'i mtshan ma dag byung bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-7: de la na zla dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-9: sde pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-10: kho mo tshul khrims dang ldan pa kho na yin gyis khye cag rdzun gyi skur bas kho mo la kun tu ma spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-11: de'i grogs mo ches mdza' ba zhig yod pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-13: 'di gdon mi za bar grags par 'gyur gyis smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-14: sde pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-16: legs te khyim thab las sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-17: skud po las kyang rung 'di la nyes pa 'ga' yang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-18: sde pa'i chung ma de sems can dang ldan par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-19: sde pas nye sde la nu bo brtan pa dang spungs dang spro ba cher gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-20: kho bo yang yi ge'i rjes bzhin kho nar 'ong ngo zhes spring yig bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-21: nye sdes thos nas nyam nga bar gyur te bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-22: gang gi tshe bdag phu bo de la sprin bzhin du lta bar 'dod pa de'i tshe na ni de ma 'ongs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:168b-23: da bdag gis nyes par spyod pa 'di lta bu byas na de 'ong bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-0: @169a *// 'khon rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-1: bud med kyi 'khon tha chad yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-2: bdag la gnod pa byed par gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod kyis bros te 'gro'o snyam mo; ;yang bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-3: yul yongs su gtong bar byed pa ni sdug bsngal ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-4: sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 'di dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-5: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba thob pas de dag gi nang du rab tu byung na des der ci zhig bya bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-6: nye sde rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste dge slong zhig gi gan du phyin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-7: 'phags pa dag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-9: bzhin bzang legs te longs spyod dag ni 'gyur ba yin gyis rab tu phyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-10: dge slong de nye sde rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-11: rdzogs par bsnyen par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-12: de'i 'og tu nyi ma gnyis sam gsum kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag slob tu bcug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-13: bzhin bzang ri dvags kyis ri dvags mi sos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-14: mnyan yod rgya che la rang gi spyod yul dang yab kyi yul yin gyis bsod snyoms rgyus la 'tsho bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-15: nye sde mkhan pos de skad bsgo nas mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-17: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169a-18: de spyod yul la mi mkhas pas grong rims kyis rang gi khyim du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-0: sde pa'i chung mas nye sde mthong nas des brang brdungs @169b te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-1: nye sde ci'i slad du khyod kyis kho mo spangs te rab tu byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-3: khyod kyang de skad ces ci'i slad du khyod kyis kho mo spangs te rab tu byung zhes zer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-4: gang gi tshe bdag phu bo de la sprin bzhin du lta bar 'dod pa de'i tshe na ni de ma 'ongs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-5: bdag gis nyes par spyod pa 'di lta bu byas na de 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-6: 'khon rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste bud med kyi 'khon tha chad yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-7: bdag la gnod par byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-8: sde pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-9: khyod kyis ni re zhig bdag nyid thar bar bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-10: kho mos ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-12: de ni khyod nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis rnam par bsams pa yin gyi kho bo ni mi 'dod bzhin byed du bcug pa yin pas khyod nyid shes so zhes smras te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-13: nye sde'i chung bo grogs sngon sman pa spos 'tshong gi khye'u zhig yod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-14: sde pa'i chung ma'i khyim du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-15: nye sde gar song zhes dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-16: sde pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-17: nye sdes lam lam por byas te rab tu byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-18: gang du sh'akya sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi nang du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-19: gal te yid mi ches na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-20: de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba na rab tu byung ba thams cad cha lugs 'dra bas de gang yin mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-21: des dge slong zhig la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:169b-22: 'phags pa mnyan yod pa'i khyim bdag gi bu nye sde zhes bgyi ba 'dir rab tu byung na ga la mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-1: khye'u de nye sde'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-2: nye sde khyod kyis ci zhig rjes su bsgrubs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-3: kho bo la yang ma dris par rab tu byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-5: khyod kyang de skad ces khyod kyis ci zhig rjes su bsgrubs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-6: kho bo la yang ma dris par rab tu byung zhes zer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-7: gang gi tshe bdag phu bo de la sprin bzhin du blta bar 'dod pa de'i tshe na ni de ma 'ongs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-8: da bdag gis nyes par spyad pa 'di lta bu byas na de 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-9: 'khon rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-10: bud med kyi 'khon tha chad yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-11: bdag la gnod par byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-13: kho bo cag spos 'tshong gi khye'u dag ni sman pa'i phyed yin pas kho bos re zhig mngal na gnas pa rlugs par bya ba de lta bu dag byin par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-14: des mngal na gnas pa de dum bu dum bur zhig par 'gyur ba zhig na khyod kyis kho bo la ci'i phyir ma smras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-15: 'di ltar da yang sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-16: nye sdes dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-17: de nas spos 'tshong gi khye'u des rdzas rnon po dag phye mar byas te bu mo zhig gi lag tu byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-18: khyod song la sde pa'i khyim du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-19: sde pa'i chung ma la nye sde na re phye ma 'di chu dron mo dang sbyor la 'thung zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-20: khyod sos par 'gyur zhes zer ro zhes gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170a-21: bu mo des jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes spos 'tshong gi khye'u las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-0: sde pa'i khyim ga la ba der song @170b ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-1: sde pa'i chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-2: nye sde'i zhal nas phye ma 'di chung dron mo dang sbyor la 'thung zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-3: khyod sos par 'gyur zhes gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-4: sde pa'i chung ma des phye ma de chu dron po dang sbyar te 'thungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-5: de nas de'i mngal na gnas pa de dum bu dum bur zhig par gyur cing mngal na gnas pa'i mtshan ma dag kyang med par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-6: yang na zla dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-7: khyod kyi mngal na gnas pa de gar song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-8: sde pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-9: kho mos dang po nyid nas kho mo tshul khrims dang ldan pa nyid yin gyis khyed cag rdzun gyi skur bas kho mo la kun tu ma spyod cig ces ma smras sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-10: de'i grogs mo ches mdza' ba de de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-11: khyod kyis sngar 'di skad ces nye sde las so zhes kho mo la smras pa'i mngal na gnas pa de da gar song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-12: sde pa'i chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-13: gang kho na las 'ongs pa de kho nar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-15: nye sdes phye ma rnon po de lta bu byin pas des na mngal na gnas pa de dum bu dum bur zhig pa 'gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-16: de sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-17: bram ze'o tshul ni tshig ste 'di ltar mngal na gnas pa yang rlugs par byed do zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:170b-20: nye sdes sdig pa'i las 'di dang 'di lta bu byas so zhes bya ba'i sgra de yang mnyan yod kun tu grags pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-0: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe @171a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-1: dang ldan pa nye sde la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-2: nye sde khyod kyis sdig pa'i las de lta bu de byas pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-4: 'di ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar ni bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-6: dge slong dag dge slong nye sde la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-7: yang dge slong gis gnas de lta bu la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-8: dge slong gnas de lta bu la rjes su yi rang bar byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-10: de'i bar skabs su sde pa don legs par grub ste mnyan yod dang nye bar phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-11: 'jig rten ni 'byor pa 'dod la rgud pa dang mi mthun pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-12: kha cig gis myur ba myur bar dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-13: sde pa'i chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-14: khyod kyi khyim thab don legs par grub ste mnyan yod dang nye bar 'ongs kyis spro ba skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-15: bud med kyi yul ni ma bslabs par mkhas pa yin pas sde pa'i chung ma de yi chad pa'i sems kyis gos dri ma can dag bgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-16: khri zhig pa la 'dug cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-17: ji tsam na sde pa mnyan yod du zhugs nas zong mdzod du mkhos su phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-18: rang gi khyim du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-21: gsal ba med pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-22: des bu mo mo mngag gzhug ma la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-23: khyim bdag gi chung ma gar song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171a-25: rje'i sras spyod lam bcad de khri zhig pa la mchis shing mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-0: de nas sde pa yi mi @171b bde ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-1: chung ma'i gan du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-2: bzang mo khyod kho bo 'ongs pas mi bde'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-3: rje'i sras bdag khyod byon pas mi bde ba ma mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-4: 'di ltar rje'i sras kyis srung ma gang lags pa de dag nyid rkun ma dag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-6: bkag bzhin du nye sdes nan gyis kho mo bdag gir bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-7: bzang mo de ni des khyod zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyi kho bo zil gyis mnan pa yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-9: kho bos de la mtshams gcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-10: bzang mo nye sde ga la 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-11: rje'i sras khyod byon pa thos nas rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-12: gang du rgyal byed kyi tshal du sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams kyi nang du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-13: bzang mo ci de 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-14: kho bo der yang song la de la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-15: 'jig rten ni mdza' bshes dang dgra bo dang bar ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-16: kha cig nye sde'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-17: nye sde khyed kyi phu bo 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-21: ci de 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-22: kho bo der yang song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-23: de la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-24: nye sdes thos nas nyam nga bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-26: bdag 'jigs pa dag gis rab tu byung ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:171b-28: 'di ltar bdag cag rgyal pos gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba byin mod kyi 'on kyang bdag nyes pa dang bcas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-0: gal te na bdag la 'dir yang gnod pa byed par @172a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-1: 'gyur ba'i gnas yod kyis bros te 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-2: des mkhan po la mkhan po bdag 'jigs pa gang gis rab tu byung ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-3: 'dir yang rjes su 'brel bar gyur to zhes byung ba'i mtha' de rgyas par brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-6: mkhan po bdag gi phu bo de mchis nas te por mchid 'bo zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-7: ji de 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-8: kho bo der yang song la de la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-9: 'di ltar bdag cag rgyal pos gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba stsal mod kyi 'on kyang bdag nongs pa dang bcas pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-10: gal te na 'dir yang bdag la gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba'i gnas mchis kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-13: mkhan po rgyal po'i khab tu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-14: bu de na kho bo mdza' bshes dge slong zhig 'dug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-15: de la spring yig bskur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-17: de khyod la byams pas rjes su skyong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-19: des dge slong de la sngar bro rma ba dris te; bdag gi lhan cig gnas pa bdag gis khyod kyi gan du gtang ste 'ong gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-20: de'i slad du ji ltar 'di ni mngon par dga' ba bzhin du byams pas rjes su skyongs shig ces spring yig bris nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172a-21: nye sdes spring yig de mnos te bag tsha bas yid mi bde zhing phyogs su rnam par lta ba bzhin du rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags te mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-0: thos pa brgyud pas dge slong de'i gan du @172b phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-1: spring yig phul nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-2: de nas dge slong des spring yig bklags te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-5: ji ltar khyod de'i nye gnas yin pa de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-6: kho bo'i yang yin gyis bslab pa la gus par gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-7: kho bos khyod lhung bzed dang chos gos dang dra ba dang phor bu dang ska rags kyis mi brel bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-8: gzhan yang dge slong gi las ni gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-9: bsam gtan dang klog pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-10: khyod bsam gtan dang klog pa gang 'dod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-13: des de la gdams ngag byin nas nye sde bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-15: brtsal bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-16: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-17: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-18: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-19: tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-20: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-21: rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-22: srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-23: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-25: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:172b-26: de'i bar skabs su sde pa yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste dge slong rnams la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-1: pa dag 'di na mnyan yod pa'i khyim bdag gi bu rab tu byung ba zhig mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-4: rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-5: de khyed kyi cir 'ong nu bor mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-6: sde pas dge slong de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-7: rgyal po'i khab kyang 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer ma yin gyis bdag der yang song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-8: de la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-9: de lam brgyags mang po dang kar sha pa na dag khyer te rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-10: de 'od ma'i tshal du song nas dge slong rnams la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-11: 'phags pa dag 'di na mnyan yod pa'i khyim bdag gi bu rab tu byung ba zhig mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-16: bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-17: sde pa de bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-18: des nye sde byis pa'i gnas skabs na mthong ba chen por gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-19: mkhas pa dang rnam par gnon pa las ngo ma shes mod kyi te por brtags pa dang bzhin gzugs las ngo shes par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-21: gal te 'dis bdag ngo shes par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-22: nges par 'dis bdag gsod par byed pas de'i thabs sbyar bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-23: de mtha' gcig tu song ste phyogs su rnam par blta zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-24: ji tsam na lam der rngon pa lag na mda' gzhu thogs pa zhig ri dvags bshor ba'i phyir 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173a-25: sde pa de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-0: kye @173b grogs po khyod lag na mda' gzhu thogs te gar 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-2: grogs po ri dvags shor du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-3: de las khyod kyi rnyed pa ji tsam 'grub /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-5: lan 'ga' ni mi 'grub bo; ;gang gi tshe 'grub pa de'i tshe na mang nyung ji tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-6: grogs po kar sha pa ni lnga brgya tsam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-8: grogs po gal te de lta na rab tu byung ba 'di sod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-9: kho bos khyod la kar sha pa na lnga brgya byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-10: rngon pa de 'dod pas drangs pa'i yid dang ldan pas des sde pa las kar sha pa na lnga brgya blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-12: rab tu byung ba 'di dag ni rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba byin pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-13: bdag ni phyogs 'dir rtag tu rgyu ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-14: gal te bdag gis rab tu byung ba 'di bsad par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-15: bdag kyang bu dang rtsa lag dang phyugs dang bcas te nges par btson rar bcug cing gsod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-16: 'di ltar khyim bdag 'di ni na le sham dkar po 'byung ba dang 'dra bar 'di ga las 'ongs pa sus kyang mi shes pa yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-17: rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsad par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:173b-18: rngon pa des mda' dug can gyis gzhu rnga'i dbyibs 'dra bar rna drung du thug par bkang ste sde pa'i gnad du bsnun to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:174a-0: sde pa de sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag gis nyen pas bdag bsad par gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad nges par rab tu byung ba 'dis rngon pa 'di dang lhan cig brda byas pa yin gyi @174a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:174a-1: gang du 'di gsod par 'gyur ba der skye ba blang ngo snyam du sems dag gso bar byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:174a-2: des smon lam log par btab nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-7: rnyi dang rnyong mang po dag 'jug par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-8: de'i rngon spyad dang rnyi dang rnying de dag kyang don yod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-9: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-10: ri brags der phyin nas lha'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-11: de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-12: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-13: ri brags der bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-16: lha'i gnas 'di nyin mo rgyun lugs mang ba yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-17: ri brags kyi phyi rol gyi gnas zhig ba zhig tu bsod snyoms bza'o snyam nas de ri brags nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-18: 'di ni zhi ba'o 'di ni zhi ba'o zhes mtshe'u de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-19: lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178a-20: rkang pa gnyis pa bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te chu btsags nas lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-0: @178b lag pa gnyis bsnyal nas kha bkrus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-1: lhung bzed dang chu tshags gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-3: shing drung zhig tu brten nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-4: brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-5: skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-6: de'i nyin mo mi'i dris ri dvags gcig kyang ma zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-7: de nas rngon pa de nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-8: mtshe'u de ga la ba der song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-10: rnyi dang rnying de dag byul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-11: ri dvags gcig kyang ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-14: rnyi dang rnying 'di dag don yod pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-15: gang gi phyir deng ri dvags gcig kyang ma zin pa 'di'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-16: des mtshe'u de'i than kor byul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-18: de rjes de'i phyi bzhin du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-19: rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa de mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-20: rab tu byung ba sems zhi ba 'di dag gnas 'di lta bu dag tu mngon par dga' bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-21: gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog gcad par ma byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-22: 'di dag gis nges par bdag gi 'tsho ba gcod par byed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-23: rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsad par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-24: snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-25: 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-26: mda' dug can gyis gzhu rnga'i dbyibs 'dra ba rna drung du thug par bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-27: rang sangs rgyas de'i gnad du bsnun to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:178b-28: rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-1: mongs pa 'di ha cang smas pa dang nyams par gyur na mi rung gis 'di lag nas drang ba sbyin no snyam nas des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-5: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-6: so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-7: rngon pa de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-8: rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-9: yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-11: nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-12: rang sangs rgyas de rngon pa de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-13: steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-14: de nas rngon pa des zug rngu med par byas te rma lhan gyi glan nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-15: 'phags pa sdum par gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-16: gal te 'dir gser gyi lhan pa klan par mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-17: de yang bdag gis sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-18: rang sangs rgyas kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-19: bdag gis rnag gi lus 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa thob zin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-20: de'i phyir da ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179a-21: de rngon pa de nyid kyi mdun du yang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-0: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam @179b par bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-1: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-2: rngon pa de nor dang ldan pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-3: des spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por gcer te bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-4: rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten brtsig tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-7: dri dang phreng ba rgyu ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-10: sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-11: rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-12: bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par mi 'gyur bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-13: mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-14: bdag phyug pa nor mang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-15: longs spyod che ba'i khyim du gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-18: 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-19: dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyis rngon pa gang yin pa de ni nye sde 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-20: des rang sangs rgyas kyi gnad du mda' dug can gyi bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:179b-21: las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar dug gis dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-0: da ltar gyi bar du yang dgra @180a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-2: de dug gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-3: mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni da ltar phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du gzugs bzang ba lta na sdug pa mdzes par skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-4: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-5: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-6: 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-7: dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-8: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-9: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-10: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-11: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-12: dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-13: 'di yang re zhig byung ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180a-16: mnyan yod na tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-0: de de dang lhan cig @180b rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-2: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-3: rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-4: de btsas pa'i rim gyis rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-5: de bsrings shing bskyed nas chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-6: ji tsam na tshong dpon de'i chung ma dus la bab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-7: des chung ma gzhan zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-8: tshong dpon des chung ma de la smras pa bzang mo gzhan las skyes pas ni bya ba byed par nus kyi mi mthun par skyes pas ni mi nus pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-9: khye'u 'di khyod kyi bu yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-10: khyod kyis 'di la mkho ba bstab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-11: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na chung ma gnyis pa de la yang sems can zhugs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-13: bdag la yang bu yod par gyur pas khye'u 'di de'i zla bor 'gyur gyis 'di bstod par mi bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-14: des khye'u de zas ngan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-15: gos ngan pa bsrel du 'jug cing khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis kyang yang dang yang du rdeg par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-16: khye'u de pha'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-17: yab bdag la ma yar mo 'dis zas ngan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-18: gos ngan pa bsrel du stsol cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-19: khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis kyang yang dang yang du rdeg par bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-21: bu ci nas kyang phyin chad de ltar mi byed par bzlog par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-22: tshong dpon des chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:180b-23: bzang mo kho bos khyod la dang po nyid nas gzhan las skyes pas ni bya ba byed par nus kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-0: mi mthun par skyes pas ni @181a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-1: mi nus pas khye'u 'di khyod kyi bu yin gyis khyod kyis 'di la mkho ba bstab par bya'o zhes ma smras sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-2: ci'i phyir khyod kyis 'di la zas ngan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-3: gos ngan pa bsrel du 'jud cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-4: khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis kyang yang dang yang du rdeg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-6: rje'i sras bdag gis 'di bslab par bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-7: 'di ni tshong dpon gyi bu lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-8: gal te ma bslabs na rje'i sras nyid la yang 'jig rten dag nges par smod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-10: khyod 'di slob par ma bskos kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-11: phyin chad 'di zas ngan pa dang gos ngan pa bsrel du mi gzhug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-12: khu tshur dang thal lcag gis yang dang yang du ma rdegs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-13: chung ma de tshong dpon de'i shin tu gnang chen yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-14: chung ma des khye'u de phyir zhing shas cher gos ngan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-15: zas ngan pa bsrel du 'jud cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-16: khu tshur dang thal lcag gis kyang yang dang yang du rdeg par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-18: bdag gi phas ma yar mo 'di drag tu ma bzlog pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-19: des na ma yar mo 'di bdag la phyir zhing shas cher zas ngan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-20: gos ngan pa bsrel du 'jud cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181a-21: khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis kyang yang dang yang du rdeg par byed kyis bdag rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-0: khye'u des pha la yab khyod kyis bdag gi ma yar mo 'di bzlog kyang 'dis slar zhing shas cher bdag zas ngan pa dang gos ngan pa bsrel du @181b du stsal cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-1: khu tshur dang thal lcag dag gis kyang yang dang yang du rdeg par bgyid kyis bdag rab tu 'byung du mchi'o zhes ci nas cir brgyud de gsol ba byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-2: tshong dpon de chung ma de la ha cad byams shing de'i sems srung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-3: de drag tu bzlog par ma nus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-5: bu khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di gtum pa brtun ngas pa drag shul che ba yin gyis song la rab tu byung zhig dang khyod gson pa mthong bar yang 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-6: gal te na khyod la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-7: khye'u de phas gnang nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-8: dge slong gi drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-9: 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-11: bzhin bzang khyod kyis sems bskyed pa legs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-12: longs spyod dag ni 'gyur ba yin gyis rab tu byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-13: dge slong des khye'u de rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-14: bzhin bzang dge slong gi las ni gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-17: kho bo ni bsam gtan pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-22: bu legs kyis khyod kyis sde snod gsum po dag bklag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-24: gzhung ma la mkhan po rjes su bsrung dgos pas 'di na bdag la klog tu 'jud pa med kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:181b-25: yul gzhan du 'gro'o snyam nas de yul gzhan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-1: snod gsum po dag bklags shing sde snod gsum dang ldan pa chos sgrogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-2: rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bu'i pha ma snyod par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-7: nu ma snun par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-8: 'dzam bu'i gling sna tshogs ston par byed pa gnyis ni dka' ba byed pa dag yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-9: bus phrag pa gcig gis ni pha /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-10: cig shos kyis ni ma lo brgya tham par yongs su pang ba byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-11: sa chen po 'dir nor bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-22: de lta bu'i dbang phyug gi bdag po la bkod par gyur pa gang yin pa de tsam gyis ni bus pha ma gnyis la byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-23: nye bar byas par mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-24: de pha ma ma dad pa gnyis dad pa phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-25: yang dag par 'dzin du bjud [*'jud?] 'dul bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-28: tshul khrims 'chal pa gnyis tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-29: ser sna can gnyis gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182a-30: shes rab 'chal ba gnyis shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-0: de tsam gyis ni bus pha ma @182b gnyis la byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-1: nye bar byas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas bdag gi pha de yang ma dad pa yin gyis bdag song la de la chos bstan par bya'o snyam nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te; mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-2: mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-3: de mnyan yod du 'jug pa nyid na rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-4: mnyan yod kun tu tshong dpon che ge mo'i bu zhig ljongs nas sde snod gsum bklags te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs so zhes bya ba'i sgras khyab par gyur pa de tshong dpon des thos nas bdag gi bu sde snod gsum bklags te ljongs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-5: de yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed du 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-6: tshong dpon de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-7: des bu de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-8: bu khyod kyis kho bo spangs te rab tu byung mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-9: khyod dge slong du red cing mang du thos par gyur pa legs te bdag kyang yongs su dga'o zhes smras nas de'i mdun du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-10: dge slong des tshong dpon de la gang gis tshong dpon de dad pa skyes pas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-11: bslab pa'i gzhi dag gzung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i chos bstan par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-12: tshong dpon des bu'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-13: phyi de nyin par zan la mgron du bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-14: bu des kyang cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-15: de nas tshong dpon des bu'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te song pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:182b-16: de la lam khar blo skyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-0: @183a *// bdag gis bu de ma bgros par gya tshom du mgron du bos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-1: bdag gi chung ma de yang gtum pa brtun ngas pa drag shul che ba yin pas bu de la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-2: de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-4: da ni de mgron du bos zin pas ci byar yang med kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-5: bdag gis gang gis chung ma de 'khrugs par mi 'gyur bar rnam pa thams cad du dga' ba dang snyan pa'i tshig dag gis thabs bshams par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-6: de khyim du song ste chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-9: rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba dag don gcig gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-10: 'on te tha dad du bya ba cung zad yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-12: rje'i sras tha dad du bgyi ba cung zad kyang ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-14: bzang mo gzhan dag na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-15: khyod kyi bu yar po de dge slong bzang por red de ljongs nas sde snod gsum bklags nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-16: sde snod gsum dang ldan pa 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-18: rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du yang gyur ces zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-20: rje'i sras gal te de lta na ci'i slad du 'tshal ma la g-yar mi drang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183a-21: bzang mo mgron du bos kyis zas sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-0: chung ma de de la zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas des zas bsil ba'i ro dang ldan pa gang @183b dag yin pa de dag ni de nyid kyi nyin mo sta gon byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-1: zas dro ba'i ro dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni phyi de nyin par sta gon byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-2: btsun pa gdugs tshod g-yar gong 'tshal lags na de'i dus lags par dgongs su gsol zhes g-yar 'dren pa'i mi btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-3: dge slong de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-4: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas pha'i khyim ga la ba der song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-5: phyin nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-6: de nas tshong dpon de chung ma dang bcas pas rang gi lag nas zas bsod bas dge slong de tshim par byas shing rang gi lag nas bstabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-7: tshim par byas shing bstabs te zos zin par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-8: lag pa bsnyal cing lhung bzed bzhag pa na rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-9: chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-10: des ma yar mo de la yang gang thos nas des kyang skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag gzung bar gyur pa'i rnam pa de ltar chos bstan par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-11: des khyim de ji ltar dge slong rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-12: dge slong ma rnams kyis khron pa lta bur gyur pa de ltar btul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-13: de dag sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa ci yang rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-14: de thams cad dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma rnams la sems so; ;ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshong dpon de'i 'byung ba chen po ma snyoms pas na bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:183b-15: de'i bus bdag gi phan par gyur to zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-1: la pha de la mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-2: dge slong de de'i drung du dus dang mthun pa'i dus su song nas 'di skad ces; yab khyod kyis mi bgyis par mi bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-3: 'di ltar khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bdag la brten nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-4: chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-7: khyod yul gzhan du song na lo legs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-8: mtho ris ni dar gyis chod pa tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-9: thar pa ni yol bas bsgribs pa tsam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-10: lus zhig nas yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes chos ston par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-14: bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen khyod la brten nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-15: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-16: chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhig bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-19: bdag yul gzhan du song na lo legs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-20: mtho ris ni dar gyis chod pa tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-21: thar pa ni yol bas bsgribs pa tsam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-22: lus zhig na yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184a-24: pha la de ltar chos bstan nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-0: tshong dpon de la blo skyes pa bdag gi bu sde snod gsum @184b dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-2: rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can de gzhan du smra bar mi 'gyur bas bdag sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen pa ni thun mong ma yin pas bdag gis bdag nyid gsad par bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-4: bdag nyid la rtsom par byed pa ni sdug bsngal ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-5: de'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed nus pa su yod snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-6: de la bran mo mngag gzhug ma skyong ma zhes bya ba sbom mo glen ma dman pa zhig yod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-8: skyong ma 'di ni sbom mo glen ma dman pa yin pas 'dis bdag srog dang bral bar byed nus kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-9: gzhan gyis ni mi nus snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-10: tshong dpon de'i khyim dang ha cang thag mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-11: khyim bdag cig gi bus bag ma blangs pa der /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-12: tshong dpon de'i chung ma bran mo mngag gzhug ma skyong ma dang bcas shing mgron du bos te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-15: tshong dpon gyi chung mas skyong ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-16: skyong ma khyod song la tshong dpon gnyid log par mi 'gyur bar srung shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-17: kho mo yang phyi bzhin 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-18: skyong mas jo mo'i tshig mnyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-19: khyim du song nas tshong dpon gyi drung du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:184b-23: rje'i sras khyim bdag che ge mo'i bus bag ma blangs pa de bdag gis bltas te 'tshal ma 'tshal nas mchis so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-4: gal te de na kho bo ci zer ba de bzhin du byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-5: kho bo khyod dga' bar 'gyur ba shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-7: rje'i sras de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-8: skyong ma gal te de lta na kho bo'i ltor mi ma yin pa zhig zhugs kyis de sod cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-10: skyong ma dang por nga'i rkang pa gnyis tshir cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-20: kye ma'o bdag skyong ma 'dis btang yang ci ma rung snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-21: skyong mas de bas kyang ches dam du btsir to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-22: lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-23: blo ngan gyis ni gang 'dzin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-24: rus sbal gyis ni gang 'dzin bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-25: skyong mas zin par gyur pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-26: khyod ni 'tsho bar ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-27: tshong dpon de dus la bab nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-28: skyong mas ras kyis g-yogs te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-29: de nas tshong dpon gyi chung ma phyi bzhin 'ongs nas de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185a-30: skyong ma khyod 'dug bzhin du tshong dpon nyal du bcug gam zhes tshong dpon gyi chung ma des tshong dpon bslang bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-1: ngan bus 'di'i lto na dgra bo mchis pa phyung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-2: des na 'di nyal bar gyur gyis 'di ma bslangs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-3: tshong dpon gyi chung mas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-4: 'di'i dgra bo ci 'dra ba zhig yin pa de blta'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-5: des brtag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-6: dus la bab pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-7: tshong dpon gyi chung ma de la blo skyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-8: 'di ni skyong ma'i spobs pa ma yin gyi 'di ni bu zan mo'i bu sde snod gsum dang ldan pa de'i spobs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-9: des sde snod gsum bklags na chos gzhan 'ga' yang bstan pa ma byas par yab khyod kyis mi dgyes par mi bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-10: khyod yul gzhan du song na lo legs shing mtho ris ni dar gyis chod pa tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-11: thar pa ni yol bas bsgribs pa tsam ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-14: lha rnams kyi nang du yang skyes zin gyis khyod tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-15: kho mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-16: khyim gyi bya ba yang rjes su sgrubs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-17: ces chung ma sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen pa nges tshig tu brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-18: de'i 'og tu gos sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag gis khyogs brgyan nas mnyan yod kyi phyi rol gyi dur khrod du bsregs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-19: de nas mya ngan bsangs pa byas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:185b-20: chung ma de bar bar du yang de skad sha stag zer bas dge slong sde snod gsum pa des bdag gi pha dus la bab par thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-1: kyi chos nyid yin mod kyi 'on kyang ma yar mo de'i mya ngan bsang ba byar 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-3: ma yar mo des thag ring po kho na nas dge slong de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-4: mthong nas kyang yang bu zan mo'i bu sde snod gsum dang ldan pas sde snod gsum bklags na chos gzhan 'ga' yang bstan pa ma byas par yab khyod kyis mi dgyes par mi bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-5: khyod yul gzhan du song na lo legs shing mtho ris ni dar gyis chod pa tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-6: thar pa ni yol bas bsgribs pa tsam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-7: lus zhig na yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pas da ni 'di'i lus kyang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-8: lha rnams kyi nang du yang skyes zin gyis khyod tshur shog kho mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-9: khyim gyi bya ba yang rjes su sgrubs shig ces smra bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-10: dge slong de nyam nga nas de nyid nas phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-11: de bdag gis 'chir bcug par ma gyur tam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-12: des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-13: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-15: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186a-16: yang dge slong gis nad pa la gang thos na nad pa 'chi bar sems pa de 'dra ba'i chos bstan par mi bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186b-0: 'di yang re zhig @186b byung ba yin gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spong byed dag na chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram na sgron shing gi tshal gseb na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186b-2: de na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186b-6: mi sdug pa bsten cing goms par byas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:186b-12: smod par byed pa na mtshon yang 'byin par byed /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:187a-0: smod par byed pa na ri dvags zlog dge sbyong @187a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:187a-7: de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha zhig chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi rgyun ma phye bar 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:187a-8: ri dvags zlog dge sbyong sbed la 'di skad ces smras so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:187a-15: de ltar de la ri dvags zlog dge sbyong sbed 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag dge sbyong tshul khrims dang ldan pa /
