K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191a-30: de de'i drung du song ste 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191a-31: tshe dang ldan pa ni tshul khrims 'chal ba sdig pa'i chos can lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191a-32: tshe dang ldan pa ji srid yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de srid du bsod nams ma yin pa mang du 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-0: @191b bsod nams ma yin pa mang du 'phel na yun ring du sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-1: tshul khrims 'chal ba de dge slong de la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa 'o na kho bos ji ltar bya zhes zer ba'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-2: tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog khyod kyis bdag nyid thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-4: bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byed du chug cig ces smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-5: gal te tshul khrims 'chal ba de bdag nyid gtong bar byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-6: bdag nyid gsod pa byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-7: bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byed du 'jug na dge slong de pham par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-8: gal te tshul khrims 'chal ba de 'di snyam du de ltar yin no snyam mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-9: 'on kyang 'di skad ces kho bo bdag nyid mi gtong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-10: kho bo bdag nyid mi gsod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-11: kho bo bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byed du mi 'jud do zhes zer zhing gal te de bdag nyid gtong bar mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-12: bdag nyid gsod par mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-13: bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byed du mi 'jud na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:191b-14: dge slong de la sbyor ba snga ma de nyid kyis nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205a-13: de'i slad du bdag cag ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205a-15: bzhin bzang dag gang dag bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba de dag la ni dus ston yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205a-16: khyed cag mkhar lan gyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba dag la dus ston ci 'dra ba dag cig yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205a-17: tshur sheg [*shog?] la las gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205a-18: de'i phyir gla nyis gyur du sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205a-20: 'phags pa gang dag bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba de dag la ni rtag pa kho nar dus ston mchis kyi bdag cag ni mkhar lan gyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba lags pas de nyid kyis na bdag cag la brgya la brgya lam na dus ston 'byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-0: gal te gla sum gyur du stsal du lags kyang bdag deng ni las mi @205b bgyid do zhes de dag ma btub ste dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-1: bsod snyoms pa yang snying las chung ngur 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-3: bdag gis sbyin par bya ba'i chos de la ji tsam ni byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-4: ji tsam ni ma byas pa de ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de nang par sngar langs te song ba dang 'ga' yang las mi byed pa mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-5: de bsod snyoms pa'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-6: 'phags pa gla mi dag deng las mi bgyid dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-10: deng 'jig rten gyi dus ston yin pas bdag cag las mi byed do zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-11: khyim bdag gis smras pa; 'phags pa de dag ni mkhar lan gyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-12: 'phags pas de dag la gla ma stsal pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-13: des na ma btub gor ma bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-15: khyim bdag kho bos gla nyis gyur byin yang ma grub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-17: 'phags pa gang dag bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba de dag ni rtag pa kho nar dus ston mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-18: bdag cag ni mkhar lan gyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-19: de nyid kyis na bdag cag la brgya la brgya lam na dus ston 'byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-20: gal te gla sum gyur du stsal tu lags kyang bdag cag deng ni las mi bgyid do zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-22: 'phags pa bdag ni bdag gi slad du yang bgyid du ma rtsol la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:205b-23: nye du rnams kyi slad du yang bgyid du mi rtsol gyi 'di ltar 'phags pa rnams kyi slad du bgyid du rtsol ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-0: @206a *// kye ma 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang brgya la brgya lam du mkhar lan gyi stongs mo mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-1: bsod snyoms pas skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-2: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-4: gzhi ma zin pa la dge slong rnams kyis mkhar lan gyi stongs mo bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi ma zin pa la dge slong rnams kyis mkhar lan gyi stongs mo bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-6: dge slong dag gis mkhar lan gyi stongs mo bya bar brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-7: de dag phan tshun so phag 'phen par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-8: ji tsam na dge slong zhig gis dge slong la so phag 'phangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-9: lag pa nas shor te dge slong gi mgo la phog nas de dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-10: dge slong de dag 'gyod pa skyes shing de dag yid mi bde nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-11: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bsod snyoms pa las med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-12: las phyung nas bdag cag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yid du 'ong ba dang bral bar gyur cing bdag cag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes par gyur to zhes zer ba'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-13: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-15: dge slong dag khyed la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206a-16: yang dge slong rnams kyis so phag 'phang bar mi bya bar 'di ltar lag pas lag par brgyud bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-0: gas pa yin na go bar bya ste brgyud @206b par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-1: go bar ma byas par brgyud par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis mkhar lan gyi stongs mo bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-3: dge slong rnams nyi ma rangs par las byed nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dag ci'i phyir dge slong 'di dag nyi ma rangs par gla mi bzhin du las byed ces 'phya bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-5: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-7: nyi ma rangs par las mi bya bar 'di ltar lan cig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-8: dge slong dag so ga phyi dro las byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-9: dgun ni snga dro las byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-10: so ga ni snga dro las bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-11: dgun ni phyi dro las bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-12: de dag dus rting la thug pa na gtong zhing 'jim rdzab kyis gos pa'i lus kyis de bzhin rings pa rings par bsod snyoms la 'jug pa na ma dad pa dag 'phags pa dag khyed cag gis gla mi dag kyang pham par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-13: de dag kyang zas kyi dus yongs su spong bar byed na khyed cag zas kyi dus kyang spong bar mi byed do zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-15: bsod snyoms pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis ni sta gon byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-16: grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug khom pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:206b-17: gang dag dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa dbang ba de dag gis ni sta gon byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-0: dge 'dun gyi dbus su 'jug khom pa @207a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-1: de ltar dus shes par byas te gtang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis sta gon byas nas grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya zhing dge 'dun gyi dbus su yang 'jug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-3: dge slong rnams kyis ji tsam gyis na sta gon byas par brjod par bya ba mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-5: ji tsam gyis lag pa gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-6: rkang pa gnyis bkrus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-7: lhung bzed bkrus par gyur pa de tsam gyis na sta gon byas par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-8: gzhan yang ngas dge slong mkhar lan byed pa dag gis kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-9: dge slong mkhar lan byed pas dus ji lta ba bzhin du snga dro ni khye'u sus dag sbyor du gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-10: phyi dro ni skom dang lag pa dang rkang pa'i bsku mnye rgyu dag sbyor du gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-11: dge slong mkhar lan byed pas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-12: 'brog gnas su bsod snyoms pas bsro khang byed du bcug pa ji lta ba bzhin du me khang gi gleng gzhi yang de kho na bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi ma zin pa la mkhar lan gyi stongs mo bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207a-15: dge slong dag me khang gi las byed cing pham dag phar sbed tshur sbed pa na de dag gi 'og na shing mkhan zhig zhal ta byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-0: @207b ji tsam na phyam dag sbed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-1: dge slong gi lag nas phyam shor bas shing mkhan gyi mgor phog nas de dus la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-2: dge slong de dag tshe dang ldan pa dag bsod snyoms pa las med pa las byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-3: bdag cag la pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-5: dge slong dag khyed la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-6: yang dge slong dag gis mi bzod pa'i khur gdeg par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-7: rkyen de lta bu zhig byung na mdor khyim pa dag 'dzin du gzhug par bya zhing gdeg pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-8: gzhag pa dag kyang brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-9: mnyam du gdeg pa dang mnyam du gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-10: dge slong dag mi bzod pa'i khur 'degs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis mi bzod pa'i khur gdeg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-12: dge slong rnams kyis ji tsam ni bzod pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-13: ji tsam ni mi bzod pa yin pa mi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-15: khyim pa gcig gi khur gang yin pa de dag dge slong gnyis kyis gdeg par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyam yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-17: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas gtum mo btul te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:207b-18: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-0: des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la @208a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-2: yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas dang du ma blangs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-4: sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin par zhugs pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-5: kho bos kyang gzhan la phan par byed dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-7: 'phags pa gal te de lta lags te dang du mi bzhes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-8: bdag gis 'phags pa'i slad du drang srong gi gdan bsham par bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-9: khyod kyis bsod snyoms brgyus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-10: drang srong gi gdan la longs spyad de gshegs par rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-12: sring mo de bzhin bya'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nyi ma re re zhing bsod snyoms brgyus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-13: gtum mo'i khyim du drang srong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-15: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la ljongs su bya ba zhig byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-16: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-17: bdag je song la sring mo blta bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-18: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gtum mo'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-19: sring mo kho bo ljongs rgyur 'gro'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-20: khyod kyis chos kyi lus la bag gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-22: 'phags pa myur du slar gshegs pa'i rigs te; der bzhugs par mi mdzad cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-23: der dgyes pa mi bskyed du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208a-24: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas gtum mo bltas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-0: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos @208b dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-1: tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-2: khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thos nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-4: sangs rgyas kyi rgyu ba la ni phan yon bco brgyad yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-5: rgyal po'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-6: chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-9: mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-11: gdug pa'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-12: seng ge'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-13: stag gi 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-14: gung gi 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-15: pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-16: spyang ki'i 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-17: sho gam gyi 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-18: la gcan gyi 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-19: gru btsas kyi 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-20: dus dang dus su lha'i gzugs dag mthong zhing lha'i sgra dag thos la kun shes pa brda sprod pa dag thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-22: zang zing gi longs spyod yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-23: sangs rgyas kyi rgyu ba la gnod pa nyung ba yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-24: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig ljongs rgyur 'gro'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-25: phyir ldog par bya'o snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-26: de'i bar skabs su gtum mo'i khyim du bu mo zhig la khye'u zhig btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-27: gtum mos khye'u de'i ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:208b-28: bu mo khye'u 'di khrus gyis la gos dkar pos dkris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-0: @209a *// drang srong gi stan 'di la snyol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-2: tshe ring du skyong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-3: bu mo des khye'u de khrus byas te gos dkar pos dkris nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-4: drang srong de'i stan de la rtag tu bsnyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-5: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang nyi ma gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms la zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-6: gtum mo'i khyim ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-7: dgra bcom pa dag ni ma bsams par shes pa dang mthong ba mi 'jug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de bzhin du drang srong gi stan de la 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-9: bud med kyi yul de brtad pa dang bcas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-12: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka myur du langs te bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-13: khye'u dus la bab pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-14: khyim mi dag gis cho nges gdab par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-17: sems can 'dis tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag go zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-19: de lta mod kyi 'di la kho bos ngud mos gdab par bya ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-20: 'di ltar kho bos dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang kho bo la brten te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-21: des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-22: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-0: dge slong dag dge slong 'char ka la @209b ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-1: yang dge slong gis khyim gzhan du stan la ma brtags par 'dug par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-4: mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-11: ji tsam dus gzhan na de gnyis nor zad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-12: longs spyod zad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-13: de gnyis kyis gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-14: bdag cag gnyis 'di nyid du ma thos pa dang dmas par gyur pas rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'tsho ba za zhing longs spyod pas ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-15: rab tu 'byung du 'dong ngo zhes de gnyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-16: de na gcig na bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-17: cig shos de'i nad g-yog byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-18: nad pa de nyams dmas shing sos par ma gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-19: nad g-yog des nad pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-20: tshe dang ldan pa khyod la sngon khyim ba'i tshe na lan 'ga' nad 'di lta bu byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-22: 'o na ci zhig gis zhi bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-23: lan tshva'i sman rtsabs kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-24: 'o na de ci'i phyir lan tshva'i sman rtsabs mi 'thung zhes nad g-yog des lan tshva'i sman rtsabs bslangs te nad pa la blud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-25: nad pa de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:209b-26: dge slong de bdag gis 'di la sman pa yin pa byin par ma gyur tam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-1: dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-2: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-4: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-5: yang dge slong gis sman pa la ma dris par rang gi blos nad pa la sman sbyin par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-6: gal te sman pa med na sman pa rab tu byung ba la dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-7: sman pa rab tu byung ba med na sman pas bkol ba la dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-8: sman pas bkol ba med na nad kyis thebs pa la dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-9: nad kyis thebs pa med na dge slong rgan pa rgan pa dag la dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-10: dge slong gis sman pa la ma dris sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-11: ji skad bstan pa'i rim ba bzhin ma byas par rang gi blos nad pa la sman sbyin na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-12: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-13: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-14: btsun pa dge slong de la sman gang lags pa de nyid sman ma lags pa nyid du gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-17: de sngon khyim pa'i tshe na rlung dang bad kan can du gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-18: da ltar ni rlung dang mkhris pa can du gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-19: des na de la sman gang yin pa de nyid sman ma yin pa nyid du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-0: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dhar byung @210b ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-1: ma ga dhar byung ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bkod pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-2: ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-3: rgyal po'i khab tu 'di skad ces rgyal po'i khab tu 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-5: yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i tshong ba'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-6: nga'i yul du gang gis kyang chom rkun mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-7: gang nga'i yul du chom rkun byed pa de ngas yul med par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-8: bcom pa rnams kyi rkun rdzas ni nga'i mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes dril gyi sgra bsgrags pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-9: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdo sdes btul ba de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-10: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang mnyan yod du 'di skad ces mnyan yod na 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-12: yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i tshong pa'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-13: nga'i yul du gang gis kyang chom rkun mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-14: gang nga'i yul du chom rkun byed pa des ngas gsad pa'i gyod la bskrin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-15: bcom pa rnams kyi rkun rdzas ni nga'i mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes dril gyi sgra bsgrags pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:210b-16: de'i bar skabs na chom rkun pa gang dag yul ma ga dha na gnas pa dag dang chom rkun pa gang dag yul go sa la na gnas pa de dag sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-0: @211a *// thams cad du chom rkun pa gang dag yul ma ga dha na gnas pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-1: chom rkun pa gang dag yul ko sa la na gnas pa de dag sa mtshams kyi bar du dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-2: 'khod cing don mthun 'joms par byed do zhes bya ba'i sgra de lta bus kyang khyab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-3: de thos nas yul ma ga dha nas don mthun bsel ba dang bcas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-4: yul ko sa lar 'gro bar brtsams shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-5: yul ko sa la nas kyang don mthun bsel ba dang bcas pas yul ma ga dhar 'gro bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-6: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yul ma ga dha nas don mthun bsel ba dang bcas pa yul ko sa lar 'phags nas de gang gi tshe sa mtshams kyi bar las 'das te yul ko sa lar zhugs pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-8: shes ldan dag ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di ni gtum pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-12: rtsal che ba zhes grags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-13: gal te don mthun chom rkun pas bcom par gyur na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-14: des bdag cag la rkun rdzas sbyin par nus kyis bsel ba phyir thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-15: don mthun dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-16: ded dpon gal te de lta na de ltar bgyi'o zhes de dag gis bsel ba phyir btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-17: chom rkun pa dag gis bya ma rta bzhag ste 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211a-18: bya ma rta dag gis bsel ba phyir btang ba de mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-0: shes ldan dag bsel ba phyir log gis don mthun gzhom par byas 'dong ngo zhes de dag gis @211b don mthun s'a la'i dgon par zhugs pa bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-1: de na tshong pa kha cig ni bsad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-3: de na gang dag byer ba de dag mgo sa rdul gyis bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-4: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-5: lha bdag cag tshong pa rnams khyod kyi yul du tshong par mi rung bar rnam par bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-7: lha bdag cag chom rkun pa dag gis bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-8: rgyal pos dmag dpon 'phags skyes po la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-9: gzhon nu song la chom rkun pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-10: rkun rdzas dag myur du khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-11: dmag dpon 'phags skyes pos lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-12: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che pa'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-15: dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te; myur ba myur bar s'a la'i dgon par song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-16: de'i bar skabs na chom rkun pa dag s'a la'i dgon pa shin tu stug po'i nang na zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-17: bag phab ste rkun rdzas bgod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-18: 'phags skyes pos kyang de dag gi steng du brdzis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-19: de na chom rkun pa kha cig ni bsad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-21: chom rkun pa drug cu ni gson por bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-22: de nas g-yul las rnam par rgyal zhing chom rkun pa dang rkun rdzas khyer te ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-23: rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-24: lha chom rkun pa ni 'di dag lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:211b-25: rkun rdzas ni 'di dag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-0: @212a *// rgyal pos chom rkun pa dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-1: shes ldan dag ngas 'di skad ces nga'i yul du gang gis kyang chom rkun mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-2: gang nga'i yul du chom rkun byed pa de ngas gsad pa'i gyod la bskrin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-3: bcom pa rnams kyi rkun rdzas ni nga'i mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin no zhes dril gyi sgra bsgrags pa byas pa de khyod kyis ma thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-5: 'o na khyed kyis ci'i phyir tshong pa 'di dag bcom /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-6: lha bdag cag 'tsho ba ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-7: gal te de lta na yang ci'i phyir gzhan gsad par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-8: lha 'jigs pa bstan pa'i slad du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-9: ngas kyang khyed la sngon sus kyang ma bstan pa de lta bu'i 'jigs pa bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-10: rgyal po de gtum pas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-11: shes ldan dag deng la chom rkun pa 'di dag gsad sar khrid la lag pa dang rkang pa chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-12: tshong ba 'di dag gi ci phrogs pa nga'i bang mdzod nas byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-13: blon po de dag gis chom rkun pa de dag ngur khrod du khrid de lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-15: tshong pa rnams la rkun rdzas rgyal po'i bang ba dang mdzod nas byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bdag gi rgud pa dang gzhan gyi rgud pa la yang dang yang du so sor rtogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-17: bdag gi 'byor pa dang gzhan gyi 'byor pa la yang dang yang du so sor rtogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212a-19: dge slong dag bdag dang gzhan gyi rgud pa la ni yid 'byung ba'i gnas yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-0: @212b bdag dang gzhan gyi 'byor pa yang yid 'byung ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-1: dge slong dag langs shing langs shing ngur khrod rgyur 'gro bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-2: dge slong ma dag kyang langs shing langs shing dur khrod rgyur 'gro bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-3: de'i tshe na rab tu mang po dag dur khrod rgyur dong zhing de dang de dag gis chom rkun pa dag la nges par brtag par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-4: mi gzhan zhig kyang de dag nyid la rtog cing 'dug pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-5: gal te don 'dod pa 'ga' zhig gis 'di dag la lan tsha'i sman rtsabs blud par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-6: des na 'di dag 'di nas shi 'phos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-7: ma gzhon nu dag gi nu zho 'thung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-8: dge slong ma de dag gi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-9: dge slong ma skyong ma zhes bya ba sbom mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-10: glen ma mi gsal ba zhig 'dug pa des de thos nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-11: gal te bdag bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu las yongs su nyams par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-12: bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-13: ci zhig rnyed kyis bdag song la lan tshva'i sman rtsabs bslangs te 'di dag la blud par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-14: dge slong ma skyong ma de dge slong ma rnams kyi nang nas phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-15: gnas su song nas de nas lan tsha'i sman rtsabs kyi phru ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-16: kha phor drug cu blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-17: chom rkun pa dag gi drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-18: chom rkun pa de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag gis nyen cing srog la mi ltos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:212b-19: skom pas gdungs pa dag gis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-0: kye ma 'phags ma 'dis bdag cag skom gyis gdungs pa rnams @213a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-1: la bum pa de nas skom blud na ci ma rung snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-2: skyong mas bsod nams kyi 'du shes kyis re re la kham phor byin te lan tshva'i sman rtsabs brims pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-3: gang gis 'thungs pa de dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-4: de bzhin du thams cad dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-5: skyong ma chom rkun pa de dag la lan tshva'i sman rtsabs 'brim par byed pa na nam sros par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-6: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang sgo bcad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-7: skyong ma 'ongs nas des dal bus khad kyis khad kyis sgo gtan brdungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-8: dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-9: sgo gtan rdung bar byed pa 'di su /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-10: skyong mas smras pa; bdag skyong ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-11: khyod nam sros nas ga las 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-12: phu nu mo dag rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-13: rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-14: ci khyed kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-17: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-18: 'on te dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-24: ras yug chen sbyor du bcug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-26: phu nu mo dag ci khyed cag la 'bras chan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213a-29: ras yug chen sbyor du gzhug pa btsal ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-0: khyed cag gis chom rkun pa @213b drug cu po lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-1: rkang pa bcad pa de dag mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-3: bdag gis lan tshva'i sman rtsabs bslangs te de dag 'thung du bcug nas 'thungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-4: de dag dus la bab pas ma gzhon nu dag gi nu zho 'thung du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-5: skal chad ma khyod lto pham par 'gyur ba dag gis bkang la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-6: nged cag rjes su yi rang bar byed du 'jud dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-7: de bdag la yang dag par pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba ma byung ngam snyam du 'gyod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-8: des skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-9: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-11: dge slong dag dge slong ma de la 'du shes kyang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-12: sems pa yang yod pas pham par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-14: dge slong ngam dge slong mas nad pa la ci nas kyang nad pa dus byed par gyur cig snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis sman sbyin par mi bya bar 'di ltar ci nas kyang nad sos par gyur cig snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis sman sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-15: dge slong gis nad pa la ci nas kyang nad pa dus byed par gyur cig snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis sman sbyin par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:213b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-0: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos nye bar 'khor la sogs pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag @214a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-1: rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-2: bcu bdun sde dag gal te gcig la las su bsko ba bab na yang de dag thams cad bsdongs te byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-3: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gtsug lag khang der mtshan thogs thag tu chos mnyan pa byung nas der de dag thams cad kyis bsdongs te tron byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-4: phyi de nyin par dge 'dun gyi bsro gang byung nas der yang de dag thams cad kyis bsdongs te tron byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-5: de'i phyi de nyin par bcu bdun sde las gcig la dge skos bab nas de'i nyin mo yang thams cad kyis gtsug lag khang brgyan te 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-6: de na dge skos tron byed pa'i tshe bcu bdun sde las gcig la blo byung ba bdag ni chad kyis nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-7: mi bcu drug gis ci'i phyir tron mi nus snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-8: de bzhin du re re la yang blo de lta bu byung nas gzhan bcu drug po thams cad so sor nyal du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-9: dge skos de 'ba' zhig gcig pus mtshan thog thag las byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-10: mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-11: mar me'i kong bu dag bsdus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-13: gtsug lag khang chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-15: dus shes par byas nas stan bshams shing mchod rten gyi 'khor sar bdug spos brims te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-16: gtsug lag khang gi steng du 'greng nas gand'i brdung bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-17: de nas bcu drug po de dag gand'i'i sgras sad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214a-18: rang rang gi gnas khang dag nas lhung bzed thogs te byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-0: de dag gis @214b dge skos de gcig pu phar rgyugs tshur rgyug cing 'dug pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-1: de dag gis phan tshun smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-2: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di gcig pu phar rgyug tshur rgyug cing 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-3: yu bu cag las sus kyang 'di'i grogs ma byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-5: kho bo la blo byung ba bdag ni chad kyi nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-6: mi bcu drug gis ci'i phyir tron mi nus snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-7: de bzhin du gzhan yang de skad zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-9: thams cad kyis de skad smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-10: de nas bcu drug po dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-11: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di bdag cag gi 'phral gyi bya ba thams cad la thog mar 'gro ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-12: bdag cag gis 'di'i grogs ma byas pa ni yu bu cag gis ma legs pa byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-13: 'di bdag cag la gshe bar 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-14: zan zos ma thag tu bzod pa gsol bar bya'o zhes de dag gis zan zos nas bzod pa gsol bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-15: gzhon pa rnams kyis ni de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-16: rgan pa rnams kyis ni mgul nas 'khyud de tshe dang ldan pa bzod par gsol zhes byas nas de cang mi smra ba nyid du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-17: de dang ches bshes pa gcig yod pa des ga ga tshil byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-18: des dgod par brtsams te bzod do zhes kyang zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-20: de ni thabs legs pa yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-21: gzhan gyis kyang ga ga tshil byas shing de bzhin du thams cad kyi bar gyis ga ga tshil byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:214b-22: de rlung gyen du 'chugs te dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-1: cing mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-2: dge slong rnams gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-3: kye bcu bdun sde dag ci'i phyir brtad cing mya ngan byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-5: bdag cag sngon ni bcu bdun sder gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-6: da ni bcu drug sder gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-7: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yid du 'ong pa dang bral zhing pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-8: dge slong de dag gis ma legs so zhes smras te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-9: bcu drug po de dag kyang mtha' cig tu dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-10: sems khong du chud cing 'khod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-11: dge slong gzhan dag gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-12: dge slong de dag gis sbyor bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-13: tshe dang ldan pa bcu bdun sde 'di dag ni sog ma'i me bzhin du skad cig gis 'bar zhing skad cig gis shi bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-14: yud tsam zhig gis rgod bag byed cing yud tsam zhig gis sems khong du chud cing 'khod do zhes zer ro; ;de dag mya ngan gyi mes yid gdungs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-15: yongs su spyod kyang cang mi smra bar 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-17: dge slong dag dge slong de rnams la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-18: yang dge slong gis ga ga tshil mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-19: byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-0: mnyan yod nas ha cang mi ring ba @215b na ri brags shig yod pa de na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-1: de yang dad pa can bzang ba dge ba'i bsams pa can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-3: gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-5: skar khung dra ba can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-8: mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa zhig byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-9: gtsug lag khang der dge slong drug cus dbyar gnas pa dag byas te dong nas khyim bdag des der ma byin par len pa dag gi khri'am khri'u dag mi rkus par gyis shig ces srung ma'i mi bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-10: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge slong gzhan drug cu ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brags der phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-11: bsti gnas rnyan par byed pa na mi zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-12: 'phags pa dag khyed cag ci'i slad du gtsug lag khang du mi gnas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-13: bzhin bzang gtsug lag khang ga la yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-15: dge slong de dag der dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-17: des 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bsnyen bkur byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-18: gnas khang dag bskos nas khri dang khri'u dang stan nang tshangs can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-19: la ba la sogs pa dag phul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-20: sbyangs tsags g-yar nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-21: 'phags pa dag re zhig chab btsag par mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-22: de'i bar du bdag gis khyim bdag la brjod par bgyi'o zhes mi de khyim bdag gi drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:215b-24: khyim bdag dgyes pa skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-1: khang du dge slong glo bur du lhags pa drug cu mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-2: khyim bdag gus par bsgrim pa dang bcas pas nang mi dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-3: shes ldan dag kho bo'i gtsug lag khang du dge slong gi dge 'dun byon pa de dag legs par sbyar ba'i btung bas tshim par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-4: bu ram dang hvags dang li khar dang dgun dang bal bu se'u long zhig ces khyim bdag legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sbyar nas gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-5: dge slong dag kyang chu btsags te rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-6: khyim bdag des dge slong de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-7: des gtsug lag khang de mtsho padmas gang ba bzhin du mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-8: rgya cher dad pa'i shugs kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyud kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-9: grong ngam yang na dgon pa'ang rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-10: gshong ngam yang na thang yang rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-11: gang na 'os pa gnas pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-12: sa gzhi de ni dga' byed yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-13: de nas legs par sbyar ba'i btung ba sta gon byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-14: rang gi lag nas dge slong gi dge 'dun de tshim par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-15: rang nyid kyis pog por thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-16: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-17: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216a-18: khyim bdag des rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-0: sang bdag gi sdum par 'phags pa'i dge 'dun @216b gyis gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-1: dge slong rnams kyis kyang dang du blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-2: khyim bdag des rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-3: khyim bdag des phyi de nyin par zas bsod pas dge slong dag tshim par byas shing dus ma yin par yang btung ba blud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-4: dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-5: phyis kyang de kho na bzhin du dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis yon bshad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-6: khyim bdag de rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-7: 'phags pa dag bdag gis gtsug lag khang 'di bdag nyid kyi slad du yang bgyid du ma stsal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-8: nye du rnams kyi slad du yang bgyid du ma stsal kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-9: 'di ltar 'phags pa rnams kyi slad du bgyid du stsal pa lags kyis 'di nyid du dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-10: bdag gis 'phags pa rnams la yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-11: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-12: khyim bdag gnyan yod na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-13: dus dang dus su dge slong che ge mo zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-14: che ge mo zhig gis ni mi sdug pa'i bar grub bo zhes shes pa brda sprod pa dag kyang thos par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-15: rgyal po yang bstan pa la shin tu dad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-16: btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-17: bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-19: dge bsnyen ma sa ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:216b-21: gzhan yang dad pa can mang du yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-2: chos kyi longs spyod chen po yang 'grub pas bdag cag de nyid du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-3: 'phags pa dag chos kyi longs spyod ni 'phags pa bdag nyid la rag las pa lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-4: zang zing gi longs spyod ni bdag la rag las pa lags pas dgyes pa skyed cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-5: cung zad kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-6: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pa can gyi dad pa spel bar bya zhing sbyin bdag la rjes su snying brtse bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-8: 'di nyid du 'khod par bya'o zhes de dag der 'khod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-9: blo brtan pas gtsug lag khang de'i phyi nang bcas par so sor brtag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-10: gtsug lag khang de me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-11: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa shin tu dga' ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-12: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-13: tshe dang ldan pa dag gtsug lag khang 'di me tog phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-14: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa shin tu dga' ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-15: gal te bdag cag gis 'dir dbyar snga ma gnas par khas blangs na me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad yongs su longs spyad par mi 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-16: bdag cag gis nges par dbyar phyi ma gnas par khas blang bar bya'o zhes de dag gis der dbyar phyi ma gnas par khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217a-17: khyim bdag de la gtsug lag khang de gcig pu 'ba' zhig yod pas de sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-0: ri brags @217b de na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags pa de dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-1: ri brags de'i nye 'khor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-2: ri brags kyi nye 'khor ba de dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad gtsug lag khang de nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-3: der dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-4: ston zla tha chung gi g-yon can dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-5: dgag dbye byas ma thag tu 'dus te bdag cag gis las ci zhig byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-6: des brtsal mi dgos par lo skor du longs spyod cing bde bar 'khod par 'gyur zhes phan tshun gros byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-7: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-8: sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 'di dag gzhom par bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-10: de dag ni sgo 'phar brgya snyed bzla ba byas kyang lto khengs pa 'grub par dka' bas de dag la ci yang med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-11: bdag cag ci'i phyir yul de srid du bsdad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-12: de na dge slong gi rgyus shes pa gcig 'dug pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-14: de dag la mang du yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-15: ji ltar re zhig gtsug lag khang 'di gang gi yin pa khyim bdag de ni dad can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-16: khyim bdag de la yang gtsug lag khang 'di gcig pu 'ba' zhig yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:217b-18: bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-1: lag khang gzhan med pas ri brags pa 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-2: ri brags 'di'i nye 'khor na yang gtsug lag khang gzhan med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-3: ri brags kyi nye 'khor ba 'di dag kyang sbyin pa dang bya bar sems pa gang yin pa de thams cad gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du sbyin zhing byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-4: 'dir dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong rnams la rnyed pa mang po byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-5: gal te yid mi ches na song la ltos shig dang rang nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-6: gal te de lta na khyod nyid je song la mngon sum du gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-9: legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-10: kho bo 'gro'o zhes des gos tshags bcos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-11: 'phags shing de nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-12: gtsug lag khang der zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-13: ji tsam na sgo khang na rgan zhugs shig 'dug nas g-yon can de de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te dri bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-14: 'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-15: bzhin bzang khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-16: 'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-18: bzhin bzang gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218a-19: phongs pa ni ji lta bu yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-0: 'phags pa @218b gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni gtsug lag khang lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-1: gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-2: bzhin bzang 'o na 'di ni gtsug lag khang yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-4: 'di na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-5: 'di na yo byad med pa ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-6: 'phags pa zas za ba ni 'ga' yang sa rdul mi za la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-7: gos dag gyon pa ni 'ga' yang shing shun dag mi gyon pas khyed cag la gos cung zad mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-8: rgan zhugs de drang ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-9: des g-yon can de'i lag nas bzung ste gnas khang du bcug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-10: bzhin bzang gos kyi gdang gos dag gis phur shog cing 'dug pa la ltos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-11: 'phags pa ci 'di khyod kyi lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-13: bzhin bzang 'di kho bo gang zag gi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-14: 'phags pa 'o na khyod ni gor ma bkum par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nam chos sgrog pa zhig lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-15: bzhin bzang kho bo ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan yang ma yin la chos sgrog pa yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-16: 'di ltar kho bo ni dge 'dun gsar bu dge tshul zhig yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-17: 'phags pa de ni mjal na 'di na dge 'dun gyi gnas mal cung zad mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-18: bzhin bzang mang du yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-19: re zhig kho bo'i byug ris su yang dngos po bdun po dag 'thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-20: 'phags pa de yang mjal gyis 'di zhu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:218b-21: gtsug lag khang 'di na gang la la 'tshal ma bgyid pa de ci rdza mkhan gyi snod du 'tshod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-0: @219a *// bzhin bzang khyod kyis gnas khang 'di dag mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-2: bzhin bzang gnas khang 'di zangs ma'i snod kyis gang zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-3: g-yon can des bsams pa legs par brid zin gyis da ni 'gro'o snyam nas g-yon can des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-4: 'phags pa khyod kyi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams pa ni bdag gi don yongs su nyams pa lags pas bdag slad kyis kyang mchi'i da ni mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-5: bzhin bzang de bzhin gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-6: g-yon can des rgan zhugs de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-7: g-yon can de chom rkun pa de dag gi drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-8: pad ma'i mig can dag rdzas thams cad kyis gang ba'i gru bo che skams la 'dug gis phrogs shig phrogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-9: de nas gcig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-10: de na 'khod pa'i rab tu byung ba drug cu po dag ni 'phong gi slob dpon sha stag yin zhes grags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-11: de bzhin du gzhom par mi nus kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-12: gang gis tshe de dag mtshan mo chos nyan pa de'i tshe gzhom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-14: nyi ma gang la de dag gi chos nyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-16: tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la 'byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-17: de la tshes brgyad ni thal zin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-18: tshes bcu bzhi la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-19: de dag sor mo dag gis nyi ma bgrang zhing 'khod 'khod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-20: ji tsam na tshes bcu bzhi la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219a-21: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo bton te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-0: dge 'dun gyi @219b gso sbyong byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-1: chos sgrog pa seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs te 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-2: mi mchog 'dul ba kha lo sgyur mdzad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-3: kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod pa de bzhin gshegs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-4: dbang po zhi zhing nyer zhi zhi la mkhas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-5: mnyan yod bzhugs pa'i bka' bzhin byed la gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-6: zhes smra bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-7: g-yon can de dag gis sgo brdungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-8: dge slong de dag gis tshor nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-9: shes ldan dag khyed cag su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-10: 'phags pa dag bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-11: dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-12: ri brags nas skye bo'i tshogs dag chos nyan du lhags gor ma chag gis sgo dbye'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-13: de dag gis sgo phye ba dang de dag zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-14: ji tsam na gzhom par brtsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-15: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-16: shes ldan dag khyed cag na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-17: bdag cag rigs kyi bu dag go zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-18: da nged cag 'joms par byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-20: 'phags pa dag bdag cag la ming gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-21: slad rol du ni rigs kyi bu dag ces bgyi la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-22: nang du ni chom rkun pa dag ces bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-23: khyed cag ming 'dogs par byed pa ni nyams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-24: g-yon can de dag gis dge slong dag bcom ste dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-25: dge slong bcom pa de dag gis gros byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-26: tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag ma dang bcas par bzho bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas re zhig khyim bdag 'di phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:219b-27: bdag cag la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-1: yod nyid du dong na der bdag cag re re la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos gos dag gis mi phongs par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gros byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-3: mtshan mo 'gebs pas 'dong zhing nyin mo thibs por zhugs te 'gro bar bya'o zhes de dag gis khyim bdag la yang ma bltas par dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-4: ji tsam na mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-5: dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa de dag gis dge slong de dag sgren mor sgo'i gam yo na rgyu ba mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-6: gcer bu sgre byi dag khyed cag 'dir ci 'dod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-7: 'di khyed kyi gtsug lag khang ma yin la 'dug gnas kyang ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-8: de dag gis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-9: bdag cag gcer bu dag ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-12: 'di lta bu dag dge slong yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-13: gang dag rkun po dag gis bcom pa de dag ji lta bu yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-18: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-19: 'ongs pa legs so zhes de dag gis sgo phye nas dge slong de dag 'jug tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-20: de dag la la las ni chos gos byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-21: la las ni sham thabs byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-22: la las ni rngul zan [*gzan?] byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-23: la las ni lhung bzed byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-24: la las ni chu tshags byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220a-25: bgo bsha' ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad bgo bsha' byas pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-0: dge slong rnams @220b kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-2: mi shes pa la gtsug lag khang gi sgo gya tshom du dbye bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-3: gal te 'ga' zhig mtshan mo sgo 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-4: de'i ming dang rus dri bar bya zhing gal te ngo shes na sgo dbye bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-5: ngo mi shes na sgo dbye bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-6: gzhan yang chos mnyan pa la bab pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-7: dge slong mel tshe ba gzhag par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-8: gal te chom rkun 'ongs na gand'i 'on cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-18: shur bu phre'u 'on cig ces tsham ngam bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-19: gzhan yang ngas dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-20: dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis chos mnyan pa la bab pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-21: dge skos la tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gi sgo bcad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-23: chos smra ba la gsol ba btab bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-24: bshang ba dang gci ba'i skyabs byi dor byas sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-25: dge slong dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:220b-26: de nas chom rkun pas bcom pa'i dge slong de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-0: tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo cag gis khyed cag la bgo bsha' ji lta ba bzhin du bgo bsha' byas mod kyi 'on kyang da dung khyed cag chos gos @221a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-1: dag gis brel gyis khyed cag khyim bdag gang gi gtsug lag khang du bcom par gyur pa'i khyim bdag de ni dad pa can bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa can yin pas de nyid kyi gtsug lag khang du deng zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-2: de nyid kyis khyed la chos gos dag gis mi brel bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-3: dge slong de dag mtha' gcig tu dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-4: phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-5: tshe dang ldan pa dag tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa 'di dag zer ba ni bzang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-6: bdag cag gis khyim bdag la ma bltas par 'ongs pas yang phyir de nyid du dong na des bdag cag la chos gos dag gis bgo bsha' byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang yod do zhes de dag yang phyir der dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-7: de nas khyim bdag des mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-8: 'phags pa dag ci'i slad du khyed kyis bdag la ma gzigs par bzhud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-9: dge slong de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-10: khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag ma dang bcas par bzho bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-12: des na bdag cag la blo byung ba re zhig khyim bdag 'di phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-13: bdag cag la sbyin du bcug ste yang ci byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-14: bdag cag mnyan yod du dong na der bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos gos dag gis mi phongs par byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221a-15: de'i phyir bdag cag mnyan yod du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-0: 'phags pa dag gal te @221b bdag gi gtsug lag khang bcom pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-1: ci khyim na bdag dbang ba'i rdzas dag kyang bcom snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-2: 'phags pa dag khyed cag gang gi slad du byon pa ni legs so zhes khyim bdag des yang rgya cher gus pa dang bcas pas mkhos su phab ste dge slong re re la yang yo byad bcu gsum bcu gsum phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-3: chom rkun pa de dag yang phyir 'ongs te gtsug lag khang gi sgo rdung bar byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-4: dge slong rnams kyis tshor nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-5: tshe dang ldan pa dag g-yon can de dag nyid lhags kyis tsham ngam gyis shig ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-16: shur bu phre'u 'on cig ces tsham ngam bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-17: g-yon can de dag skrag ste 'byer bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-18: lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-19: legs gsungs rkang gnyis gtso bo thub pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-20: nyan thos rnams kyi tsham ngam gang bstan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-21: tsham ngam rab brtson pa dag mchog yin gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-22: g-yon can g-yul la sdar ba go gyon pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-23: lnga brgya dag ni de lta ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-24: g-yon can de dag la dge slong gi rgyus shes pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-25: shes ldan dag khyed cag ci'i phyir 'byer bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:221b-28: 'di na 'khod pa'i rab tu byung ba drug bcu po dag ni 'phong gi slob dpon sha stag yin no zhes zer bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-0: gzhan yang bdag cag gis gand'i zhes bya ba la sogs @222a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-1: pa'i mtshon de lta bu dag gi ming ni sngon lan 'ga' yang ma thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-3: de dag ni mtshon ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-5: re zhig gand'i zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-7: gand'i'i the'u zhes bya ba ni gang gis rdung bar byed pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-8: dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni dus yongs su gcod par byed pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-11: lnga pa zhes bya ba de dag ni chos gos dag gi ming ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-12: gtur bu zhes bya ba ni gang du de dag gzhug pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-16: shur bu phre'u zhes bya ba de dag gi ska rags kyi ming yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-17: khyed cag ma sdar bar yang phyir 'dong la gzhom par bya'o zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-18: de dag yang phyir log ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-19: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis ya gad gtsugs [*btsugs?] te 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-20: de na rgan zhugs shig mel tshe bar bzhag pa des chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'dzeg pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-22: g-yon can 'di dag ni gang dag gis bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos phrogs te sgren mor bzhag pa dag yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-23: gal te 'di dag la btang snyoms byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-24: yang 'di dag gis bdag cag gi lhung bzed dang chos gos phrogs te sgren mor bzhag par 'gyur bas 'di dag bsdigs par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-25: rgan zhugs des dal bus khad kyis khad kyis song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222a-26: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon de'i mgor gand'i 'phangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-0: de bsnun pa @222b drag pos phog pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag gis nyen nas tshegs chen pos babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-1: cung zhig tu song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-3: rgan zhugs des chom rkun pa chom rkun pa zhes ku tso'i sgra phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-4: dge slong rnams kyis chos nyan pa bcad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-7: chom rkun pa de dag gar dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-10: 'dzegs pa na kho bos bsdigs nas byer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-11: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-12: gal te byer na legs so zhes de dag babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-13: ji tsam na mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-14: gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor so sor brtags par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-15: chom rkun pa de dag 'dzegs par gyur pa'i phyogs de gang yin zhes de dag gis so sor brtags pa na khrag mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-16: de dag khrag rjes su dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-17: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon bsad pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-18: mthong nas kyang bslab pa 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pas skrag ste smra bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-19: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag sngon ma bcom gyis bdag cag gang gis pham par gyur pa'i ltung ba byung bas da ni bcom par gyur to zhes de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-21: dge slong dag khyed cag la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:222b-22: yang dge slong gis ci nas kyang 'di la bsnun pas bsnun par bya'o snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis 'phang bar mi bya bar 'di ltar glo'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-1: bya zhing bsdigs pa bskyed pa'i phyir tsham ngam bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-2: dge slong gis ci nas kyang bsnun pas bsnun par bya'o snyam pa de lta bu'i sems kyis 'phen par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-4: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gcig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-5: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-8: rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la dus gzhan na sems can zhugs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-9: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-10: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de nye du zad par gyur cing nor dang longs spyod kyang zad par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-11: de'i chung ma yang dus la bab nas des bu la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-12: bu kho bos ni rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nor sgrub tu 'gro mi nus kyis rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-13: bus smras pa yab gal te de lta na bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-14: bu legs so zhes des khye'u de khrid de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-15: dge slong gi drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-16: rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-17: 'phags pa bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223a-19: ci khye'u 'di yang rab tu 'byung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-1: dge slong de khye'u de 'dod pas de bu dang bcas te rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-2: chos nyid kyi sa na rgan pa'i mtha' nas rnyed pa 'thob la gzhon pa'i mtha' nas las su bsko ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-3: rgan zhugs kyi bu rtag tu las su sko bar byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-5: yab bdag cag gnyis gang cung zad zil gyis non pa de thams cad thos pa nyung ba las gyur pa lags kyis bzhengs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-6: skol cag gnyis yul gzhan du bzhud la thos pa gzung bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-8: bu legs kyis 'dong ngo zhes de gnyis yul gzhan du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-9: 'on kyang gzhon pa'i mtha' nyid nas las su bsko bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-10: de gnyis son ma thag kho nar las su bsko bar bskos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-11: bus rgan zhugs la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-12: yab mnyan yod na las su bsko ba mchis su lags kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-13: de na bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje mngon sum du bzhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-14: dus dang dus su dge slong che ge mo zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-15: che ge mo zhig gis ni mi sdug pa'i bar grub bo zhes shes pa brda sprod pa yang thos par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-16: rgyal po yang bstan pa la shin tu dad cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-17: btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-18: rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-19: bla mkhyen drang srong byin dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-21: dge bsnyen ma sa ga dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-23: gzhan yang dad pa can mang du mchis pas de na zang zing gi longs spyod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:223b-24: chos kyi longs spyod chen po yang mchis kyis der bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-1: de gnyis ci dgar ljongs su 'khod nas mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing dong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-2: mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'dong ba'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-3: mnyan yod du phyir phyin to; ;ji tsam na rgyal byed kyi tshal dang nye bar phyin pa na gand'i yang brdungs nas bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-4: yang gtsug lag khang du gand'i brdungs kyis myur ba myur bar bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-6: rgas par gyur pas shin tu ngal zhing 'gro mi nus pas de dal bus 'gro ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-7: bus de'i gnya' ba nas bzung ste phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-8: rgan zhugs des myur ba myur bar 'gro bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-10: thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig yin gyis yang dbul bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-11: bus des rgan zhugs de yang de bzhin du phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-12: rgan zhugs de sa la kha bub tu 'gyel nas de'i kha phang los glogs pa'i sas gang ste dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-13: bu des dud mos btab ste rgan zhugs kyi ro de lam gyi mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-14: de nas bu des lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-15: rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-16: dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-17: rgan zhugs kyi bu 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-19: khyod kyi rgan zhugs de ga la 'dug ces dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-20: gsar bu des ngu bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-21: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-22: bu ci'i phyir ngu bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-24: bdag gi rgan zhugs de dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-25: dge slong de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224a-26: bu 'du byed thams cad kyi chos de lta bu yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-0: khyod ni @224b legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba yin pas mya ngan ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-3: dge slong de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-4: bu 'o na khyod kyis mtshams med pa'i las gang yin pa yang byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-5: pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba gang yin pa yang byung bas yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas par 'gyur bas da ngu ba'i rigs so zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-7: dge slong dag dge slong de la ni ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-8: yang dge slong lam du zhugs pas dge slong lam gyis dub pa dbul bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-9: ngas dge slong lam du zhugs pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-10: dge slong lam du zhugs pas dge slong lam gyis dub pa ngal sor gzhug par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-15: bar bur snod kyi rdzas blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-17: gal te 'gro nus na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-18: gal te 'gro mi nus na ches sngar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-21: snod dag byin len byed du bcug nas so sor brtag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-22: gal te 'ong mi nus na zas mnos te bsu bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-23: dus ma yin na skom gyis bsu bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:224b-24: dge slong lam du zhugs pas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-0: @225a *// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-1: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-2: btsun pa rgan zhugs kyi bu 'dis pha srog dang bral yang mtshams ma mchis pa'i kha na ma tho bas kyang ma reg la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-3: pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba yang ma byung ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-5: dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-6: 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis pha srog dang phral yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-7: mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas ma reg ste de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-8: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-9: ri brags shig na btso blag mkhan zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-10: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-15: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma las bu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-16: de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-17: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ri brags der dus ston byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-18: de la gos bkru bshal bya ba mang po dag byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-20: bu gos mang po dag bkru bshal bya dgos pas kho bo khyim du song ste zan za mi nus kyi tshur shog gos dag khyer te 'dod [*'dong] ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-21: phyir song la zas khyer te shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-22: de bu dang lhan cig gos dag khyer te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-23: bu phyir song ste zan khyer te 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-24: des zan zos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225a-25: bu kho bo ngal gyis nyal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-0: khyod re zhig gos dag bkru bshal @225b gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-1: bus smras pa de ltar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-2: btso blag mkhan de phyogs gcig tu glos phab ste gnyid log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-3: de spyi cer zhig yin pas de'i mgo la sbrang bu chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-4: ji tsam na btso blag mkhan gyi bu des gos dag bkru bshal byas nas pha'i gan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-5: pha'i mgo la sbrang bu chags pa mthong nas des bskrad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-6: sbrang bu khrag gis myos pa 'phur du ma btub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-7: bu de mi bzod pa skyes te bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-8: sbrang bu 'dis bdag gi pha gson bzhin du khrag 'thung bar byed kyis gsad par bya'o snyam nas bu des de la spang leb kyis bsnun pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-9: sbrang bu de ni bros te song gis pha'i klad pa zhom nas de dus la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-10: lhas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-11: dgra bo blo gros ldan pa mchog yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-12: mdza' bshes blo gros bral ba de lta min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-13: blo gros chung ngus sbrang bu gsad snyam nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-14: tho bas pha yi klad pa bcom par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-15: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-16: de'i tshe de'i dus na btso blag mkhan gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na btso blag mkhan gyi bu gang yin pa de ni rgan zhugs kyi bu 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-18: 'dis de'i tshe yang pha srog dang phral yang mtshams med pa'i kha na tho bas ma reg la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-19: 'dis da ltar yang pha srog dang phral yang mtshams med pa'i kha na ma tho bas kyang ma reg la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-20: pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba yang ma byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-22: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:225b-23: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-3: de'i tshe na nya pa lnga brgya chu klung yid 'ong ldan la rten cing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-4: de dag la rgya mo spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-5: spyod pa chen mo zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-6: de dag lan 'ga' ni rgya mo spyod pa 'jud par byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-7: lan 'ga' ni spyod pa chen mo 'jud par byed de /
