K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-8: gang gi tshe nya dag nyo ba med pa de'i tshe na rgya mo spyod pa 'jud par byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-9: gang gi tshe nya dag nyo ba yod pa de'i tshe ni spyod pa chen mo 'jud par byed do; ;ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yangs pa can du dus ston byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-10: de dag gis rgya mo gnyis ka bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-11: nyis brgya lnga bcus ni rgya mo spyod pa bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-12: nyis brgya lnga bcus ni spyod pa chen po bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-13: gang dag gis rgya mo spyod pa bcug pa de dag gis ni nya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-16: chu srin byis pa gsod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-17: nya khyi pa la sogs mang po dag 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-21: rgya sran la sogs pa bzhin du phung po chen por rnam par bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-22: gang dag gis rgya mo spyod pa chen mo bcug pa de dag gis ni rgya mtsho chen po nas chu klung yid 'ong ldan du zhugs pa chu srin nya'i rigs bong tshod chen po nyal ba zin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226a-23: de dag gis de drang bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-0: de dag gis drangs pa na de sad nas nya pa nyis brgya lnga bcu @226b po de dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-1: rgya mo spyod pa chen mo khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-3: nya pa de dag gis nya pa nyis brgya lnga bcu po gzhan dag la shes ldan dag rgya mo spyod pa chen mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-4: bdag cag khyer gyis ra mda' zlog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-6: de dag gis thos nas nya pa nyis brgya lnga bcu po gzhan dag kyang lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-7: de nyid la rub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-8: des nya pa lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-9: rgya mo spyod pa chen mo khyer te rgyun phyogs su zhugs nas gzung bar ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-10: skyabs med pa de dag gis kun tu shes ldan dag rgya mo spyod pa chen mo dang bdag cag khyer gyis grogs gyis shig ces ra mda' bzlog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-11: las ma mthong ba'i mi ba lang rdzi dag dang phyugs rdzi dag dang shing gi [?] thun dag dang rtsva thun dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-13: lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-14: gzhan yang srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag log nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-15: de dag gis lus smas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-16: rnam par smas pa dag gis rgya mo ral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-17: rab tu ral pas chu srin de chu nas skam la phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-18: de la mgo bco brgyad dang mig sum cu rtsa drug yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-19: de'i mgo la la ni glang po che'i mgo 'dra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-21: la la ni rnga mo'i mgo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:226b-26: stag gi mgo dang; dom gyi mgo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-2: kun du chu klung yid 'ong ldan pa'i nya pa lnga brgyas rgya mtsho chen po nas chu klung yid 'ong ldan du zhugs pa'i chu srin nya'i rigs bong tshod chen po zhig rgya mo spyod pa chen mos zin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-3: chu nas skam la phyung zhing de la mgo bco brgyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-4: mig sum cu rtsa drug yod do zhes sgras khyab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-5: de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram du lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-6: kha cig ni ltad mo skyes par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-7: kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-8: rdzogs byed la sogs pa'i ston pa drug po yangs pa can na rten cing gnas pa dag kyang ltad mo skyes te der lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-9: skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang ya mtshan skyes te mig tshugs su rtog cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-10: shes ldan dag 'di'i mgo la la ni glang po che'i mgo 'dra la de nas rtog par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-11: de'i mgo la la ni khyi'i bar gyi mgo 'dra la de nas rtog par byed do zhes kyang zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-12: de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni mi mkhyen pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-15: rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-17: 'jig rten la phan par bzhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227a-24: rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-0: bslab pa gsum la legs @227b par bslabs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-1: dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-2: chu bo bzhi las rgal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-3: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-4: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyangs pa mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-5: mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-7: 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-8: yan lag drug dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-9: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-10: rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-11: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-12: lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-13: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-14: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-15: phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-16: brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni nyams par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-19: gang ni nyam nga bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-20: gang ni mi bde bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-24: gang ni ngan song la gzhol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-26: gang ni ngan song la bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-27: ngas gang ni ngan song gi lam nas bslang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-28: mtho ris dang thar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:227b-30: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying pa gang gi lag nas ni drang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-1: dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-2: gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten rnams 'bras bu dang bcas par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-3: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-4: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa ni yongs su smin par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-5: yongs su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-7: chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-9: sangs rgyas 'dul la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-10: dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro; ;ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-11: rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-13: rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-14: kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-15: gzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-16: srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-17: rab 'byams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa chu srin nya'i rigs gnod pa dang nyam nga ba mi bde ba thob par gyur pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-19: sngon gyi sangs rgyas dag la bya ba lhag par byas pa yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-20: ngas chu srin nya'i rigs 'di la rten te gdul bar gyur pa'i rgya mo chen mo drang bar byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228a-21: de'i phyir chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi 'gram du 'gro'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing bzhugs la @228b gson zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni gdul bar gyur pa'i skye bo la rjes su thugs brtse bas dus dang dus su sems can dmyal ba rgyur gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-8: gtsug lag khang rgyur gshegs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-9: don 'dir ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das klung rgyur gshegs par bzhed nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-10: chos nyid kyis ni gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-16: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-17: kha cig ni 'og logs su dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-18: kha cig ni steng logs su 'dong bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-19: gang dag 'og logs su 'dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-34: padma ltar gas pa chen por dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-35: sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab par byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:228b-36: sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-0: des sems can de dag gi @229a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-1: gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-2: 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-3: de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-4: de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-5: gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-6: 'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-7: de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-8: sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-9: gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-10: gang dag steng logs su dong ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-11: sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229a-32: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-3: bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog par byed cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-4: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-5: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya; ;'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-6: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-7: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-9: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-10: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-11: zhes bya ba yang smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-12: de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-13: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin du rjes su 'dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-14: de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-16: ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun logs su nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-17: sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-18: dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni long bur nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-19: yi dvags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-20: mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-21: stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g-yon par nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:229b-22: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag mthil g-yas par nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-0: lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par @230a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-2: nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-3: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor tu nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-5: de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi lte bar nub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-9: btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-10: rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-11: btsun pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-13: tshigs su bcad pa yang gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-14: kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-15: tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgos nas byung gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-16: de yis phyogs rnams thams cad snang bgyis pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-17: nyi gdugs bdal bar gyur pa ji bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-18: rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa rab spangs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-19: sangs rgyas 'gro ba mchog gi rgyur gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-20: rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-21: rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-22: de slad bstan pa rang blos dus mkhyen nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-23: thub pa khyu mchog dge sbyong skye dbang po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-24: nyan pa'i skye bo som nyi ldan rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-25: the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230a-26: dam pa dge ba dag gis bsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-0: tsha @230b chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-1: sangs rgyas mgon rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-2: bstan pa ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-3: skye bo'i tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-5: kun dga' bo de de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-7: kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-8: rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-9: kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung rgyur gshegs bzhed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-10: khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu chu klung rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long zhig ces bsgo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-12: tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das chu klung rgyur gshegs bzhed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-13: khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu chu klung rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long zhig ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-17: zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-18: grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-19: dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-20: thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:230b-21: dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-0: 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan @231a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-1: pa; mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-2: khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-3: glang po che ltar glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-4: seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-5: ngang ba'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-6: nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-7: bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-8: sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-9: dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-10: sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-11: ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-12: tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-13: mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-14: 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-15: zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-16: nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-17: yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-18: 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-19: mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231a-20: nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-0: thags bzang ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis @231b yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-1: brgya byin ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-2: tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-3: dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-4: spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-5: chu gter ltar ting nge ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-6: sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-7: glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-8: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-9: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-10: 'od 'dom gang gi gzugs can brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-11: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-12: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-13: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-14: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-15: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di nya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-23: nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-24: gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-25: chu klung yid 'ong ldan ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-26: 'khor des thag ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-27: mthong nas kyang gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni dge sbyong go'u ta ma ltad mo dang bral lo zhes grag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:231b-28: de yang ltad mo skyes te chu srin nya'i rigs blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ongs so zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-0: gang dag dad pa dang ldan pa de @232a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-1: dag ni ma dad pa de dag la shes ldan dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ltad mo dang bral ba kho na yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-2: bcom ldan 'das chu srin nya'i rigs las brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-3: skye bo'i tshogs chen po la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos cung zhig ston par bzhed gor ma chag go zhes zer zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-4: thub pa ltad mo bral ba'i dgongs ldan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-5: ltad mo med la skye ngan don med smra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-6: gzhan phan de la gzhol ba'i rgyal ba 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-7: lus can phan phyir nges par 'dir gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-8: de nas 'khor des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas 'phral kho nas mngon par langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-9: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-15: bla ma'i gnas lta bu dag la mngon par bzhengs pa mdzad mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor de'i dbus su gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-17: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan gshams [*bshams?] pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-18: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nya pa lnga brgya po de dag la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-19: bzhin bzang dag re zhig khyed cag ni nyes par byas pa'i las byed pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-20: des na da lta nya pa'i skye gnas dman par skyes shing khyed cag da ltar drag shul can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-21: lag pa khrag gis gos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232a-22: nyams pa dang rab tu nyams pa la zhen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-0: gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho @232b bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-1: 'di nas shi 'phos na khyed cag gi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-5: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ci zhig bgyi pa bka' stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-10: chu srin byis pa gsod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-11: nya khyi ba la sogs chu nas bton pa 'di dag thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa bzhin btang bar bgyi'o zhes de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa'i dus kyi mjug thogs su de dag btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-14: ngas ci nas kyang chu srin nya'i rigs ma gtogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-18: chu srin byis pa gsod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-19: nya khyi ba la sogs pa'i srog chags 'di dag chu ji lta ba kho na bzhin du chu klung yid 'ong ldan du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-20: chu srin nya'i rigs kyang sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran zhing mi'i skad brjod par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-21: nga dang thabs cig smra bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas kyang chu srin nya'i rigs ma gtogs pa nya dang rus sbal dang sbal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-23: chu srin byis pa gsod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-24: nya khyi ba la sogs pa'i srog chags de dag chu ji lta ba kho na bzhin du chu klung yid 'ong ldan du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:232b-25: chu srin nya'i rigs kyang sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran zhing mi'i skad brjod par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-1: dang thabs cig smra bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin nya'i rigs la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-3: bu khyod ser skya yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-4: bcom ldan 'das bdag ser skya lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-5: bu khyod ser skya yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-6: bde bar gshegs pa bdag ser skya lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-7: bu khyod la lus kyis nyes par spyad pa yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-9: bu khyod la ngag dang yid gnyis kyis nyes par spyad pa yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-10: bde bar gshegs pa mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-11: bu khyod kyis lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-12: bcom ldan 'das nyams su myong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-13: bu khyod kyis ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa nyams su myong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-14: bde bar gshegs pa nyams su myong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-15: 'o na khyod kyi mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-18: sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-22: khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-23: bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-24: bde bar gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o zhes gsol nas ngu ba la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-26: khyod ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas skyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233a-27: mi khom zhugs par gyur pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-0: de ltar ngas kyang ci @233b byar med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-1: don med ngus pas ci la phan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-2: thugs rje ldan rgyal nga la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-3: legs par sems ni dad gyis dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-6: des bcom ldan 'das la sems dad par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de la bzhin bzang 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-8: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-9: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes tshig gsum gyis chos bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-10: de nas 'khor de mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-11: shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas sngon gyi skye ba dran par byas shing mi'i skad kyang rjod par byed la bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig smra bar byed pa 'di su zhig yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang bzod par dka' ba yin pas bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar ni mi nus kyis bdag cag 'phags pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas 'phags pa kun dga' bo la don de zhu bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-13: 'phags pa kun dga' bos bdag cag la ji skad lung ston par 'gyur ba de de kho na bzhin du gzung bar bya'o zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-14: de nas 'khor de tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-15: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-16: 'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:233b-17: sngon gyi skye ba dran par bgyis shing mi'i skad kyang rjod par bgyid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-0: @234a *// bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig smra bar bgyid pa 'di su zhig lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-2: shes ldan ngag bcom ldan 'das nyid la don de zhus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-5: bzod par dka' ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-6: bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar rngo mi thog lags so; ;shes ldan dag kho bo la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsnyen par dka' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-7: bzod par dka' ba yin pas kho bos kyang bcom ldan 'das la don de zhu bar mi nus mod kyi; ;'on kyang khyod kyi don du zhu bar bya'o zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-8: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-10: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-11: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-12: sngon gyi skye ba dran par bgyis shing mi'i skad kyang rjod par bgyis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-13: bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig smra bar bgyid pa 'di su zhig lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-14: kun dga' bo 'di ni chu srin nya'i rigs yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-16: khyod chu srin nya'i rigs kyi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba las brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234a-17: chos dang ldan pa'i gtam nyan par 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin nya'i rigs kyi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba las @234b brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-1: dge slong rnams dang skye bo'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid bka' stsal par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-2: bcom ldan 'das las thos nas dge slong rnams dang skye bo'i tshogs dag 'dzin par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-3: bcom ldan 'das de ni dus lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-4: bde bar gshegs pa de ni dus lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-5: kun dga' bo de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-6: kun dga' bo sngon byung ba bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-7: skyes dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-8: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-9: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-10: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-12: de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-13: de'i tshe grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po kri kri zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-19: phyi dgra dang nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-20: chom rkun dang mu ge dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-22: s'a lu dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-23: ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-24: chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:234b-25: de nas shed bu gsang tshig 'dod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-0: gsang tshig tshol ba zhig yul dbus nas @235a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-2: de na bram ze rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-3: rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu son pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-4: yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyis ston par gyur pa zhig 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-5: shed bu de bram ze de'i drung du song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-6: zhi ba dang spyod lam zhi bas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-8: de nas bram ze des shed bu de la 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-9: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-10: kye shed bu khyod ga las 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-13: bdag yul dbus nas mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-14: mkhan po'i zhabs la sri zhu bgyid par 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-16: rig byed bklag pa'i slad du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-17: shed bu legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-18: de ni bram zes bya ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-19: shed bu des bram ze'i drung du rig byed bklag par bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-20: shed bu rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-21: gang gi tshe mi klog par gyur pa de'i tshe na lan dga' ni chu ngogs su nye reg byed du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-22: lan 'ga' ni grong khyer ltar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-23: lan 'ga' ni yam srog shing thur 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-24: ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na de dag mi klog par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-25: de'i tshe de dag yam sreg shing thur dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235a-26: de dag la lam gyi bar du bar skabs kyi gtam rjod pa 'di lta bu 'di byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-0: nye lnga'i rigs @235b dag je khyed cag las gang ni yul ga las 'ongs pa dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-1: de na shed bu gcig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-2: kho bo ni yul shar nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-4: kho bo ni lho lam nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-5: yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-6: kho bo ni nub kyi nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-7: yang gzhan zhig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-8: kho bo ni byang lam nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-10: kho bo ni yul dbus nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-12: shes ldan dag bdag cag gis yul thams cad mthong zhing thos nas yul dbus ma mthong ma thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-13: shar na blo can gnas pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-14: lho lam na ni yon byed 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-15: nub kyi yul na phra ma can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-16: byang lam na ni tshig rtsub po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-17: zhes tshigs su bcad pa yang smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-20: shes ldan dag yul dbus ni yul rnams kyi mchog yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-21: s'a lu dang bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-22: ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-23: slong mo ba brgyas khyab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-24: dbus pa'i skye bos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-25: mtha' 'khob pa'i skye bos spangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-26: skye bo mkhas pas bsten pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-27: de na chu klung gangg'a kha rje dang bsod nams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-28: bkra shis dang gtsang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-29: gtsang ba nyid kyi gnas su grags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-31: drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas zhes bya ba chu dgur bco brgyad 'bab pa yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-32: der drang srong rnams kyis dka' thub spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-33: rang gi lus nyid kyis mtho ris su 'dong ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:235b-34: kye shed bu de ni mjal gyis gzhan 'di 'dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-0: yul dbus na mkhas par bgrang @236a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-2: shes ldan dag kho bos dang po nyid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-3: shas ldan dag yul dbus ni dbus pa'i skye bos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-4: mtha' 'khob pa'i skye bos spangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-5: skye bo mkhas pas bsten pa'o zhes ma smras sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-6: shed bu khyod kyis de skad smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-7: shed bu yul dbus na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-8: dper na bdag cag gi mkhan po dang 'dra ba smra ba'i khyu mchog de lta bu dag yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-9: shes ldan dag yul dbus na bdag cag gi mkhan pos gang dag gi gdong du lta bar yang mi nus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-11: smra ba'i khyu mchog de lta bu dag yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-12: shed bu de dag la de lta de ltar yul dbus kyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-13: 'di ltar de dag thams cad yul dbus su 'dong 'dod par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-14: de nas shed bu de dag gis yam sreg shing dag btsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-15: yam sreg shing gi khur thogs nas bram ze de'i khyim gal ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-16: yam sreg shing gi khur mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-17: bram ze de ga la bar dong ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-18: bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-19: mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-20: shed bu 'dis ci nas kyang bdag cag thams cad yul dbus su mchi 'tshal bar gyur pa de ltar yul dbus kyi bsngags pa brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-22: bu dag ci snyed thos pa de snyed bgrod par bya ba yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236a-23: 'di ltar yul dag ni thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ba yin pas mnyan par bya'i bgrod par ni mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-0: mkhan po shed bu @236b 'di'i mchid nas yul dbus na bdag cag gi mkhan pos gang dag gi gdong du lta bar yang mi nus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-2: smra ba'i khyu mchog de lta bu dag mchis so zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-3: bu dag ci kho bo na re; sa'i steng na kho bo gcig pu kho na smra ba yin gyi smra ba gzhan 'ga' yang med do zhes zer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-4: sa ni rin po che mang po 'dzin pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-5: sa gzhi ni mdzes pa mdzes pa dag gis gang ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-6: mkhan po re zhig yul de yang mthong bar 'gyur zhing chu ngogs su nye reg kyang bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-7: smra ba'i khyu mchog de dag la yang bsnyen bkur bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-8: rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-9: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-10: rnyed pa yang bsgrub par bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-11: bdag cag yul dbus su mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-12: bram ze de slob ma la rjes su chags pa dang bcas pa dang 'khor nyung ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-13: des shed bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-14: bu dag gal te de lta na g-yang gzhi dag dang shing shun dag dang dbyug gu dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-15: blugs gzar dag dang dgang gzar dag dang ril ba dag long zhig dang yul dbus su 'dong ngo; ;de dag gis de dag blangs nas bram ze de shed bu de dag dang lhan cig yul dbus su 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-16: des rgol ba kha cig ni tshar bcad de rgol ba'i shing rta la sbyor bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-17: kha cig ni mgor thal ba'i bum pa dag gis bsnun /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-18: kha cig ni 'phong gi dpong sar khva bzhin du thag ring po nas yongs su spong bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:236b-19: kha cig ni gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis bsu bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-0: kha cig ni slob ma nyid du @237a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-1: khas len par byed cing de mthar gyis grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-3: tshong rdal dag tu rgol ba 'dul zhing w'a ra n'a sir phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-5: bdag gis ci'i phyir rtsa ba spangs te yal ga dang 'dab ma dang lo ma la nyug par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-6: rgol ba gang dag dang mkhas par bgrang ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rgyal po dang nye ba yin gyis bdag kyang rgyal po'i gan du 'gro'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-7: bram ze de rgyal po kri kri ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-8: rgyal po kri kri la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-9: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po kri kri la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-10: lha bdag la bla ma las yi ge nyung shas shig blangs pa mchis te de'i slad du lha'i spyan sngar rgol ba dag dang lhan cig bka' mchid rnam par gtan la dbab par 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-11: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-12: shes ldan dag nga'i yul na bram ze 'di dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i rgol ba 'ga' yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-13: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-14: lha ri brags che ge mo zhig na bram ze ser skya zhi ba zhes bgyi ba rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-15: zhugs lta bu'i shes pas rang gi smra ba gsal bar bgyid pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-16: gzhan gyi smra ba tshar gcod par rngo thog pa zhig mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237a-18: lha bod par bgyi'o zhes de dag gis de bos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-0: de rgyal po kri kri ga la ba @237b der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-1: rgyal po kri kri la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-2: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-3: lha mkhan po de 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-4: rgyal pos 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun du spyad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-5: mkhan po khyod kho bo'i mdun du bram ze 'di dang lhan cig gtam rnam par gtan la dbab par byed nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-6: ser skya zhi bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-7: bdag gis rdo ci thog pas rgyal po dgyes par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-8: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-9: shes ldan dag rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor shoms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-10: phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag rnam par zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-11: blon po rnams kyis rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor bshams shing phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag rnam par bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-12: de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-13: lha phyogs snga ma gang bgyid du stsal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-15: bram ze 'di mgron pa yin gyis 'di phyogs snga ma byed du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-16: bram ze de phyogs snga ma byed du bcug nas des rgyud chags lnga brgya bzlas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-17: ser skya zhi bas phyir bzlas te khyod kyi 'di ni rigs pa med pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-18: 'di ni mi mthun pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-19: 'di ni mi 'thad pa yin no zhes skyon btags pa dang bram ze de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-20: tshar gcad pa'i gnas rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-21: lan la spobs pa med pa 'di ni tha chad yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-22: de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-23: mkhan po khyod gnas gang du gnas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:237b-24: ser skya zhi bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-1: brags che ge mo zhig tu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-2: khyod song la ri brags de khyod kyi rgol ba'i longs spyod gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-3: ser skya zhi ba rangs pa dang dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-4: mchog tu dga' bar gyur nas skye bo mkhas pa dag gis yongs su bskor te ri brags der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-5: 'jig rten ni 'byor pa 'dod pa yin pas ser skya zhi ba des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-6: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-8: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-10: dga' bar byed dgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma bu ral pa ser skya can zhig btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-11: zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-12: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-13: nye du rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-14: khye'u 'di bram ze ser skya zhi ba'i bu yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-15: 'di'i ral pa yang ser skyar 'dug pas khye'u 'di'i ming ser skyar gdags so zhes de'i ming ser skyar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-16: de 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-17: zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-18: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-19: skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-20: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe na yi ge dang grangs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-27: klog pa'i pha rol tu son cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238a-28: de'i tshe na bram ze'i spyod tshul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-2: bya ma bum blang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-8: nges brjod kyi rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-9: mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-10: snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-11: srid srung gi rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-12: bram ze'i las drug po mchod sbyin byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-13: mchod sbyin byed du 'dzud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-14: klog pa dang klog tu 'dzud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-15: sbyin pa dang len pa la mkhas pa'i bram ze'i rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu son pa me lta bu'i shes pas rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-16: gzhan gyi smra ba tshar gcod nus par gyur to; ;de'i tshe bram ze ser skya zhi bas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam dag bram ze'i gsang tshig dag 'don du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-17: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na shed bu ser skya klog par byed pas pha la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-18: yab ri tsa zhes bgyi ba 'di'i don ci lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-19: ser skya zhi bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-20: bu yi ge dag ni yun ring po nas bral ba dag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-21: bla ma'i tshig shes par dka' ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-22: drang srong de dag gis don dang bral ba'i bstan bcos nye bar sbyar ba 'di ci yin mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-24: yab bdag gis ri tsa zhes bgyi ba 'di'i don de 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-25: bram ze ser skya zhi bas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-26: 'di ltar phas bu la bdag dang mnyam pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-27: khyad par du 'phags pa de ni 'dod par bya ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:238b-28: de'i phyir 'ang bdag pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-0: bdag gis 'di la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag gtad par @239a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-2: bram ze'i khye'u ser skya la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-3: bu 'di ltar phas bu la bdag dang mnyam pa'am khyad par du 'phags pa de ni 'dod par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir khyod kho bo bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-4: khyod kyis bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag bram ze'i gsang tshig dag 'don du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-6: bka' bzhin 'tshal 'don du stsal te zhes des bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag bram ze'i gsang tshig dag 'don du gzhug par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-7: bram ze ser skya zhi ba yang bya ba med cing cir dgar 'gro ba dang spyod pas dga' mgur spyod par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-8: de dus gzhan zhig na drang srong smra bar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-9: der dge slong zhig gi gan du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-10: slob dpon tshig 'di'i don ci lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-12: tshe dang ldan pa dri ba de ni de skad dri bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-13: dri ba de de skad dris na yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-14: 'di ltar dri ba de ni 'di skad dri bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-15: dri ba de 'di skad dris na tshig 'di'i don 'di yin no zhes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-16: bram ze ser skya zhi bas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-17: bdag gis 'di dag la dri ba yang 'dri bar mi nus na bdag gis 'di dag dang lhan cig ji ltar smra bar 'gyur snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-18: de dge slong rnams la shin tu mngon par dad par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-19: dus dang dus su dge slong dag mgron du pos te khyim gzhan du zan sbyin par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239a-20: de dus gzhan zhig nan par gyur nas des shed bu ser skya la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-0: bu ji tsam na nyi ma @239b 'char ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-1: ji tsam na nub pa de'i bar du khyod dang 'dra ba'i smra ba gzhan med kyis de'i phyir khyod kyis kho bo 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-2: smra ba thams cad dang lhan cig 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-3: bag tsha ba med par smra bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-4: 'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams ni ma gtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-5: de dag ni rgyud rgya chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-6: rgyud zab mo dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-7: rgyud bzang po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-8: 'jig rten pa las pham par mi nus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa la gting med pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-10: de dag ni mang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-12: longs spyod dag don du mi gnyer ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-13: ser skyas smras pa yab de bzhin bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-14: bram ze ser skya zhi ba na ba las ma langs te de rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-15: me tog dang 'bras bu'i sman dag gis bsnyen bkur byas kyang nyams pa nyid du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-17: bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-18: mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-19: phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-20: gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-21: zhes bya ba yin pas dus kyi chos rnams dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-22: de shed bu ser skya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-23: nang mis gos sngon po dang ser po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-25: dkar po dag gis khyogs spyil brgyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-27: bsregs te de'i 'og tu mya ngan bsangs pa byas nas 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-28: lho phyogs nas lhags pa'i smra ba de dag gis bram ze ser skya zhi ba dus la bab ces thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-29: thos nas kyang phan tshun smra bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:239b-30: shes ldan dag bram ze smra ba de dus la bab gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-0: da ni 'dong bar bya'o zhes de dag thams cad @240a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-1: 'dus te rgyal po kri kri'i gan du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-2: de nas rgyal po la rgyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-3: tshe spel ba byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-4: lha bdag cag la bla ma las yi ge nyung shas shig blangs pa mchis te bdag cag lha'i spyan sngar bka' mchid rnam par gtan la dbab par bgyid par 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-5: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-6: shes ldan dag mkhan po de bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-7: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-8: lha bram ze smra ba de dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-10: de'i phyir 'di dag g-yul du phug ron bzhin du 'dus te nga'i drung du lhags kyis bram ze de'i bu'am phu nu po 'ga' ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-11: lha de'i bu shed bu ser skya zhes bgyi ba mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-12: mkhan po'i bu de bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-13: de dag gis de bos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-14: des rgyal po la rgyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-15: tshe spel ba byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-16: blon po rnams kyis smras pa; lha de'i bu shed bu ser skya zhes bgyi ba 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-17: rgyal pos de la 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-18: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-19: mkhan po'i bu bram ze smra bar 'dod pa yul tha dad pa na gnas pa 'di dag nga'i drung du lhags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-20: khyod 'di dag dang lhan cig smra bar byed par nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-21: rngo ci thogs kyis lha dgyes par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-22: de nas rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor bshams shing phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs dag rnam par bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240a-23: de dag phyogs snga ma byed du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-0: smra ba de dag bram ze ser skya dang lhan cig gzhi gang dang gang la smra ba de dang de la bram ze ser skyas spobs @240b pa med par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-1: de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-2: tshar gcad pa'i gnas rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-3: lan la spobs pa med pa nyid ni tha chad yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-4: rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-5: ae man tshod gzhon la shes rab kyi spobs pa 'di dang 'di lta bu yod do zhes ngo mtshar skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-6: de'i 'og tu mngon par dad pas glang po che'i gshul [*shul?] du bskyon te smra ba'i rgyal srid la dbang bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-7: ser skya de'i ma sems khong du chud cing rnam par rtog pa bzang po ma yin pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-8: ser skya des hab shur gyis rgol ba'i longs spyod 'phrog tu bcug ste 'ong bar mi 'gyur ram snyam du de de ltar sems khong du chud cing rnam par rtog pa bzang po ma yin pa dag la rnam par rtog par byed cing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-9: shed bu ser skya smra ba'i rgyal srid la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-10: skye bo mkhas pas yongs su bskor nas rang gi sdum par 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-11: de nas de'i mas gus par bsgrims pa dang bcas pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-12: bu khyod kyis smra ba thams cad tshar bcad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-15: 'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams ni ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-16: ser skya'i ma bzhin sgyur bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-17: lag mthil gnyis 'dril bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-18: shed bu ser skyas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-19: yum khyod ci'i slad du bzhin sgyur ba mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:240b-22: bu da dung yang khyod 'gran zla dang bcas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-0: 'od srung gi dge sbyong de dag gis rgol ba'i longs spyod dag phrogs par @241a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-1: 'gyur ba'i gnas de lta bu yod kyis song la 'di dag tshar chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-3: yum bdag la pha'i mchid nas bu ji tsam na nyi ma 'char pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-4: ji tsam na nub pa de'i bar du khyod dang 'dra ba'i smra ba gzhan med kyis de'i phyir khyod kyis kho bo 'das nas smra ba thams cad dang lhan cig 'jigs pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-5: bag tsha ba med par smra bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-6: 'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams ni ma gtogs te de dag ni rgyud rgya chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-7: rgyud zab mo dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-8: rgyud bzang po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-9: 'jig rten pa las pham par mi nus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa la gting med pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-11: de dag ni mang ba dang mthun pa dang longs spyod dang don du mi gnyer ba yin no zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-13: bu khyod kyi pha ni dge sbyong gi bran du gyur pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-14: ci khyod kyang dge sbyong gi bran du 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-15: song la de dag tshar chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-16: ser skya de ma la gus pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-17: des ma'i tshig mdun du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-18: drang srong smra bar 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-19: dge slong zhig kyang w'a ra n'a sir 'phags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-20: ser skyas dge slong de lam gyi bar du mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-22: drang srong smra ba nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-23: drang srong smra ba na dge slong ji snyed yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-24: dge slong nyi khri lhag tsam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-25: re zhig dge slong dag ni mang na bstan bcos kyi tshad ji tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-27: sde snod gsum gyi tshad ji tsam stong phrag brgya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241a-28: khyim pas gzung du rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-0: mdo sde dang @241b chos mngon pa gnyis ni rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-1: 'dul ba ni cho ga'i gzhung yin pas mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-3: 'di dag gi smra ba'i bstan bcos gang yin pa de ni khyim pa la mi ston to snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-4: kye dge slong je sangs rgyas kyi bka' las cung zhig smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-6: bram ze 'di ni smra ba yin pas ci 'di 'jal bar 'dod pas dri ba 'dri'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-7: 'on te kun shes par 'dod pas dri ba 'dri ba de je lta'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-8: des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-9: mtsho rnams gang du ldog par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-10: lam ni gang du ldog par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-11: gang du 'jig rten bde sdug bsngal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-14: bram ze tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don ci yin smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-15: bram zes rig pa'i gnas thams cad la rnam par dpyad par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-18: ldog pa yang ma shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-19: de bdag la las mthong bar ma gyur tam snyam du phyogs bzhir rnam par lta bar byed cing bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-20: gal te 'di na gzu bo 'ga' zhig yod par gyur du zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-21: bdag deng nyid du tshar gcad par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-22: rnam pa thams cad du spang bar bya'o snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-23: kye dge slong tshigs su bcad pa de ni rgyud rgya chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-24: don zab mo nyid dang ldan pa yin la khyod kyang w'a ra n'a sir 'phags pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:241b-25: kho bo yang drang srong smra bar 'phags pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-0: 'di'i don 'phral kho nar smra bar mi nus kyis song zhig dang @242a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-1: phyis kyang 'di'i don smra bar mi dka'o zhes de drang srong smra bar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-3: kha ton yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa dag mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-4: mthong ma thag tu de sems mngon par dad par gyur nas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-5: su zhig snying rje med cing 'jig rten pha rol btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-6: 'di dag la rab tu sdang ba'i sems bskyed cing 'di dag dang lhan cig rtsod pa skyed par 'gyur snyam du rig nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-8: bu khyod kyis 'od srung gi dge slong dag tshar bcad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-10: yum khyod bdag gi rgol ba'i longs spyod dag gis mi dgyes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-11: 'di ltar khyod ni rgol ba'i longs spyod dag 'phrog tu stsol bar bzhed par gda'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-13: yum bdag deng drang srong smra bar 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-14: ji tsam na bdag gis shul gyi bar du dge slong zhig mthong nas bdag gis de la kye dge slong je sangs rgyas kyi bka' las cung zhig smros shig ces bgyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-16: mtsho rnams gang du ldog par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-17: lam ni gang du ldog par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-18: gang du 'jig rten bde sdug bsngal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-20: zhes brjod nas bdag gis rig pa'i gnas thams cad la rnam par dpyad par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242a-23: ldog pa yang ma 'tshal nas gal te de na gzu bo 'ga' zhig mchis par gyur tu lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-0: bdag deng nyid du @242b tshar bkum par yang 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-1: bu gal te de lta na song la sangs rgyas kyi bka' lhogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-2: yum ci zhig bklag par bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-3: de dag gi smra ba'i bstan bcos gang lags pa de ni khyim pa la mi ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-4: bu song la rab tu byung ste lhogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-5: yum rigs mchog tu gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-6: rigs tha dad pa rnams kyi nang du ji ltar rab tu 'byung bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-7: bu ci khyod kyi mgo bo la smig ma dang rtsva dag skye bar 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-9: de ma la gus pas nan gyis mnan pa na rab tu 'byung ngo zhes drang srong smra bar song ste dge slong gi drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-10: kye dge slong bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-12: bram ze smra ba 'di rab tu byung na bstan pa la gces pa bstabs par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-13: bram ze legs kyis de ltar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-14: longs spyod dag ni mi rtag pa yin pas rab tu byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-16: kye dge slong bdag ni rab tu shes pa'i bram ze lags pas bdag gis 'dir rab tu 'byung bar rngo mi thog gis ljongs su bzhud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-17: dge slong des bram ze de ljongs su khrid nas rab tu phyung rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-19: kha ton dag la nges par sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-20: ser skya des bklag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-21: kha ton 'don pa na sde snod gsum po dag bklags shing sde snod gsum dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-23: rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:242b-24: gang gi tshe chos mnyan pa sbyin par 'dod pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-1: ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa shom par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-2: dung sgril ma 'bud du 'jud par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-3: rnga bo che rdung du 'jud par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-4: rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor sdud par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-5: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyang mngon par dad par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-6: chos sgrog pa ser skyas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-7: bdag gis thos pas thob par bya ba gang yin pa de thob kyis bdag w'a ra n'a sir song ste yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas de ljongs su ci dgar 'dug ste w'a ra n'a si ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ba na mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i che w'a ra n'a sir phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-8: de nas de'i mas thos nas ma de bu tshol zhing drang srong smra bar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-9: des bu mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-10: bu khyod kyis 'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams tshar bcad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-11: yum bdag ni lung tsam dang ldan pa lags la de dag ni lung dang rtogs pa dang ldan pa lags pas de'i slad du bdag gis de dag tshar dgum par ji ltar rngo thog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-12: bu khyod kyis de dag gdon mi za bar tshar gcad par bya ba dag yin gyis tshar chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-13: ser skya de ma la gus pas mas nan gyis mnan pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-14: dang du blangs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-15: yum gang gi tshe seng ge'i khri bshams par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-16: dung sgril ma bus par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-17: rnga bo che brdungs par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243a-18: rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod spyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-0: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ser skya la chos sgrog par gsol ba btab nas seng ge'i khri bshams @243b par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-1: dung sgril ma bus par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-2: rnga bo che brdungs par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-3: rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-4: de nas ser skya'i mas dung dang rnga bo che'i sgra thos nas rings pa rings par drang srong smra bar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-5: gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas seng ge'i khri'i rgyab logs su 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-6: chos sgrog pa ser skya yang seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs te chos bstan par brtsams nas des chos ji tsam pa de tsam zhig bstan nas chos ma yin pa bstan par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-7: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-8: tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde'i mtha' la gnod pa ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-9: chos kyi khrid byed rnam par dkrug par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-10: chos kyi mngal ma rtol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-11: chos kyi rgyal mtshan ma rtib cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-12: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan ma sgrengs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-13: sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-14: ser skya de nyam nga nas babs te de'i 'og tu ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-17: bdag gis dang po nas khyod la yum bdag ni lung tsam dang ldan pa lags la de dag ni lung dang rtogs pa dang ldan pa lags pas de'i slad du bdag gis de dag tshar dgum par ji ltar rngo thog ces ma bgyis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-18: bu gang gi tshe khyod chos ston pa de'i tshe ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-19: chos ji tsam de tsam zhig bstan nas chos ma yin pa ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-20: gal te khyod la de dag na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-21: tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde'i mtha' la gnod par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-22: chos kyi khrid byed rnams par dkrug par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-23: chos kyi mngal ma rtol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:243b-24: chos kyi rgyal mtshan ma rtib cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-2: sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig ces zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-3: de'i tshe khyod kyis tshig gi mtshon gyis gdab par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-4: de dag ni legs pa ma yin pa byed pas 'jigs pa yin pas cang mi smra bar 'dug par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-5: des na 'jig rten dag gi snying lam na tshar bcad do snyam du shes par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-6: yum thabs de ni bzang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-7: 'on kyang de'i tshe khyod kyang yang spyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-8: bu de ltar bya ste kho mo yang 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-9: ji tsam na yang chos mnyan pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams nas ser skya la chos sgrog par gsol ba btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-11: rnga bo che yang brdungs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-12: rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-13: ser skya'i ma de yang snga ma bzhin du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-14: seng ge'i khri'i rgyab logs su 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-15: chos sgrog pa ser skya yang seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs te chos bstan par brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-16: des chos ji tsam pa de tsam zhig bstan nas yang chos ma yin pa bstan par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-17: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-18: tshe dang ldan pa mdo sde'i mtha' la gnod par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-19: chos kyi khrid byed rnam par dkrug par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-20: chos kyi mngal ma rtol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-21: chos kyi rgyal mtshan ma rtib cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-22: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan ma sgrengs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-23: sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-24: ser skya de mas bslus pas mi bzod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244a-25: tshig gi mtshon gyis gdab par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-0: glang po che'i mgo can khyod @244b kyis re zhig chos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-3: 'dul ba ma yin pa ci shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-20: khyi mgo can khyed kyis chos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-22: 'dul ba'am 'dul ba ma yin pa ci shes zhes smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-23: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-24: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dis tshig gi mtshon gyis gdab par brtsams kyis 'dong ngo zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-25: de na gang 'di dag so sor rtog pa mi mang ba de dag ni 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-26: gang dag spro ring ba de dag ni gal te re zhig chos ston par 'gyur na ni mnyan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-27: 'on te chos ma yin pa ston par 'gyur na ni 'di nyid kyis 'gyur bar zad do zhes de nyid na 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-28: de nas chos sgrog pa ser skyas dge slong slob pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-29: mi slob pa dag la ngag gis nyes par spyad pa bco brgyad byas nas seng ge'i khri las babs te ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-30: yum khyod dgyes par gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-31: bu kho mo dga' bar gyur gyis tshur shog khyim du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-33: yum bdag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung gi gsung rab la mngon par dga' bas mi mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:244b-34: bu khyod kyis ma'i tshig tshig ma yin par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ma thos sam tshur shog 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-1: ba na khyod 'dra ba'i ma yod par ma gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-2: deng mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen khyod la brten nas kho bos gang zag slob pa dang mi slob pa dag la ngag gi las rtsub po brjod pas de ni rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa so sor myong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-3: ser skya'i ma des w'a ra n'a si'i lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu w'a ra n'a sin gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-5: yul mi shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-6: 'od srung gi dge sbyong rnams kyis kho mo'i bu phrogs kyis grogs gyis shig ces ku co gdon par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-7: de na gang dag dad pa can de dag ni yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-8: gang dag ma dad pa de dag ni mtho 'tsham par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-9: ser skya'i ma de la mtho btsams pa na 'di lta bu'i kun nas dkris pa byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-10: des khrag tsha ba skyugs nas dus la babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-11: sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-12: chos sgrog pa ser skya yang dge slong slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams la ngag gi nyes par spyad pa bco brgyad byas pas dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-13: dud 'gro rnams kyi nang du chu srin nya'i rigs 'jigs su rung ba 'dir skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-14: de nas 'khor de yid la gcags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-15: shes ldan dag chos sgrog pa ser skya sde snod gsum dang ldan pa rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can gyis srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gi rna ba'i sbubs dag tshim par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245a-16: ngag gi nyes par spyad pa tsam gyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas ngan par skyes par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-0: @245b bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-2: tshe phyi ma ni cir 'gyur zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-4: gang thos nas kha cig gis dri bar gyur pa dag rtogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-5: kha cig gis rtse mo dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-6: kha cig gis bzod pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-7: kha cig gis 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog dag rtogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-8: kha cig gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-9: kha cig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-10: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-11: kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-12: kha cig gis nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-13: kha cig gis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-14: kha cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-15: 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-17: dge 'dun la bab par rnam par gzhag pa de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdul ba'i don chen po mdzad nas gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-19: de nas chu srin nya'i rigs 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-20: gang gi phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshig gsum gyi chos thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:245b-21: zas za bar byed pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-2: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi me ni rno ba yin pas de bkres pas nyams dmas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-3: bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas nas dus la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-4: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-5: lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-9: des dud 'gro rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-10: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-11: bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pas skyes pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-12: de nas sngon chu srin lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-13: gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bstan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-14: bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-15: de nas sngon chu srin lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g-yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i autpa la dang padma dang ku mu ta dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-16: padma dkar po dag gis thub bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-17: kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246a-18: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-0: bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis @246b mngon bar gtor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-3: 'di ltar sngon chu srin lha'i bu'i kha dog gis mthus khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang bzang thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon chu srin lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-6: khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas sngon chu srin lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-7: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-9: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-12: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-13: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-14: dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-15: byams pa dang mdza' bshes dang rtsa lag gi tshogs dag gis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-16: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-17: rus pa'i ri dag las ni bsgral /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-18: ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:246b-20: dud 'gro dang yi dvags dag nas ni rkang pa phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-0: lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod @247a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-2: khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-3: ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-4: mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-5: mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-6: shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-7: de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-8: go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-9: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-10: 'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-11: skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-12: srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-13: thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-14: de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-15: zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-16: dgra thul g-yas nas yongs su bskor byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-17: lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-18: de nas sngon chu srin lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-19: zhing pa lo thog 'byor pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-20: dpa' bo g-yul las rnam par rgyal pa lta bu dang /
