K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-21: nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta bur gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-22: cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-23: dge slong dag nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor pa'i rjes su brtson par gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247a-24: mthong nas the tshom za ba'i yid kyis mtshan mo nam nangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-2: mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-3: lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-6: mthu che ba gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du nye bar mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-8: dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nga la blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ongs pa yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-9: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-10: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-11: lha'i bu 'byor pa che ba mthu che ba gzhan ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-12: dge slong dag 'di ltar khyed kyis ngas chu srin nya'i rigs gang la tshig gsum gyi chos bstan pa de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-14: dge slong dag de de nas shi 'phos te rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i gan du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-15: ngas de la chos bstan nas des bden pa mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-16: rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-17: yang dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-18: btsun pa sngon chu srin lha'i bus las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-19: des rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-20: las ci bgyis na des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-22: dge slong dag sngon chu srin lha'i bu nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-23: rkyen yongs su bsgyur pa 'ong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:247b-24: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-1: las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-2: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-7: 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-8: skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-9: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-10: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-11: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-13: dge slong dag skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-14: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyang yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-15: skyes nas myong bar 'gyur pa'i las gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-16: 'dis chu srin du gyur pa na nga la sems mngon par dad pa byas pa gang yin pa de ni skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zhes bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-17: de'i rnam par smin pas rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-18: lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-19: ser skyas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-20: lung phog pa dang bklags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-22: phung po la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248a-24: skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-0: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa @248b dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-1: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pa gang yin pa de ni lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zhes bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-2: las de'i tshogs kyi dngos pos da ltar lha'i bur gyur pas nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-3: dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-4: las gcig tu dkar pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-5: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-6: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-7: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-8: dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:248b-10: dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:253a-12: de la gang dag dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe gdams ngag mnos te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-0: @254b tshe dang ldan pa dag da ltar mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' zhing pha ma dag kyang rang gi bu dag la zas sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-1: bya bar sems par dka' na slong mo ba lta la smos kyang ci dgos pa byung na 'dir /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-6: mi rtag pa la sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-7: sdug bsngal ba la bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-8: zas la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-9: 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-12: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-16: rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-17: rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-18: rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-19: rnam par 'bus gzhig pa'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-20: rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-21: rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-24: stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes thob pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-25: dge slong 'di ni bsam gtan dang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:254b-33: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-2: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-3: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-5: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-9: sems yongs su shes pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-16: yang dag pa ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-17: yang dag pa ma yin pas so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-19: rung yang srid mi rung yang srid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-20: 'di ltar bdag cag gis smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-21: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag zang zing cung zad tsam gyi phyir mi'i chos bla ma med la med bzhin du smra bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-23: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255a-26: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do; ;sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu klung yid 'ong ldan gyi @255b 'gram na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255b-1: dge slong dag khyod kyis zang zing cung zad tsam gyi phyir mi'i chos bla ma med la med bzhin du smras pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255b-4: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255b-6: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255b-7: dge slong dag gsum po 'di dag ni 'jig rten na yod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255b-8: srid pa'i rkun po rkun po chen po yin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:255b-23: 'khor stong dang yang ldan pa ma yin la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256a-31: dge slong dag rkun po rnams kyi nang na rkun po gang 'khor brgya dang ldan pa'am /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-17: dge slong dag rkun po rnams kyi nang na gang mi'i chos bla ma med la med bzhin du smra bar byed pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-21: dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-22: lha dang mir bcas pa'i nang na rkun po rkun po chen po yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-24: bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-25: ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-26: 'di na gang zhig dgra bcom ma gyur par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-27: bdag nyid dgra bcom par yang rjod byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-28: de ni tshangs bcas 'jig rten rkun po ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-29: tshul khrims 'chal ba yin par brjod par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-31: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:256b-32: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-0: phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs @257a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-1: pas ngas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-3: dge 'dun bsdu ba'i phyir zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-4: nga'i tshangs par spyod pa skye bo mang po la phan pa yangs par gyur pa lha dang mi'i bar la yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-5: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-6: yang dge slong gang mngon par mi shes shing yongs su mi shes la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-7: mi'i chos bla ma mtha' dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-10: shes pa dang mthong ba dang; reg par spyod pa med la med bzhin du 'di shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-11: 'di mthong ngo zhes khas 'ches pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-12: de ltung ba byung ba rnam par dag par 'dod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-13: dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung ma dris kyang rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-14: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis ni mi shes par shes so zhes smras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-15: ma mthong bar mthong ngo zhes smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-16: gsob gsog brdzun du smras so zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-17: dge slong de yang pham par gyur pa yin gyis gnas par mi bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257a-18: dge slong rab tu mang po gnas mal dgon pa nags khrod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-0: bas mtha' dag na rnal 'byor gyi rjes su brtson par gnas pa dag gis zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa cung zad cig la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i yid @257b la byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-1: nyon mongs pa dag rnam par mnan pas des na 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-2: gnod sems dag de dag gi rgyud la kun tu mi 'byung nas de'i 'og tu de dag gis gcig la gcig tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-3: dgon pa pa dag gis thob par bya ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-4: bdag cag skye ba ni zad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-5: tshangs par spyad pa ni bsten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-7: srid pa 'di las gzhan ni mi shes kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-8: tshur sheg bdag cag gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-9: gnas mal grong mtha' ba dag tu 'jug par bya'o zhes brjod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-10: de dag gis gnas mal dgon pa dag btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-11: gnas mal grong mtha' ba dag tu zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-12: der de dag yang dang yang du bud med kyi yul mthong zhing kun dga' ra ba'i dge tshul rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas pa dag la yang nyon mongs pa dag byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-14: gnod sems dag rgyud la kun tu byung bar gyur nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-15: tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar bca' ba mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-17: yang dge slong gang mngon par mi shes shing yongs su mi shes la mi'i chos bla ma mtha' dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-22: reg par spyod pa med la med bzhin du 'di shes so 'di mthong ngo zhes khas 'ches pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:257b-23: de ltung ba byung ba rnam par dag par 'dod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:258a-0: @258a *// dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung ma dris kyang rung /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-16: stong pa nyid du so sor rtog pa'i 'du shes thob bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-17: ma thob bzhin du bdag gis bsam gtan dang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-25: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-26: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-27: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-28: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-29: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-30: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-32: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-35: sems yongs su shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-38: zag pa zad pa thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263a-39: bdag ni dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-0: gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba @263b yin no zhes pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-1: khas 'ches pa las zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-2: de ltung ba byung ba zhes bya ba ni gzhi de'i 'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-3: rnam par dag par 'dod nas zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-4: rnam par ldang par 'dod nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-5: dus gzhan zhig na zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-6: dris kyang rung zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-7: ma dris kyang rung zhes bya ba ni de bdag nyid la 'gyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-10: rab tu 'gyod pa skyes pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-11: 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis ni mi shes par shes so zhes smras zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-12: ma mthong bar mthong ngo zhes smras te zhes bya ba ni mig gi rnam par shes pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-13: gsob gsog brdzun du smras so zhes bya ba de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-14: smras pa'i rnam grangs kyi tshig yin no zer na zhes bya ba ni brjod na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-15: mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal bzhag ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-16: dge slong zhes bya ba ni gang la dge slong gi dngos po yod pa ste snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-17: de yang zhes bya ba de ni nye bar bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-18: kun tu bstan pa'i tshig bla dvags yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-19: pham par gyur pa yin gyis zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-20: gnas par mi bya'o zhes bya ba yang gang zag bcu gnyis po dag gi bsgo bas bsgo bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-21: des na gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-22: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-24: 'du shes bsgyur dang dgon pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-25: khyim rnams su ni stan bkra dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-26: rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:263b-27: bdag nyid nye bar ston pa'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:272b-7: shes ldan dag nyi ma bdun 'das nas so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:277a-16: 'on te spre'u zhig tu 'gyur snyam mam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:277a-19: dga' bo nye dga' de dag la go bar byas zin mod kyi don nyung ngu de la ltung ba byung gis tshur sheg de'i gan du dong la 'chags su gzhug go zhes de dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:277a-20: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:277a-21: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:277a-23: tshe dang ldan pa dag aa rog gya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:277b-0: gnas brtan je @277b skabs phye shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:277b-1: tshe dang ldan pa dag ltung ba sde lnga po dag la skabs phye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:277b-2: gnas brtan gyis ci gcer bu pa'i nyan thos kyi chung ma'i mngal na khye'u yod do zhes lung bstan tam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:277b-18: drug sde dag kyang de dang lhan cig dong ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:278b-6: 'di ltar gang gi tshe dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bus lung bstan pa de'i tshe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:278b-10: dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bus de yang lung ston par 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:278b-15: rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:278b-17: thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:278b-19: bdag gis kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la so sor rig par ma byas par zas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas des srang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:279a-0: de'i 'og tu zangs kyi nang du zhun mar mang po dang sbyar ba'i thug pa bskol nas grong khyer gyi sgor sgo ba la kye nang rje dge slong gang la la zhig bsod snyoms la 'jug na de kho @279a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:279a-8: bsod snyoms pa thams cad khyim bdag de'i khyim du dong ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-11: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-12: gnas brtan su yang yongs su gnas pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-13: gzhi nas yongs su gnas pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-15: gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-17: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'drums pa ltung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'dral bar bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-19: lhung bzed nag pos 'tsho bar mi bgyid pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-20: des na mi'i chos bla ma dam bca' zhing kun shes pa brda sprod par bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-21: de yang 'bras bu ma mchis par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-22: des spyod yul bsregs pas bdag cag gis bsod snyoms kyang mi rnyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-23: de la ltung ba byung ba chos bzhin du slar mi bgyid pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-24: de ltung ba ma mthong ba'i slad du gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-25: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong gnas brtan la mtho ma 'tsham par 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di thams cad mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-27: mkhyen pa dang shes bya dag la bla na med pa'i mnga' brnyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:281b-28: the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa yin gyis de'i gan du deng la don 'di zhus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-1: ji skad lung ston pa de de kho na bzhin du zung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-2: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-4: dge slong dag de de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-6: ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs pa'i gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bshig cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-8: gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par bshig cing sgra'i 'du shes dang bral ba des gzugs dag mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-9: sgra dag thos par mi 'gyur te de ni gnas med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-10: 'di ltar dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu ni bsam gtan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-12: ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag thob pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-13: de ni myur du snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-14: des snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems nye bar rtogs shing rnam par langs pa'i sems ni ma rtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-15: dge slong dag dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu rnam par langs pas sgra de thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-16: dge slong dag dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bus 'du shes de lta bus lung bstan pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-18: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-19: tshor ba dag gi nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-20: pham par 'gyur ba bzhi pa rdzogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-21: pham par 'gyur ba rnams rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-25: khu ba 'byin pa 'khrig tshig bsnyen bkur smyan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282a-26: khang pa khang chen dang ni gzhi med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-0: @282b bag tsam dge 'dun dbyen dang de rjes phyogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-1: khyim sun 'byin dang bka' blo mi bde ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi chal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so; ;tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i kun tu spyod pa ni grong ngam grong brdal gang na nye bar brten cing gnas pa de nang par sngar langs te gtsug lag khang du chag chag 'debs par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-4: ba lang lci ba sar pa'i byug pas skud par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-5: de gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-6: lag pa gnyis bsnyal te so shing bor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-8: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-9: grong ngam grong rdal de nyid du lus ma bsrungs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-11: dran pa nye bar ma bzhag par bsod snyoms la 'jug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-12: de grong ngam grong rdal der bsod snyoms brgyus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-13: zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-14: phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-15: lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-16: rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du 'jug par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-17: gal te de'i sems 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-18: des rang gi yan lag gi rnam pa las su rung bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-19: lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas rtsol bar byed cing khu ba 'byin par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:282b-20: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gtsug lag khang rgyu zhing 'dong ba na tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:283a-1: pa 'char ka dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:283a-2: yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:283a-6: bde ba la reg par gnas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:283a-7: bsod snyoms kyis ngal bar ma gyur tam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:283b-4: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag de ltar na bzod pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:283b-9: phyir zlog par mi byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:283b-10: mngon par bstod par ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:283b-11: phyir bzlog par yang ma byas par dong ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-5: dus las yol bar mi rmed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-6: don dang ldan pa rmed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-7: don dang mi ldan pa mi rmed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang mi ldan pa rmed pa la chu yon gyis zlog par mdzad pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-9: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni don dang ldan pa rmed pa la dus mkhyen pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-10: 'char ka khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-13: rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-18: sems rnam par grol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-19: shes rab rnam par grol ba'i chos bstan pa la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284a-21: mi gti mug can khyod kyis lag pa gang dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag dang pa can dag las dad pas sbyin par bya ba len par byed pa'i lag pa de dag nyid kyis ci'i phyir mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284b-0: mi gti mug can @284b khyod kyis sbrul nag po dug myur du khyab par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284b-3: lag pa gnyis kyis gzung bar gyur pa ni bla'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284b-4: de ltar gyur pas rang gi yan lag gi rnam par bzung ba ni ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284b-6: de lta na bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bsnyen bkur bdag gir ma byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas; dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:284b-9: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:285a-7: bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po nyal ba dag gi rmi lam na mi gtsang ba shor zhing khu ba phyung ba gyur te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:285a-12: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:285b-6: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:285b-10: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar bsam bzhin du khu ba phyung na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286a-4: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286a-5: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni rjes su gnang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286a-6: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286a-7: bsam bzhin du khu ba phyung na rmi lam gyi ma gtogs te dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286a-8: bsam bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyad nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286a-9: khu ba zhes bya ba ni khu ba rnam pa lnga ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286a-16: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo dbang bskur bar 'os la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286a-19: dmar po ni sna chen po la gtogs pa 'khor lo'i mtha' pa'i'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286a-27: rmi lam gyi ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni rmi lam gyi bzhag ste'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:286b-5: des na dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288a-24: chags par 'gyur ba'i gzugs dag mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288a-25: sngon spyad pa'i yul rjes su dran pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288a-26: bsro khang gi las nyams su myong bar byed pas khu ba phyung ba la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-0: @288b smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-1: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-2: khu ba 'byin pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste dang po rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-4: drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-5: khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-6: rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-7: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo 'chag cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-9: mnyan yod na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-10: khyim bdag gi chung ma rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni skyed mos tshal du song ste rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-11: gtsug lag khang blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-12: bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal tu 'gro bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-13: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gi chung ma rab tu mang po dag skyed mos tshal du byung ste gtsug lag khang blta bar 'dod pas rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:288b-14: drug sde dag gis grong khyer chen po drug po dag na 'khod pa'i mi rnams 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-0: 'tsho ba las mi shes pa'am ma mthong @289a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-2: ma thos pa'am ma rig pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-3: rnam par mi shes pa 'ga' yang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-4: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-5: khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-6: mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-11: che ge mo'i sring mo 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-12: 'ongs pa legs so; ;khyed cag ci'i phyir yun ring mo ring mo nas zla ba ltar rgyu bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-14: btsun pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyis mi khom pa brgyad ni gang zag gi tshangs par spyad pa'i dus ma lags so zhes legs par gsungs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-16: khyim gyi 'du 'dzi dang ldan pas mi khom pa dgu pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-18: sring mo dag khyed kyis 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad ces; dug can la sogs rgyal po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-19: bya ba dag ni ma byas par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-20: de dag nyid dang bya ba rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-21: zhig pa nyid du gyur pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-22: bya ba de dag nyid kyang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-23: yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-26: zhes smras pa ma thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-28: btsun pa 'char ka de'i slad du bdag cag skyed mos tshal du mchis te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-29: gtsug lag khang blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289a-31: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i slad du mchis pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-1: sring mo dag gal te khyed cag de'i phyir 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pas legs so legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-3: sring mo dag de ni mjal gyis 'di ltar ltad mo ji ltar blta ba dri bar bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-5: btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag kun dga' ra bar 'jug cing gtsug lag khang lta bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-6: sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-7: mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-8: sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la gom 'dor na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-9: 'dzam bu chu bo gser gyi srang tshad ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-10: stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-11: zhes gsungs pas de yang legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-12: sring mo dag khyed kyis gang khyed cag gtsug lag khang ston par byed pa'i dge slong 'ga' zhig btsal tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-13: 'phags pa ci bdag cag sgron ma sug pa na thogs bzhin du zhugs bzhin du tshol lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-14: btsun pa 'char ka spangs te dge slong gzhan ga la tshol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-15: khyod pas gzhan khyad par du 'phags pa su zhig mchis kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-16: khyod nyid kyis bstan tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-17: de nas tshe dang ldan par 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-18: gal te 'di dag la gtsug lag khang bstan par bya na ni bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par yang 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-19: gal te bstan par mi bya na ni tshig pa'i bsod snyoms kyang ster bar mi 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:289b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma dad pa rnams dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-0: rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes gsungs pas @290a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-1: de'i phyir 'di dag dge ba la nges par sbyar bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-2: rnam pa thams cad du bstan par bya'o snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-3: des me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pa mchod pa sna tshogs thogs te pog phor lag tu blangs nas go rim ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-4: sring mo dag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-5: gang du bcom ldan 'das nyin lan gsum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-6: mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-10: gang ni nyam nga bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-11: gang ni mi bde bar gyur //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-13: gang ni ngan song la gzhol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-15: gang ni ngan song la bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-16: ngas gang ni ngan song gi lam nas bslangs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-18: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni drang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-19: 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa gang ni yongs su smin par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-23: yongs su smin pa gang ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa 'jug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290a-25: chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-0: sangs rgyas gdul @290b la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-2: ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-3: rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-5: rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-6: kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-7: bzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-8: srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-9: rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-10: zhes bya ba 'jug pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par sangs rgyas stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-11: mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-12: khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-13: 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-14: 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'jig rten mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-17: yongs su 'dren pa med pa na de'i dang por ye shes kyi mig sman gyi thur mas gang gi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-19: rgyal tshab lta bu rnams dang yun ring po nas rab tu byung ba rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-20: tshangs par spyod pa mngon par spyad pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-21: snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyis mchog tu lung bstan pa gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-22: gang gi rgyud la de'i dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du dge sbyong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:290b-23: bram ze'am lha'am bdud dam tshangs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-0: @291a *// sus kyang chos dang mthun par bskor mi nus pa chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skye bo mang po'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-1: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-3: 'jig rten la rjes su thugs brtse ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-4: lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba de'i yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-5: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-6: 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-7: bram ze shing s'a la chen po lta bu rmon pa dor stong du gcig gis mchog pa spangs te rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-8: dbyig bye ba phrag drug cu dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-9: gser gyi nas bang chung brgyad cu bdog pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-10: bran gyi grong bco brgyad bdog pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-11: sbyor pa'i grong bcu drug bdog pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-12: ser skya bzang mo lus gser bas lhag pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-13: mchil ma'i thal ba smin pa ltar spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-14: mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ras sbyar ma'i snam sbyar rin thang 'bum ri ba thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-15: 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi phyir rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-19: snyoms par 'jug par bskyed pa'i phyir nags na brten pa gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-20: gang mthong na spos kyi glang po che dag kyang rgyags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-21: gang gis bu mangs kyi mchod rten du ston par khas blangs nas dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'dod pa chung ba chog shes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-0: sbyangs pa'i @291b yon tan smra ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-1: 'di lta ste dge slong 'od srung chen po'o zhes gsungs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-3: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-4: 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-5: mchog thob pa'i bu gang yin pa gang gis lo brgyad gnyis su dbang po'i brda sprod pa bklags pa rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab chen po rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-8: spobs pa chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad gang gi cha bcu drug par gzhag cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-12: 'jig rten kun gyi shes rab gang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-13: sh'a ri'i bu yi shes rab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-14: bcu drug char yang mi chog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-16: sh'a ri'i bu dang mnyam gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-18: bcu drug char yang mi chog go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-19: zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis; 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-20: 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:291b-21: mdun na 'don gyi bu cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung ba gang yin pa; gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthe bos lan gsum du bsgul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-0: kun tu rab tu bsgul ba gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom ldan @292a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-1: 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du nyin mtshan bdun gyis gshegs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang mthu chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-3: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-4: 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-5: mi bskal pa bzang po las rab tu byung ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras gang gi ming yang dag par bsgrags pas tshong pa dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bzhon pa'i snod legs par grub cing 'ong bar 'gyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-8: 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-9: yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen bkur ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring na nye bar spyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-11: ston pas yang dag par bsngags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-12: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis yang dag par bkur ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras las rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams dang thos pa 'dzin pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-15: thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-16: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292a-17: 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung po sru'i sras las @292b rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-1: gal te rab tu ma byung na stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po dag gi sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-3: 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyi gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis sras las rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-5: gal te rab tu ma byung na mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-6: gang rab tu byung na rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par rgyun chad pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-7: bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-8: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa thob pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-9: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag 'tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-10: 'di ni tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-15: 'di ni kho bo'i gtsug lag khang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-16: ci 'di yang lta bar byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-17: 'phags pa ci bdag cag gis gtsug lag khang thams cad bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-18: gdod 'phags pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang blta bar mi bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-19: bdag cag gis 'phags pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang 'di da shin tu blta bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:292b-20: sring mo dag de bzhin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-0: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de 'dod chags spyod pa yin pas de'i gtsug lag khang na sa gzhi @293a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-1: mon sran gre'u'i phye mas bskus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-2: rtsig pa bkra shing nye bar bkra ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-3: mal stan be'u phrug gi snying po can bshams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-4: bum pa btung bas bkang pa bcu snod dang bcas pa bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-5: skon pa'i nang na bca' ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba dag yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-6: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-7: khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po rang gi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-8: sring mo dag ci je khye'u sus bya'am 'on te btung ba 'thung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-9: 'phags pa ci chu klung bzlog phyogs su 'bab bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-10: bdag cag gis 'phags pa la gsol bar bgyi ba gang lags pa de nyid 'phags pas bdag cag la gsol tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-11: 'di ltar bdag cag la gang dkon pa de stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-12: sring mo dag khyed cag la ci zhig dkon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-14: sring mo dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas drug po dag 'jig rten du byung ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-15: drug po de dag gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-17: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-19: dbus pa'i gnas su skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-20: dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293a-21: dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o zhes legs par gsungs pas de'i phyir khyed cag dge ba'i phyogs la 'dun pa skyes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ste legs so legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-0: kho bos khyed la @293b chos bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-1: de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-2: chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-3: des de dag la chos bstan par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-4: ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de ltar kun tu chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-5: ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar dral to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-6: ji lta ji ltar dral ba de lta de ltar de dag gi yan lag dang nying lag dag la nyug par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-7: 'di lta ste dper na; mi gsang sngags nyid rjod par byed pa 'byung po'am sha zas tha lcag gis snun pas snun par gyur pa de bzhin du de yang de dag la ji lta ji ltar chos ston par byed pa de lta de ltar kun tu chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-8: ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar dral to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-9: ji lta ji ltar dral ba de lta de ltar de dag gi yan lag dang nying lag dag la nyug par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-10: de na gang dag bdag gir byed pa de dag ni de dang lhan cig gzhog stegs dang phyag g-yeng dang mtho 'tsham pa dang kun tu rtse ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-11: kun tu ca co 'don pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-12: rgod pa dang dregs pa dang lus sgyur bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-13: gang dag bdag gir mi byed pa de dag ni de nas phyir byung ste 'chag sa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-17: gang las skyob pa de las 'jigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-19: skyabs las 'jigs pa skyes par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-20: bdag cag gi phyogs gcig tu bde ba zhi ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:293b-22: bde legs su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de las 'jigs pa dang yams dang gnod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-1: nad 'khrug pa byung bar gyur to zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-4: de dag smod cing 'dod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-5: dge slong dag gi mngon sum du gyur na de dag gis de dag smod pa thos pa dang de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-6: sring mo dag khyed cag su la smod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-9: 'phags pa dag bdag cag gi yan lag dang nying lag khyim thab kyis kyang de byugs pa gang dag lags pa de dag 'phags pa 'char kas byugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-10: gal te bdag cag gi pha ma'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-11: phu nu mo dag gis thos par gyur na rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der ltar yang mi ster na mchi bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-12: sring mo dag kha ro gcig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-13: dge slong de ni mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-14: 'on kyang 'dod chags shas che ba yin pas rtsom pa des nyon mongs pa sel bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-16: glang bu gang la rva rnon po gnyis mchis pa des bdag nyid kyi dku 'dral bar bgyid dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-18: sring mo dag kha rog cig dang bzlog par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-19: 'phags pa dag gal te bzlog na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-20: gal te zlog par mi mdzad na bdag cag slan chad rgyal byed kyi tshal du mi mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-21: sring mo dag kha rog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-22: ci nas kyang phyin chad de lta byed par mi 'gyur bar bzlog par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294a-23: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la bsgo ste dong pa dang lhag ma rnams kyang gtsug lag khang nas byung ste dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang dgod bzhin du @294b gtsug lag khang nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-1: dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas nas da ci dgod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-4: kho bos chang 'thungs sam; kun dong zos sam ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-5: tshe dang ldan pa ci de yang byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-7: bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po de dag 'phya zhing dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-9: tshe dang ldan pa dag lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ser snas gang la yang tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang mi ston la de dag ni gang gzhan la ston pa de la 'phya bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-11: ci khyod kyis de dag bden pa dag la bkod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-13: je de dag gi dbang po yongs su smin par bya bar brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-14: mthar gyis bden pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-15: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag yan lag gang gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de dag nyid kyis khengs par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:294b-17: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:300b-10: nus pa la nyes pa sbom po gang yin pa de mi nus pa la nyes byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:300b-11: skyes pa dang za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa la yang nyes byas nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:300b-12: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la yang nyes byas nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:300b-13: nus pa la nyes byas gang yin pa de mi nus pa la yang nyes byas nyid do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:300b-15: ma yang yin la mar 'du shes pa yang yod pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:300b-17: bu mo yang yin la bu mor 'du shes pa yang yod pa la ltung ba med do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-0: 'chi ba la mngon par phyogs pa 'chi ba las @301a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-1: thar par byed pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-3: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-4: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-5: lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-8: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-9: drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-10: rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-11: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-12: mnyan yod na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni skyed mos tshal du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-13: rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-14: gtsug lag khang lta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-16: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro bas bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-17: khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po dag skyed mos tshal tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-18: gtsug lag khang lta 'dod pas rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ngo zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301a-19: des de dag la chos bstan par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-0: zhes bya ba'i bar du dge 'dun lhag ma @301b gnyis pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-1: ji lta ji ltar chos bstan pa de lta de ltar kun tu chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-2: ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar dral to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-4: 'di lta ste dper na mi gsang sngags nyid rjod par byed pa 'byung po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-5: sha zas tha lcag gis snun pas snun par gyur pa de bzhin du de yang de dag la ji lta ji ltar chos ston par byed pa de lta de ltar kun tu chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-6: ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar dral to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-7: ji lta ji ltar dral ba de lta de ltar de dag la gnas ngan len gyi tshig sdig pa can tshogs par mi dbyung ba 'khrig pa dang ldan pa dag skyes bus na chung la ji lta ba bzhin du smra bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-8: de na gang dag bdag gir byed pa de dag ni de dang lhan cig gzhog stegs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-9: phyar g-yeng dang mtho 'tsham pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-10: kun tu rtse ba dang kun tu ca co 'don pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-11: rgod pa dang dregs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-13: gang dag bdag gir mi byed pa de dag ni de nas phyir byung ste 'chag sa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-17: gang las skyob pa de las 'jigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-20: bdag cag gis phyogs gcig tu bde ba zhi ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:301b-22: bde legs su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de las 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-1: nad dang 'khrug pa byung bar gyur to zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-4: de dag smod cing 'dong ba na dge slong dag gi mngon sum du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-5: de dag gis de dag smod pa thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-6: de dag gis smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-7: sring mo dag khyed cag su la smod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-10: 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis dva rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-12: nal gyi bu rnams las kyang tshig gang dag sngon ma thos pa de dag 'phags pa 'char ka las thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-13: gal te bdag cag gi pha ma dang phu nu mo dag gis thos par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-14: rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der ltar yang mi ster na mchi bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-15: sring mo dag kha rog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-16: dge slong de ni mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang 'dod chags shas che ba yin pas rtsom pa des nyon mongs pa sel bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-18: glang bu gang la rva rnon po gnyis mchis pa des bdag nyid kyi dku 'dral bar bgyid dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-20: sring mo dag kha rog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-22: 'phags pa dag gal te bzlog na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-23: gal te zlog par mi mdzad na bdag cag slan chad rgyal byed kyi tshal du mi mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-24: sring mo dag kha rog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-25: ci nas kyang phyin chad de lta byed par mi 'gyur bar bzlog par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302a-26: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la bsgo ste dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-0: lhag ma rnams kyang gtsug lag khang nas @302b byung ste dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-1: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang dgod bzhin du gtsug lag khang nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-2: dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas nas de ci dgod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-10: bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po de dag smod cing dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-12: tshe dang ldan pa dag lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyis rang bzhin ni ser snas gang la yang tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam mi ston pa de dag ni gang gzhan la ston pa de la smod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-14: ci khyod kyis de dag bden pa dag la bkod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-16: je de dag gis dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba brtsams nas mthar gyis bden pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-17: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag yan lag gang gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis khengs par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-19: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:302b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-0: 'char ka khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas par gyur pa bden @303a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-3: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-5: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-8: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-9: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-10: yang dge slong gang dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med kyi yul la gnas ngan len gyi tshig sdig pa can tshogs par mi dbyung ba 'khrig pa dang ldan pa dag skyes bus na chung la ji lta ba bzhin du smras na dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-11: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-12: dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyi zhes bya ba ni sems dral cing ma gyur pa yang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-13: gyur cing ma dral ba yang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-14: dral cing gyur pa yang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-15: ma dral cing ma gyur pa yang yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-16: de la re zhig sems dral cing ma gyur pa ni sems chags pa dang kun tu chags pa dang kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303a-17: gyur cing ma dral ba ni sems ltos pa dang bcas shing 'brel ba gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-0: dral cing gyur pa ni sems chags pa @303b dang kun tu chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-1: kun nas dkris pa dang sems ltos pa dang bcas shing 'brel ba gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-2: ma dral cing ma gyur pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-3: bud med kyi yul la zhes bya ba ni bud med dam gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-4: nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-5: gnas ngan len ces bya ba la gnas ngan len ni gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-6: pham par 'gyur ba kun nas slong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-7: dge 'dun lhag ma kun nas slong ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-8: ci'i phyir de dag gnas ngan len ces bya zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-10: kun nas slong ba las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-11: tshig ces bya ba ni brjod pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-12: sdig pa can zhes bya ba la sdig pa zhes bya ba ni kha na ma tho ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-13: tshogs par mi dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni dbus pa'i mtshams las 'das pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-15: 'khrig pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mi tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-16: skyes bus na chung la ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-17: skyes bu zhes bya ba ni skyes pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-18: na chung zhes bya ba ni bud med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-19: smras na zhes bya ba ni ma smras pa la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-20: smras pa la phyir smras na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-21: dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:303b-22: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-0: 'di skad ces 'phags pa gang dag 'phags pa dang lhan cig de lta de ltar bgyid pa de dag @308b ni bde bar gyur cing mtho ris thob pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-1: kho mo yang gal te 'phags pa dang lhan cig de dang de bgyid na bde bar 'gyur zhing mtho ris kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-2: dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis de'i ro myang bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-5: lhag par chags shing 'dug par byed pa de lta de ltar phyir smra bar byed cing 'khrig pa dang ldan pa rgya'i rna ru zhes bya ba'i ming rjod par byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-6: rgya'i rna ru zhes bya ba'i ming rjod par mi byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-7: de ltar smon par byed pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-8: ji ltar gshe bar byed pas she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-9: bud med dam gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-10: nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de dge slong gi gan du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-11: 'di skad ces ro lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas spyo ba dag gis spyo bar byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-12: dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis de'i ro myang bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-15: lhag par chags shing 'dug par byed pa de lta de ltar phyir smra bar byed cing 'khrig pa dang ldan pa rgya'i rna ru zhes bya ba'i ming rjod par byed na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-16: rgya'i rna ru zhes bya ba'i ming rjod par mi byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-17: de ltar gshe bar byed pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-18: nus pa la dge 'dun lhag ma gang yin pa de mi nus pa la nyes pa sbom po'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:308b-19: skyes pa dang za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa la nyes pa sbom po'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-0: nus pa la nyes pa sbom @309a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-1: po gang yin pa de mi nus pa la nyes byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-2: skyes pa dang za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa la yang nyes byas nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-3: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la yang nyes byas nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-4: nus pa la yang nyes byas gang yin pa de mi nus pa la yang nyes byas nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-5: skyes pa dang za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa la yang nyes byas nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-6: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la yang nyes byas nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-7: skad kyi nges pa'i tshig dang yul gyi nges pa'i tshig dang ljongs kyi nges pa'i tshig gis ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-8: nas kyi ming dang rtsva'i ming dang yol ba'i ming rjod pa la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-10: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-11: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-12: 'khrig pa dang ldan pa smra ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal dgon [*mgon?] med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-14: drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-15: khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-16: rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309a-17: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o snyam pas drug sde las gang yang rung bar rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-0: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing @309b 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-1: mnyan yod na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni skyed mos tshal du song ste rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-2: gtsug lag khang blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-4: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-5: bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung mar rab tu mang po dag skyed mos tshal du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-6: gtsug lag khang lta 'dod pas rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-7: zhes bya ba nas des de dag la chos bstan par brtsams so zhes bya ba'i bar du dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-8: ji lta ji ltar chos ston pa de lta de ltar kun tu chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-9: ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar dral to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-10: ji lta ji ltar dral ba de lta de ltar de dag gi mdun du bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-11: nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes bsngags pa rjod par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-12: 'di lta ste dper na mi gsang sngags nyid rjod par byed pa 'byung po'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-13: sha zas thal lcag gi snun pas snun par gyur pa de bzhin du de yang de dag la ji lta ji ltar chos ston par byed pa de lta de ltar kun tu chags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:309b-14: ji lta ji ltar kun tu chags pa de lta de ltar dral to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-0: ji lta ji ltar dral ba de lta de ltar de dag gi mdun du bdag nyid kyi lus kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir 'di lta @310a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-2: nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes bsngags pa rjod par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-3: de na gang dag bdag gir byed pa de dag ni de dang lhan cig gzhog stegs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-4: phyar g-yeng dang mtho 'tsham pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-5: kun tu rtse ba dang kun tu ca co 'don pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-6: rgod pa dang dregs pa dang lus sgyur bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-7: gang dag bdag gir mi byed pa de dag ni de nas phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-9: dang ra dang sgo khang dag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-11: gang las skyob pa de las 'jigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-13: skyabs las 'jigs pa skyes par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-14: bdag cag gis phyogs gcig tu bde bzhi ba de legs su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de las 'jigs pa dang yams dang gnod pa dang 'go ba'i nad dang 'khrug pa byung bar gyur to zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-17: de dag smod cing 'dong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-18: dge slong dag gis mngon sum du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-19: de dag gis de dag smod pa thos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-20: de dag gis smras pa sring mo dag khyed cag su la smod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310a-23: 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis rang gi khyim thab las kyang tshig gang sngon ma thos pa de dag 'phags pa 'char ka las thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-0: gal te bdag cag gis pha ma'am @310b phu nu mo dag gis thos par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-1: rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der ltar yang mi ster na mchi bar lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-2: sring mo dag kha rog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-3: dge slong de ni 'dun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-4: 'on kyang 'dod chags shas che ba yin pas rtsom pa des nyon mongs pa sel bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-6: glang bu gang la rva rnon po gnyis mchis pa des bdag nyid kyi dku 'dral bar bgyid dam de ni mi rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-7: sring mo dag kha rog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-9: 'phags pa dag gal te bzlog na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-10: gal te zlog par mi mdzad na bdag cag slan chad rgyal byed kyi tshal du mi mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-11: sring mo dag kha rog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-12: ci nas kyang phyin chad de ltar byed par mi 'gyur bar bzlog par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-13: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la bsgo ste dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-14: lhag ma rnams kyang gtsug lag khang nas byung ste dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-15: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang dgod bzhin du gtsug lag khang nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-16: dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-17: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka khyod mi mdzes pa de lta bu de byas nas da ci dgod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-21: tshe dang ldan pa ci de yang byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:310b-23: bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po de dag 'phya zhing dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-0: tshe dang ldan pa dag lhung bzed nag po can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ser snas gang la yang tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs @311a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-1: su bcad pa gcig tsam yang mi ston la de dag ni gang gzhan la ston pa de la 'phya bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-3: ci khyod kyis de dag bden pa dag la bkod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-5: je de dag gi dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba brtsams nas mthar gyis bden pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-6: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag yan lag gang gis ngo tsha bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis khengs par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-8: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang; gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-11: 'char ka khyod kyis mi mdzes pa de lta bu byas par gyur pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-13: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-14: rung ba ma yin pa tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-16: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311a-17: dge slong dag de lta bas na phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-0: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba @311b la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-1: yang dge slong gang dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med kyi yul gyi mdun du bdag nyid lus kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-2: nga lta bu dge sbyong tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes bsngags par brjod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-4: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-5: gzhan yang de 'dra ba gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-6: dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-7: sems dral cing ma gyur pa yang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-8: gyur cing ma dral ba yang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-9: dral cing gyur pa yang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-10: ma dral cing ma gyur pa yang yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-11: de la re zhig dral cing ma gyur pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-12: sems chags pa dang kun tu chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-13: kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-14: gyur cing ma dral ba ni sems ltos pa dang ldan zhing sems 'bral ba gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-15: dral cing ma gyur pa ni chags pa dang kun tu chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-16: kun nas dkris pa'i sems dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-17: sems ltos pa dang bcas shing 'brel ba gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-18: ma dral cing ma gyur pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-19: bud med kyi yul gyi zhes bya ba ni bud med dam gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-20: nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa'i 'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-21: mdun du zhes bya ba ni mngon du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:311b-22: bdag nyid kyi lus bsnyen bkur gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi lus kyi kun tu spyad pa'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-2: nga lta bu zhes bya ba de ni nye bar bstan pa dang kun tu bstan pa'i tshig bla dvags yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-3: dge slong zhes bya ba ni dge slong gi dngos po ji skad bstan pa dang ldan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-4: tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi phung po ji skad bstan pa dang ldan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-5: dge ba'i chos can zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po ji skad bstan pa dang ldan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-6: tshangs par spyod pa la zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi phung po ji skad bstan pa dang ldan pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-7: 'di 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba ni mi tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-8: chos 'dis zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgras bstan pa 'dis yin gyis gzhan gyis ni ma yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-9: bsnyen bkur byas na zhes bya ba ni kun tu spyad pa byas na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-10: sru zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-11: 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-12: zhes bya ba la mchog yin no zhes bya ba ni gtso bo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-13: bsngags pa brjod na zhes bya ba ni bstod pa byas na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-14: dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni ltung ba de dge 'dun la rag las pa dang zhes bya ba nas de ni dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312a-15: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-0: ches khyad par @312b du 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-7: de la ji ltar mchog gis she na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-8: dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-9: nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-11: nga lta bu dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni kun tu spyad pa rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-12: dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-13: nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-15: nga lta bu dge slong dge ba'i chos can la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-16: dge slong gis dral cing gyur pa'i sems kyis bud med dam gzhon nu ma legs par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:312b-17: nyes par smras pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par nus pa gang yin pa de'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:313a-0: nga lta bu dge slong tshangs par spyod pa la 'di ltar 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dis bsnyen bkur byas na sru 'di ni bsnyen bkur @313a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:313a-1: rnams kyi mchog yin no zhes brjod na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
