K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:346b-12: bram ze kho bos bsod snyoms kyi phye nyung shas shig rnyed pa 'di nyid yongs su longs spyod par bya'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:346b-13: dad pas sbyin par bya ba blangs te dor du ga la rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:346b-15: 'phags pa bdag cag bram ze rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni gal te ngan pa rnyed nas bzang po rnyed par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:346b-16: ngan pa spangs te bzang po yongs su longs spyod par bgyid pa lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:346b-17: de khyed cag la ci nongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:346b-18: bram ze kho bo cag ni bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-0: khyed cag bram ze dag ni bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa ma yin pas khyed cag bram ze dag ni ci dgar 'jug par byed pa yin @347a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-1: no; ;kho bo cag la ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi bka' stsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-3: chos gos gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-4: bsod snyoms gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-5: gnas mal gang yang rung bas chog shes pa 'phags pa'i rigs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-6: sbong ba la dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-7: bsgom pa la dga' ba 'phags pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-8: bram ze de shin tu mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-9: 'phags pa 'di ni khyod kyi khab lags kyis dus dang dus su gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-10: bram ze khyod kyi sgo ba 'di ni gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang 'dra ba yin pas su yang 'jug tu mi ster gyis legs par bsgo ba gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-11: des na kho bo la 'gog par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-12: bram zes sgo ba bkug ste legs par bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-13: kva'e nang rje khyim 'di 'phags pa 'dun pa'i yin gyis khyod kyis ma dgag cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-14: nang mi la yang bsgo ba khyed cag gis 'phags pa 'dun pa la mi gus par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-16: bram ze 'di ni mngon par dad par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-17: 'on kyang gal te 'dir lhung bzed nag po can 'jug par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-18: des 'di ci nas kyang 'khrug par byed par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-19: thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347a-20: 'dun pas sgo ba de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-0: kva'e nang rje khyod kyis bram ze de ji ltar kho bo la mngon par @347b dad par gyur pa mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-2: des kho bo 'ba' zhig 'dir 'jug tu gnang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-3: lhung bzed nag po can gzhan su yang 'jug tu ma gzhug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-4: gal te 'dir lhung bzed nag po can 'ga' zhig 'jug tu bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-5: kho bos khyod la khrims chen po 'char gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-6: 'phags pa shin tu bag yangs su bzhud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-7: khyod nyid kyang re zhig de'u ma chud pa lags na lhung bzed nag po can gzhan 'jud par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa yid bde ba skyes te song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-9: de dus dang dus su bram ze de'i khyim du 'gro bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-10: bram zes kyang de kho na bzhin du yang dang yang stobs par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas dang du len par mi byed par sbyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'ba' zhig byas shing byas shing 'gro bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-12: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas bram ze de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po dag gis bsngags pa rjod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-13: de dag rgya cher legs par bshad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-15: 'phags pa bdag gi kyang rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi 'ga' zhig bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-16: bram ze de bzhin gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-18: dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:347b-20: bdag gis 'phags pa 'dun pa la rnam pa du mar bstabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-1: lan 'ga' yang dang du ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-2: da dang du blangs pa gang yin pa 'di yang dge 'dun gyi phyir ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-3: de ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-4: 'phags pa bdag la kar sha pa na dag ni mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-5: 'on kyang sa gzhi ni rgyal po dbang bas gang du dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal ba'i dogs ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-6: bram ze khyod snying las chung ngur gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-7: kho bos rgyal po las sa bslang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-8: 'phags pa gal te de lta na legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-9: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pas bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-11: je rgyal po la bsten par bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-12: 'on te blon po rnams la bsten par bya snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-14: la la na re 'di skad ces bsten la bsten par mi bya bar bsten pa la bsten pa bsten par bya'o zhes zer ro snyam nas des blon po rnams la bsten par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-15: de dag la dus la cung zad cig bsten pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-16: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-17: 'phags pa bka' stsal pa ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-18: 'dun pas smras pa bzhin bzang dag bram ze zhig gis dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang byed du bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-19: sa gzhi rgyal po dbang bas gang du gtsug lag khang brtsig tu gzhug pa'i sa med na de'i phyir sa gzhi'i ched du lha'i snyan du gsol ba zhig 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348a-20: de khyed cag gis grogs gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-0: 'phags pa gang gi tshe rgyal po tshogs nyung ngu dang dben pa na bzhugs pa de'i tshe @348b khyod sbran par bgyi'i spyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-1: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshogs nyung ngu dang dben pa na 'dug pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-2: blon po de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-3: 'phags pa rgyal po tshogs nyung ngu dang dben pa na bzhugs kyis spyon cig ces bang chen btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-4: 'dun pa 'ongs nas rgyal po la aa rog gya zhes byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-5: blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-6: lha 'di ni 'phags pa 'dun pa zhes bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-7: sh'akya las rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-9: rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-10: rgyal pos smras pa 'phags pa byon pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-13: lha bram ze zhig gis dge 'dun gyi slad du gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-14: sa gzhi rgyal po mnga' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-15: de'i dog sa ma mchis na lha dog sa stsal bar rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-16: 'phags pa rgyal po'i pho brang 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gang du bzhed pa der gtsug lag khang bgyid du stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-18: aa rog gya zhes smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-19: yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-20: drug sde gzhan dag gi gan du song nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-21: dga' bo nye dga' bram ze che ge mo zhig gis dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:348b-22: kho bos rgyal po la sa gzhi'i phyir gsol ba byas na rgyal po na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-0: 'phags pa rgyal po'i pho brang 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gang @349a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-1: du bzhed pa der gtsug lag khang brtsig tu stsol cig ces zer gyis sa gzhi 'doms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-2: de dag 'dus te bram ze de'i drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-3: bram ze rgyal pos bdag cag la rgyal po'i pho brang 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gang du 'dod pa der gtsug lag khang brtsig tu chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-4: ces dam pa byin gyis kar sha pa na dag 'on cig dang gtsug lag khang brtsig tu gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-5: bram ze des drug sde de dag la kar sha pa na dag byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-6: de dag gis kar sha pa na dag blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-7: phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-8: phyogs gang du gtsug lag khang brtsig tu gzhug ces glengs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-9: ko'u shambhi dang gdang can gyi kun dga' ra ba'i bar dag na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig yod de'i drung du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-10: bram ze 'khor shin tu mang po dang ldan pa zhig bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya bram ze'i gsang tshig dag klog tu 'jud pa de'i bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag drug sde dag bsod snyoms la 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-11: 'byung ba na yang dang yang du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-12: kye drug sde dag ci bsod snyoms mchog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-13: bsod snyoms dang po thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-14: snod khengs sam zhes co 'dri bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-15: de'i tshe drug sde dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349a-16: gnas kyi shing ljon pa de'i drung na bram ze de'i slob ma bram ze'i khye'u de dag rtag tu bdag cag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-0: kye drug sde dag ci bsod snyoms mchog dang bsod snyoms dang po @349b thob ba ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-1: snod khengs sam zhes co 'dri bar byed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-2: de dag mi dga' bar bya zhing gnas kyi shing ljon pa de gcod du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-3: phyogs der gtsug lag khang brtsig tu bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-4: des na phyin chad yang dang yang du co 'dri bar mi byed do zhes de dag gis gros byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-5: kar sha pa n'a dag khyer te gla mi'i srang du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-6: bzhin bzang dag gla sbyin gyis gtsug lag khang du las gyis shig ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-7: de dag gis gla mi dag bsgrubs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-8: drug sde dag gis gla mi de dag khye'u sus byin te lus bsku ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-9: mgo bsku ba yang phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-10: de dag mgu nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-11: 'phags pa dag bzhud la bdag cag la sug las dag phob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-12: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-13: las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur gyis re zhig sdod cig ces de dag gis de dag re zhig bgags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-14: ji tsam na nyi ma nub nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-15: 'phags pa dag bdag cag da slar mchi'i deng gi gla stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-16: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-17: khyed cag gis las mang po zhig byas pas de'i phyir gla ded dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-19: 'phags pa dag khyed cag gis bdag cag la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-20: gang zhig bdag cag gis ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-21: bzhin bzang dag sta re dang gzhor dang gle ba dag longs shig dang las byed du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:349b-22: gla mi de dag drug sde dag dang lhan cig sta re dang gzhor dang gle ba dag thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-0: gnas kyi shing ljon pa de'i gan du dong nas @350a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-1: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-2: shes ldan dag gnas kyi shing ljon pa 'di chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-4: 'phags pa dag 'di ni gnas kyi shing ljon pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-5: ci bdag cag la mgo gnyis mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-7: bkren pa dag sa gzhi ni rgyal po dbang pas des kho bo cag la rgyal po'i pho brang 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gang du 'dod pa der gtsug lag khang brtsig tu chug cig ces dam pa byin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-8: su zhig khyed kyi mgo gcod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-9: bag tsha ba med par chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-10: de dag gis gnas kyi shing ljon pa de bcad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-11: shing de thams cad kyang rtsa ba nas phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-12: sa phyogs de yang ci nas kyang gnas kyi shing ljon pa de phyogs gang na 'dug 'dug par gyur ces bya bar mi shes pa de ltar mnyam par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-13: drug sde dag gis phyogs der mig gis brtag par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-14: dga' bo nye dga' phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang brtsig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-17: phyogs 'dir ni rung ba'i khang pa bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-18: phyogs 'dir ni nye bar gnas pa'i khang pa bya'o zhes mtshan ma byas te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-19: bram ze'i khye'u de dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni res kyis gnas kyi shing ljon pa de'i drung du chag chag 'debs par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350a-21: ba lang gi lci ba sar ba'i byug pas nyug par byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-0: ji tsam na bram @350b ze'i khye'u zhig la res bab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-1: de nang par sngar langs te song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-2: des gnas kyi shing ljon pa de ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-3: de mkhan po'i gan du 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-4: mkhan po gnas kyi shing ljon pa de ma mchis so; ;bram zes smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-5: kva'e bram ze'i khye'u ci log par ma song ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-6: mtshan mo gzhan gyis shing ljon pa de gar song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-7: bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig kyang de dang lhan cig gad mos 'debs shing des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-8: mkhan po bram ze'i khye'u 'dis mdang sum 'bras khu'i rtsabs 'tshal bas des na ma mthong ngo zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-9: bram ze'i des bram ze'i khye'u ches sgrin pa gzhan zhig btang na des kyang de kho na bzhin du ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-11: mkhan po de de bzhin te gnas kyi shing ljon pa de ye ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-12: de nas thams cad 'dus te dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-13: de dag gis de kho na bzhin du ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-14: bram ze'i khye'u dran pa dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-15: phyogs 'di na ni mkhan po gsang tshig 'don par mdzad mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-16: phyogs 'di na ni bdag spyod spyod na de ci nongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-17: ji ltar gyur pa ma 'tshal to zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-18: de dag de ltar sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-19: mi zhig 'ongs nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-20: bram ze ci'i phyir 'khor dang bcas pa de ltar sems khong du chud cing 'khod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-21: kye dang po phyogs 'di na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig 'dug par gyur pa de mtshan mo gzhan gyis gar song ma shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:350b-22: bam ze kho bos mdang sum mig la ma chad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351a-0: phyogs 'di na drug sde dag mi @351a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351a-1: sta re dang gzhor dang gle ba dag gis lag brel ba dang lhan cig 'dug pa mthong na de dag gis bcad par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351a-3: kye nang po 'on tang de lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351a-4: zhes de dag de bzhin du sems khong du chud cing 'khod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351a-5: drug sde dag lhags nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351a-6: bram ze dag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'khod /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351a-19: thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351a-21: yul tha dad pa na gnas pa der lhags pa dag gis kyang thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351a-22: de dag kyang lam po che dang srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag na smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351b-0: kha zer bar byed cing @351b gang dag ma dad pa de dag gis ni bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dag la yang bsod snyoms sbyin par mi byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:351b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:355b-12: chu lha dang lus ngan dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dag la gsol ba 'debs shing lha'i bye brag gzhan 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:355b-13: kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang tshal gyi lha dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:355b-15: sum mdo'i lha dag dang gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:355b-16: lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:355b-17: chos mthun pa dag dang rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:355b-18: 'jig rten na gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dang bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:355b-19: de ni de lta bu ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:355b-20: gal te de ltar gyur du zin na re re la yang 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-1: los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-2: 'di ltar gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-3: gsum po de dag gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-4: pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-5: ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-6: dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-7: gnas gsum pa de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-8: de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-9: sems can srid pa tha ma pa spyod pa tshol ba thar pa'i snying po bzung ba mya ngan las 'das pa la phyogs pa 'khor ba las phyir phyogs pa srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-10: skye ba don du mi gnyer ba lus tha ma 'dzin pa zhig kyang lha'i rigs bzang po zhig nas shi 'phos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-11: de'i skye dgu'i bdag mo'i mngal du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-12: bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-14: skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-15: dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-16: mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-17: gang las mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa de shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-18: khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-19: gal te khye'u yin na dku g-yas par rten cing 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-20: gal te bu mo yin na dku g-yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356a-21: de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas khyim thab la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-0: rje'i sras @356b bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g-yas par rten cing mchis pas nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-1: de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-2: lag pa g-yas pa brkyang nas 'di skad ces kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pas bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-3: kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-4: kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-5: gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-6: bgo skal la spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-7: kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-8: bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung nu'am mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-9: 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis yon bshad pa byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-10: de la sems can zhugs par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-11: 'di lta ste mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-12: dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-13: sman pas bcas pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-14: ha cang mi skyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-15: ha cang lan tshva mi che ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-16: ha cang mi mngar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-17: ha cang mi tsha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-18: ha cang mi bska ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-19: kha ba dang skyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-20: lan tshva che ba dang mngar ba dang tsha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-21: bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:356b-22: do shal dang se mo do dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-0: rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus la lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i @357a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-1: tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-4: shod kyis gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-5: de sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'jud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-6: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-7: mdzes pa gsal ba gser gyi mdog 'dra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-8: mgo bo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-9: lag pa ring ba dpral ba'i dbyes che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-11: sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-12: de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-13: khye'u yi ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-14: khye'u de'i kun tu spyod pa ni ji srid du mal chen po nas ma phab pa de srid du bshang ba dang gci ba mi byed pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-15: yul dbus na kun tu spyod pa ni gang mkhas pa spyod pa gsal ba de la nor lta bu zhes zer bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-16: nye du de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-17: shes ldan dag khye'u 'di gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa rgyal sde'i bu yang yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-18: ji srid du mal chen po nas ma phab pa de srid du bshang ba dang gci ba mi byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-19: mkhas pa spyod pa gsal bas nor lta bu yang yin pa'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gyad bu nor zhes bya'o zhes de'i ming gyad bu nor zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357a-20: nyi ma gang la gyad bu nor btsas pa'i nyi ma de nyid la blon po lnga brgya dag la yang bu dag btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-0: de dag gi ming yang khyim dang @357b mthun pa dag tu btags shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-1: de dag kyang gyad bu nor gyis ne'u ldangs su byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-2: khye'u gyad bu nor ma ma brgyad po bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-3: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-4: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-5: rtse grogs byed pa'i ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-6: de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying khu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-7: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo dag gis sring par byed skyed par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-8: rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-9: de ma ma'i bang na 'dug pa na bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-10: des de la shin tu nges par brtag par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-12: khye'u 'di ni rkang gnyis pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-13: gang dag 'di la mchod pa dag byed pa de dag gi mchod pa byas pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu chen po dang phan yon chen po dang gsal ba chen po dang yangs pa chen por 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-14: bram ze mtshan mkhan des ma ma de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-15: khye'u 'di kho bo la yud tsam zhig byin cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-16: kho bo 'di la mchod pa dag bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-18: bram ze kho mo la khye'u sbyin pa'i dbang med kyis gal te khyod khye'u 'dod na dmag dpon gyi gan du song la gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-19: de nas bram ze de gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-20: shis pa brjod pa sngar byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:357b-21: dmag dpon khyod kyi khye'u 'di ni rkang gnyis pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-0: gang dag 'di la mchod pa dag byed pa de dag gi @358a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-1: mchod pa byas pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-2: phan yon chen po dang gsal ba chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-3: yangs pa chen por 'gyur bas de'i phyir khye'u 'di kho bo la yud tsam zhig byin cig dang kho bos 'di la mchod pa dag bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-5: bram ze gal te de lta na sbyin gyis khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-6: bram ze de yid rab tu dga' nas khye'u de rang gi khyim du khyer nas chung ma'i drung du yon tan brjod de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-7: bzang mo shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-8: khye'u 'di ni rkang gnyis pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-9: gang dag 'di la mchod pa dag byed pa de dag gi mchod pa byas pa de dag ni shin tu 'bras bu chen po dang phan yon chen po dang gsal ba chen po dang yangs pa chen por 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'di la mchod pa dag gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-10: des de'i yon tan brjod pa thos nas yid bde ba skyes te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-11: bram ze gal te de lta na re zhig gzhes shig dang khyim gyi go rims dag bgyi'o zhes des khyim byug pas byugs shing zhal zhal byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-12: rtsa lag gi skye ba snying du sdug cing 'brel pa dag mgron du bos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-13: de'i 'og tu khye'u de bkur sti chen pos dril phyis byas shing khrus byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-14: spos dang me tog dag gis brgyan nas sbrang rtsi dang 'o mas legs par bsnyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358a-15: de ltar brgyan cing gnyen 'dab kyis yongs su bskor nas rang gi khyim du phyir khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-0: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi @358b ge dang grangs dang rtsis dang lag rtsis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-1: dbyung ba dang gzhug pa dang gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-2: de yi ge'i mthar phyin cing 'byed pa dang klog pa dang mkhas pa dang spyod pa gsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-3: brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-4: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-8: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-11: skyes pa brtag pa la mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-12: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-13: ljongs kyi dbang phyug mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-14: sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par rgyal bar byas te gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad par gyur pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-15: glang po che'i gnyar bzhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-25: thor tshugs dang gcad pa dang dral ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-29: sgra grag par phog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-32: tshabs che ba de dag la yang zhugs shing byang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-33: blon po'i bu lnga brgya po de dag kyang bzo'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:358b-34: las kyi gnas dag la byang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-0: phas de'i chung ma'i 'khor gsum po rab dang @359a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-1: 'bring dang tha ma dag rnam par bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-2: 'dug pa'i gnas gsum po dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang dbyar gyi dag byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-3: skyed mos tshal gsum po dgun gyi dang dpyid kyi dang dbyar gyi dag byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-4: de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na skyes pa med par sil snyan gyis rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-6: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-7: de'i ne'u ldangs lnga brgya po de dag kyang dus gsum du de blta ba'i phyir 'ong zhing de dag dang lhan cig sten grogs kyi dga' bas rtse mo rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis rtse bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-8: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-9: ri dvags gshor du dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-10: de dag gis de'i nyin mo ri dvags gcig kyang ma rnyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-12: deng bdag cag gis ri dvags gcig kyang ma rnyed pas ji ltar lag pa stong pa dag gis khyim du 'dong bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-13: deng 'di nyid du bsdad de sang ri dvags dag gshor la khyim du 'dong par bya'o snyam nas de dag de'i nub mo der 'khod nas phyi de nyin par ri dvags dag bshor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-14: mtshan mo mig lam chad pa dang rang rang gi khyim du dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-15: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-16: deng ni nam sros kyis sang gzhon nu ltar 'dong ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-17: de dag mtshan mo nam langs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359a-18: nyi ma gsum pa de la gzhon nu gyad bu nor ltar dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-0: shes @359b ldan dag khyed cag kho bo'i ne'u ldangs mnyam du skyes pas sa la lhan cig rtse ba dag yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-1: ci'i phyir khyed cag de bar kho bo'i gan du ma 'ongs par deng nyi ma gsum pa la gdod 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-2: gzhon nu bdag cag ri dvags gshor du mchis par gyur nas de'i slad du ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-3: khyed cag gis der ci zhig byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-4: gzhon nu ri dvags dag bkum mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-5: ri dvags de dag ci za /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-9: shes ldan dag gal te de lta na de dag gis khyed la gnod pa ci zhig byas na khyed cag de dag gsod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-10: gzhon nu bdag cag des glo ba dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-11: shes ldan dag dga' ba de ni mi bzang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-12: gzhan la gnod pas dga' ba gang yin pa de thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-13: gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-14: rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-15: shes ldan dag gzhon nu 'di chung ma'i 'khor spangs te 'gro mi 'dod pas de'i phyir bdag cag la smod par byed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-16: de'i phyir bdag cag gis ci nas kyang dmag dpon la go bar bya ba'i thabs shig gis 'di yang ri dvags gshor du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig byas na des na 'di yang bdag cag dang lhan cig ri dvags gshor du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes de dag gis gros byas nas dmag dpon gyi gan du dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:359b-17: rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-0: dmag dpon gzhon nu gang dag grib mar skyes par gyur @360a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-1: pa de dag ni nges par nyi 'og gi mkhar gyi rgyal po dag gis zil gyi gnon par 'gyur ba lags na ci'i slad du gzhon nu grib mar skye bar mdzad cing bdag dang lhan cig ri dvags gshor du mi gtong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-2: bdag cag dang lhan cig mchis na gdug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-3: rtsal che ba dang nyi 'og gi mkhar gyi rgyal po dag gis zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-4: shes ldan dag gal te de ltar na gzhon nu gtang gis deng zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-5: dmag dpon gyis gzhon nu bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-6: gzhon nu khyod kyi ne'u ldangs dag ri dvags gshor du 'dong gis khyod kyang de dag dang lhan cig song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-7: yab bdag gzhan gyi srog la gnod par mi bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-8: ci'i slad du de dag dang lhan cig mchi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-9: gzhon nu bdag cag rgyal rigs dag ni mtshon gyis 'tsho ba yin pas chos 'di rgyal rigs dag dang mi 'gal gyis song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-10: gzhon nu de pha la gus shing rjes byed pa yin pas des khas blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-11: de phyi de nyin par de dag dang lhan cig ri dvags gshor du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-12: gzhon nu lnga brgya po de dag gis gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-13: shes ldan dag gzhon nu 'di ni dmag dpon 'das nas dmag dpon du 'gyur bas 'di bsten pa'i dus kyis ni 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-14: bdag cag gis da 'di bsten par bya'o zhes de dag gis blo gros gcig gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360a-15: gzhon nu khyod 'di kho nar gzhes shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-0: bdag cag gis @360b ri dvags dag ci nas kyang khyod kyi drung kho nar mchi bar 'gyur ba de ltar gdab par bgyi'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-1: des na khyod kyis ri dvags mchis so 'tshal khum par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-2: de nas de dag gis gzhon nu de 'phan khar bzhag nas ri dvags mang po dag phyogs kun nas bskongs shing brims nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-3: de dag 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas lus smas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-4: rnam par smas bzhin du lce phyung ste gzhon nu'i drung du lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-5: gzhon nus ri dvags de dag gnas skabs de ltar gyur pa thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-6: snying rje med pa'i snying gis 'jig rten pha rol btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-7: 'di dag la sems kyis rab tu sdang bar 'gyur ba yang su zhig yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-8: 'di dag gi srog gcod par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rig nas phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-9: de dang ha cang mi ring ba na mi zhig 'dug pa mthong nas des de'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir mda' gnyis sam gsum zhig 'phangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-10: mda' de dag kyang ri dvags de dag gi rva'i bar dag dang rkang lag gi bar dag tu btang nas de'i 'og tu des brtsal ba btang ste 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-11: ri dvags de dag kyang byer te dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-12: blon po'i bu rnams kyis bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-13: gzhon nu ni gnas lnga dag la byang bar gyur pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-14: des gdon mi za bar ri dvags mang po dag bsad par gyur gyis bdag cag myur du dong ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:360b-15: de dag myur du lhags pa dang ri dvags gcig kyang ma sod par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-2: gzhon nus gdon mi za bar shing rta dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-3: rnga mo dag gis sngar bskyas par gyur pa lta snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-4: gzhon nu ri dvags de dag gar mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-5: shes ldan dag ri dvags dag ga re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-7: de dag ni ri dvags nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-8: phyir bcos par mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-9: de dag spyod pa de lta bu dang shugs de lta bus rgyug pas de'i phyir /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-10: de dag gis kho bo nyid kyang de'u bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-12: shes ldan dag khyed kyis chos la dga' ba 'di 'phan khar bzhag pas ri dvags ga la sod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-13: gal te 'di mngon par 'dod par gyur na ri dvags gcig kyang bros par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-14: de dag mi bzod pa skyes nas mtha' gcig tu dong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-15: shes ldan dag bdag cag gi lus smas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-16: rnam par smas pa dag gis ri dvags dag 'di ga la ba der btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-17: 'dis bsad grang snyam na 'dis yal bar bor gyis 'dong la 'di nyid gsad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-18: de dag gis yang bsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-19: gal te 'di bsad par gyur na thos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas dmag dpon gyis thos na bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-20: 'di bsad par mi bya bar 'di 'di ltar 'di nyid du bskyur te bor la bdag cag 'dong bar bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361a-21: de dag gis de la ma bltas par dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-0: de dag bdag gi ne'u @361b ldangs mnyam du skyes pa sa la lhan cig rtse rtse ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-1: ri dvags tsam gyi phyir de dag gis bdag dgon par bskyur te bor nas dong ba las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-2: gang gi tshe bdag gi pha 'das nas bdag dmag dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe na bdag gis gdon mi za bar sems can gyi gnas la nyes par spyod pa mang po bya dgos pas 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-3: de snying stong zhing zug rngus zug pa bzhin du rtog pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-4: khyim du song ste lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-5: de'i gan du chung ma'i 'khor dag 'ong ba de dag des mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-6: dbang po dag phyir glon par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-7: de dag gis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas dmag dpon la gzhon nu te bor sems khong du chud de mchis brang gi 'khor la yang mi sems par dbang po dag slar glon zhing mchis so zhes go bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-8: dmag dpon gyis thos nas de yang yid mi bde bar gyur nas gzhon nu'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-9: bu gzhon nu khyod ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-10: yab kyis bdag las mi 'dra bar bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-11: gang gi tshe rngon pa drag shul can lag pa dmar ba bsnun pa dang rab tu bsnun pa la zhugs pa gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa gzhan gyi srog gcod du 'jud pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-12: gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar bgyid pa rnams kyi las de la nges par sbyar na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:361b-13: bdag ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi mchis su rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:362a-0: bu gzhon nu gal te khyod bde @362a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-9: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-10: rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar yongs su spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-11: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas sdig byung ga la ba der rgyu zhing song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-12: mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i tshe sdig byung du phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-13: sdig byung na padma'i nags khrod na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-15: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-16: 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang cung zad blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:369b-18: bskum pa dang brkyang ba dang snam sbyar dang chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas sdig byung du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-0: @370a *// de'i tshe gyad bu nor steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na dge ba gang yin tshol bas grong khyer la lta zhing 'dug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-1: gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-5: brkyang pa dang snam sbyar dang chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pas sdig byung na bsod snyoms la rgyu ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-6: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-7: sdig byung 'dir rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig lhags shing gnas pa dag las 'di lta ste; rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-9: rab tu byung ba dag la ni gang dag grong du spyod lam 'chos la dgon par ci dgar spyod pa dag kyang yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-10: bdag gis dgon par 'di'i spyod lam brtag par bya'o snyam du rigs nas mi zhig la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-11: kva'e nang rje tshur shog rab tu byung ba 'di'i phyi bzhin du rjes su song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-12: 'di ji ltar grong du spyod lam zhi ba ltar dgon par yang de bzhin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-13: 'on te ma yin par rtogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-14: mi des gzhon nu bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gyad bu nor las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-15: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin rjes su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370a-16: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul sdig byung du bsod snyoms brgyus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-0: padma'i nags khrod ga la ba der song @370b ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-1: lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas snam sbyar sbrugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-2: rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te chu btsags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-3: lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te lo ma lhags pa dag bor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-5: lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-6: shing ljon pa zhig gis drung du brten nas brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-7: de nas mi de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi spyod lam zhi bas lha dang mi'i sems sdud par byed pas yid bsdus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-8: gyad bu nor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-9: gzhon nu mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-10: khyod kyis rab tu byung ba de spyod lam ji lta bus grong du bsod snyoms rgyu ba gzigs pa de bas brgya stong gis lhag pa'i spyod lam gyis dgon par mchis te gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-11: de nas gyad bu nor tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi spyod lam 'byor pa phun sum tshogs pa de thos pas yid bsdus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-12: gus par bsgrim pa dang bcas pas mi de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-13: kva'e nang rje myur du bzhon pa bde ba stod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:370b-14: kho bo de la zhon te deng rab tu byung ba de ltar 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-0: mi des gzhon nu bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gyad bu nor las mnyan nas myur du bzhon pa bde ba bstad de gyad bu nor ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang gyad bu nor la @371a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-2: gzhon nu gor bu bsgron lags kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-3: da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-4: de nas gyad bu nor bzhon pa bde ba la zhon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-5: sdig byung nas phyir byung nas padma'i nags khrod ga la ba der shing rta bsgyur te bzhon pa'i sa ji srid pa de srid du bzhon pas song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-6: bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa dag nyid kyis padma'i nags khrod du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-7: gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dbang po shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing spyod lam zhi bas 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-8: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te 'di ltar bdag gis rab tu byung ba ting nge 'dzin 'di las bslang ba ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-9: gang gi tshe 'di ting nge 'dzin las langs par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i drung du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du rig nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug ste de ldang ba la sdod cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul phye ma bred nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-11: de nas gyad bu nor tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-12: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-13: yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371a-14: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-0: shes ldan ci khyod ston @371b pa lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-2: bzhin bzang kho bo ni nyan thos ston pa'i lam gyi rjes su zhugs pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-4: nyan thos la khyad par ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-5: bzhin bzang khyad par shin tu che ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-7: dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-10: ba lang gi rjes lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-12: srin bu me khyer lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-14: padma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga lta bu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-15: de la ri'i rgyal po ri rab ci lta ba de ltar ni ston pa blta bar bya la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-16: yungs kar ji lta ba de ltar ni nyan thos blta bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-17: rgya mtsho chen po ji lta ba de ltar ni ston pa blta bar bya la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-18: ba lang gi rjes ji lta ba de ltar ni nyan thos blta bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-19: nyi ma ji lta ba de ltar ni ston pa blta bar bya la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-20: srin bu me khyer ji lta ba de ltar ni nyan thos blta bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-21: nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar ni ston pa blta bar bya la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-22: padma'i rtsa ba'i bu ga ji lta ba de ltar ni nyan thos blta bar bya'o zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-23: tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-24: ri rgyal yungs kar gnyis la khyad par gang yod dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-25: dug can glang rjes chu la khyad par gang yod dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-26: nyi ma me khyer srin la khyad par gang yod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-27: nam mkha' padma'i bu gar khyad par gang yod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-28: sangs rgyas nyan thos byang chub khyad par de yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-29: de nas gyad bu nor 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:371b-30: ji ltar rab tu byung ba 'di'i ston pa la bstod par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-2: sangs rgyas ni dam pa ma yin par mi 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-3: chos bstan pa yang dam pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-4: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-5: 'phags pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-6: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-7: bdag 'phags pa'i drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-8: bzhin bzang khyod pha ma dag gis gnang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-11: bzhin bzang de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos ni pha ma dag gis ma gnang ba'i rigs kyi bu rab tu 'byin par mi mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-12: bsnyen par rdzogs par mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-13: 'phags pa khyod kyis bdag rab tu dbyung ba 'ba' zhig mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-14: ci nas kyang bdag pha ma dag gis gnang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372a-15: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis de la bzhin bzang legs kyis de ltar byos shig ces smras so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:372b-11: de nas gyad bu nor gyi pha ma gnyis kyis gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374a-11: rab tu byung ba ni mkhas pas bsngags pa lags pas gal te rab tu byung nas mngon par dga' bar gyur na yang de gson po nyid du gzigs par 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374a-12: mngon par dga' bar ma gyur na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374a-13: drang srong dag ni slar ldog pa lags pas bu'i gnas pha ma gnyis ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig mchis par 'gyur gyis rab tu byung na legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374a-14: de nas gyad bu nor gyi pha ma gnyis kyis gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374a-15: bu gzhon nu khyod la rab tu 'byung ba legs par byed pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374a-16: khyim na gnas pa legs par byed pa ma yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374a-17: yab yum bdag la rab tu 'byung ba legs pa bgyid pa lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374a-18: khyim na gnas pa legs par bgyid pa ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374a-19: bu gzhon nu da de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-0: de nas gyad bu nor pha ma gnyis gyis gnang nas 'bras khu'i rim gyis @374b lus kyi mthu dang stobs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-2: sdig byung nas phyir byung nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-3: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-4: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas gyad bu nor gyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-6: bdag pha ma gnyis kyis gnang gis bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-7: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-8: bdag 'phags pa'i drung na tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-9: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-11: longs spyod dag ni mi rtag pa yin na rab tu 'byung ba ni legs pa yin gyis de ltar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-14: bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-15: bdag gang dag gi bran dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:374b-19: dga' mgur 'gror med pa yin pa de dag gi mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-0: bstod par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab @375a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-1: tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-2: grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-3: grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa las nyams na yang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-4: rab tu byung ba ni sangs rgyas rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-5: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dam pa yang dag par rtogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-7: skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rnam grang du mas bsngags so zhes yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba kho nar rigs so zhes gsungs kyis rab tu byung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis rigs kyi bu gyad bu nor rab tu phyung ba snyen par rdzogs par byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-9: bu dge slong gi las ni gnyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-14: gyad bu nor gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-15: mkhan po gnyis ka yang bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-16: gdugs la ni klog par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-17: dgung la ni bsam gtan bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375a-18: tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-0: de nas @375b tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis nyin mo klog pa dang kha ton byas pas sde snod gsum po dag lhogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-1: mtshan mo bsam gtan byas pas gong nas gong du yid la byed pa'i khyad par thob nas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-2: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang ltung ba dang rnam par 'thor ba dang rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-3: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha sbu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-4: yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-5: tshe de nyid la rab tu mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do; ;tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-7: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-8: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-9: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-10: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-11: tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-12: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:375b-13: srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-0: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod @376a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-3: mngon du smra bar gyur to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-6: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gson zhing bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-7: 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams la chos nyid kyis nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po gnyis yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-8: gcig ni dbyar zla 'bring po nya la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-9: gnyis pa ni ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba nya la yin pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams la yang nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po gnyis yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-10: gcig ni dbyar zla 'bring po nya la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-11: gnyis pa ni ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba nya la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-12: de la gang dag dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya la dbyar nye bar sgrub pa'i tshe gdams ngag mnos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-13: grong dang grong khyer dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu dbyar gnas par khas len pa de dag ni ston zla 'bring po'i zla ba nya la lhags nas ji ltar thob pa ni rjod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-14: ma thob pa ni thob par byed pa'i phyir 'og tu mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang chos mngon pa de dag gi kha ton dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-15: yongs su 'bri ba dag tshol bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-16: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi lhan cig gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376a-17: nye gnas gang dag ljongs su dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa de dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376b-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gis mkhan po mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byas zin gyis /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376b-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis de dag gis gtam 'dre ba thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376b-10: de la kye ma bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das blta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyes shing rig nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:376b-15: gzugs kyi sku'i sgo nas ma mthong bas de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi sku blta bar 'tshal na mchi bar ci gnang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:377a-7: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te sdig byung du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:388a-7: de dus gzhan zhig na zhes bya ba ni de dus gzhan na'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:388a-12: rtsod pa de yang zhes bya ba ni rtsod pa bzhi po 'gyed pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392a-0: 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig ces smon lam @392a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392a-4: phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392a-5: 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag kyang thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392a-6: des dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang yang dag pa ma yin pas skur bar gyur pa de nyon cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392a-8: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392a-11: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392a-13: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-0: rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur @392b spyod par byed pa de la bu yang med bu mo yang med nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-1: de 'di snyam du bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan na bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas /
