K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-3: lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-4: chung mas de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-5: rje'i sras khyod ci'i slad du lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-7: bzang mo bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan na bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das nas bu med pa'i phyir nor thams cad rgyal pos dbang du byas par 'gyur ro snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-8: ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug tu rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-10: ci 'di la skal ba med pas bu yang med bu mo yang med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-11: 'on te bdag la skal pa med pas bu yang med bu mo yang med pa gang yin pa ni gtol med na 'di ni nges par bdag la skyon 'dogs shing chung ma gzhan len par 'dod pas des ni 'di skad ces bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan na bdag la bu yang med bu mo yang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-12: bdag 'das nas bu med pa'i phyir nor thams cad rgyal pos dbang du byas par 'gyur ro zhes zer zhing bdag gi drung na lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-13: sems khong du chud pa ltar byed cing 'dug gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:392b-14: de'i phyir re zhig bdag nyid thar bar bya'o snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-0: rje'i sras gal te bdag la skal pa ma mchis pas khyod @393a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-2: sras mo yang mi mnga' ba lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-4: de'i 'og tu khyod la sras kyang mnga'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-5: sras mo yang mnga' bar 'gyur ro; ;des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-6: bzang mo khyod kyis skyes pa gang la chung ma gnyis yod pa des lan 'ga' yang skyo ma grang mo mi 'thungs la rtag tu de'i khyim na 'thab mo dang mtshang 'dru ba dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pas nang mi yongs su 'khrug par byed cing rang gi las yongs su bsgrub pa lhur len par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ma thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-8: rje'i sras bzhes shig dang gal te re zhig phu nu mo lta bu zhig lags na ni phu nu mo'i 'du shes kyis bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-9: gal te bu mo lta bu zhig lags na ni bu mo'i 'du shes kyis bskyang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-10: khyim bdag de chung ma des g-yo'i kun tu spyod pa smras pa na bu mo tshol bar rtsom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-11: ji tsam na ri brags shig na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-12: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-14: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-15: rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-16: bu mo gcig btsas nas des de dag bsrings shing bskyed nas khyim bdag de dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-17: de nas bu mo tshol ba'i khyim bdag des de gnyis las bu mo de blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393a-18: dpal dang ldan pa'i yo lang chen pos bag mar blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-0: chos nyid kyis na sar pa thams cad @393b kyis rnying pa zil gyis gnon pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-1: khyim bdag de bag ma sar pa de la shin tu ltos pa dang ldan zhing sems 'brel bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-2: de nas de'i chung ma snga ma de phrag dog gi rang bzhin gyis mngal gyi gnas rnam par dag cing de'i mngal du sems can zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-3: de nas de mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas khyim thab la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-4: rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs kyis dgyes pa skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-7: gal te khye'ur skye bar 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-8: kho bo 'das nas khyim gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-10: rje'i sras gal te khyod kyi bag sar gyi mngal na gnas pa rlugs par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis rlugs par ma bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-11: khye'u 'di khyim gyi bdag por 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-13: bzang mo kho bos dang po nyid nas don de khyod la go bar ma byas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-14: da dung cir yang ma gyur pa nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-16: chung ma de spobs pa med par gyur nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-17: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-18: khyim dang mthun pa'i ming btags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-19: de 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-20: mar gyi snying khu dang gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-21: rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:393b-22: de gang gi tshe tshig smra nus par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-1: zad cig smra ba de thams cad bden par smra zhing brdzun du mi smra bas de'i ming khyim dang mthun par btags pa gang yin pa de nub cing bden smra zhes bya ba'i ming chags par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-2: kha nas kyang autpal sngon po'i dri 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-4: bdag la bu yod kyang sngon skal ba med pa bzhin du khyim thab 'di da dung yang bag sar la ltos pa dang ldan zhing sems 'brel bar byed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-5: de'i phyir thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-6: de phrag dog dang ser snas kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis shugs mi bzod pa na khyim thab kyi gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-7: rje'i sras khyod kyi bag sar 'di la khyod 'di ltar ha cang ltos pa dang ldan zhing sems 'brel bas dgyes par ma mdzad cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-9: bzang mo yang khyod kyis brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-10: des spobs pa med par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-14: skyes pa'am bud med 'dod pa dag bsten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-16: bu khyod kyis bud med rnams la shin tu gnod pa gang yin shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-18: yum 'tshal te; phrag dog dang ser sna'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-19: bu mnyes te khyod ni shes rab kyis rtogs pa dang ldan pas de de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394a-20: kho mo khyod kyi ma yar mo sun 'byin par byed kyis khyod kyis che bzhi phye shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-0: yum ci @394b yang dag pas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-1: yang dag pa ma lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-2: bu yang dag pa ma yin pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-3: yum bdag 'jig rten thams cad la bden smra zhes bgyi bar grags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-4: de'i slad du da ji ltar brdzun du smra bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-5: bu khyod kho mos zla ba dgur lto na bsrel bsrel na re zhig de tsam yang smra bar mi nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-6: de ltar na khyod tshig tu ma smra bar gang gi tshe khyod la phas dris pa de'i tshe na khyod kyis mgo lcogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-7: bus bsams pa; ma'i tshig tshig ma yin par byar mi rung ngo snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-8: yum gal te de lta na ma nongs kyis mgo lcog par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-9: zhes bu de dam 'char bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-10: khyim bdag gi gan du song ste; smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-11: rje'i sras khyod kyi bag sar gyi rtul ba bdag gis mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-13: skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-14: khyim bdag de kun nas dkris pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-15: sdig can ma yang khyod kyis brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-16: rje'i sras khyod bden smra la yang thugs mi ches sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-17: yid ches te de 'jig rten thams cad la bden par smra ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-18: kho bo la ji ltar brdzun du smra bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-19: rje'i sras gal te de lta na de rtse zhing mchis kyis bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-20: khyim bdag des bu de bos nas pang par bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-22: bu khyod kyi ma yar mo 'dis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-23: bud med kyi yul ni ma bslabs par mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:394b-24: des de'i kha lag pas bkab nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-0: bu de khyod kyi ma dang 'dra ba yin gyis tshig tu ma smra @395a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-2: gal te bden pa yin na mgo lcogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-4: las shin tu rngams che zhing yongs su rdzogs pa dag ni lus 'jig pa la mi ltos pas khye'u de'i kha nas tshe 'di nyid la dri nga ba byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-5: kun tu yang bden smra des ma yar mo la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pas de ni bden smra ma yin gyi brdzun du smra ba yin no zhes bya ba'i sgras khyab par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-6: de'i ming bden smra zhes bya ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-7: rdzun smra zhes bya ba'i ming chags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-8: de nas khyim bdag des chung ma de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-9: khyod nyes par spyod pa yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-10: khyod kho bo'i khyim na ma 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-12: zhes smra mod kyi 'on kyang 'jig rten dag tshig ngan smra bas 'jigs nas khyim nas bskrad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-13: de ma rangs bzhin du ming po gnyis kyi khyim du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-14: ming po gnyis kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-17: bdag khyim thab kyis rang gi khyim nas bskrad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-18: ci'i phyir nyes par spyad ce'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-19: gal te de lta na khyod 'dir yang ma 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-21: bdag gis nyes par ma spyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-22: 'di ltar bden smra mas bslus pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-23: yang dag pa ma yin par bskur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395a-24: de ni bden smra ma yin gyi rdzun smra yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-0: gal te khyed gnyis yid mi ches na sdum mtshes kyi skye @395b bo dag khyed gnyis la smra bar 'gyur bas de dag che bzhi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-1: de gnyis 'jig rten dag kha zer bas 'jigs pas song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-2: khyim bdag de'i sdum mtshes kyi skye bo dag la dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-4: 'di ni nyes par spyod pa ma yin gyi 'di ltar bden smra mas slus pa de yang dag pa ma yin pas skur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-5: de ni bden smra ma yin gyi rdzun smra yin no zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-6: de nas de gnyis bden smra la khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa skyes nas nye du'i tshogs snying du sdug pa dag la ji ltar gyur pa go bar byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-7: sring mo de rang gi khyim na bsrel zhing de la yang klan ka btsal ba lhur len cing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-8: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-9: bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-10: ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brags der phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-11: de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-12: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-13: bsod snyoms rgyu zhing khyim rim gyis 'gro ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-14: lha dang mi'i yid sdud par byed pa'i spyod lam zhi bas khyim der zhugs pa de bden smras yang dag pa ma yin pas skur ba'i chung ma des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-16: rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam 'di 'dra ba las na 'di ni brtul zhugs grub pa bdag nyid chen po yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:395b-17: gang dag gis 'di la mchod pa byas shing smon lam 'debs par byed pa de dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-1: pa dang gang 'dod pa de ni de dag las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-2: des de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-4: 'phags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-5: bdag ni bsod nams 'tshal ba lags kyis 'di nyid du gdugs tshod gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-6: bdag nyid chen po de dag ni gzhan gyi don la zhugs pa yin pas des dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-7: de nas des rang sangs rgyas de bsod pa dang bcas pa'i zas kyis tshim par byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-8: smon lam log pa 'di skad ces pa bdag gis yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la mchod pa dag byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar bden smra des bdag sun ma phyung pa gnod pa med pa la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa de ltar bdag gis kyang de gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der des dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyi bar du yang yang dag pa ma yin pas de la skur pa 'debs par gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-9: ming po gnyis kyis de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-10: sring mo khyod kyis smon lam ci zhig btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-12: ming po gnyis 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-14: gal te de lta na kho bo cag gnyis kyang khyod kyi ming po yin pas che bzhi dbye bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396a-15: dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gi bu bden smra gang yin pa de ni gyad bu nor 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-0: de'i tshe de'i dus na de'i ma @396b yar mo gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma mdza' mo 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-1: de'i ming po gnyis gang dag yin pa de gnyis ni dge slong mdza' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-2: sa las skyes gnyis yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-3: des ma yar mo la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lo brgya phrag mang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-4: lo stong phrag mang po dag tu sems can dmyal ba dag tu gdungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-5: las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar de la 'dis yang dag pa ma yin pas skur cing de gnyis kyis kyang che bzhi phye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-6: de nas de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-7: dge slong ma mdza' mos yang dag pa ma yin pas skur cing; mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis kyis che bzhi phye bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-8: gnas mal 'bog pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de ni smon lam gyi dbang gis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-9: gang du smon lam btab ce na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-10: dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-11: bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-12: ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-14: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-15: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-16: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-18: de w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:396b-19: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-1: gis de rab tu byung ba'i dge slong de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gnas mal 'bog pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-2: de nas 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-3: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-4: bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-5: bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-7: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-8: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-10: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397a-11: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-0: ji ltar @397b mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis gnas mal 'bog pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa sh'akya seng ge sh'akya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des gnas mal 'bog pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces gdab par brtsams pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-1: smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gnas mal 'bog pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-2: dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-3: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-4: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-5: dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-7: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-8: dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-9: gzhi med par skur pa 'debs pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste brgyad pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:397b-11: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-0: de dang ha cang mi ring ba na rdzing bu rdo rtsegs can zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i 'gram na tshe @398a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-1: dang ldan pa gyad bu nor nyin mo gnas par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-2: gang gi tshe autpa la'i mdog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-4: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing dgra bcom pa rnam par rgyal bar bya ba las ni rnam par rgyal bar gyur pa de'i tshe na de shes nas dad pa dang ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-5: bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la yang dang yang du blta ba'i phyir 'gro zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-6: lhag par yang tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'di 'di ltar dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan par gyur kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-7: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-8: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-9: dge 'dun gyi chos dang ldan pa'i zhal ta'i las dag la brtson par gyur pa ni dka' ba byed pa yin no snyam nas yang dang yang du de blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-10: de dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-11: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-12: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398a-13: chos nyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-0: de'i tshe na dge slong mdza' bo dang sa las skyes gnyis phyag dar khrod cig rnyed cing de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang tshe rabs tshe rabs su 'khon byung ste rtag tu klan ka tshol @398b ba la brtson pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-2: sa las skyes phyag dar khrod pa rnyed pa 'di gang du 'khrur gzhug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-3: sa las skyes kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-4: rdzing bu rdo rtsigs can ni rgyun lugs nyung zhing nye 'khor gtsang ba yin pas der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-5: de gnyis phyag dar khrod khyer te rdzing bu rdo rtsigs can du dong nas de gnyis kyis phyag dar khrod der 'khrur bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-6: nyi ma la bting ste 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-7: de'i tshe na ri dvags kyi khyu dag rdzing bu rdo rtsigs can du lhags nas chu 'thungs te 'dong bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-8: ri dvags dag gi chos nyid ni gcig gi rgyab tu gcig gi rgal bar byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-9: ji tsam na ri dvags shig gis ri dvags mo zhig gi rgyab tu rgal te mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-10: de mdza' bos mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-11: sa las skyes gyad bu nor 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-12: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog la mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten gyi 'dong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-13: dge slong rnams la brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-14: sa las skyes kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-15: tshe dang ldan pa mdza' bo de'i tshe yang re zhig bdag cag gnyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-16: ci da yang gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed du 'jud par 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-18: tshe dang ldan pa sa las skyes de'i tshe na ni yang dag par ma yin pas yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-19: da ni bag tsam las bsam pa yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:398b-21: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pa ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-1: la brdzun du smra ba ga la yod kyis tshur sheg 'dong la dge slong rnams la brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-2: sa las skyes de mdza' bos bslus pa na btub par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-3: de gnyis gtsug lag khang du dong ste dge slong rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-4: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar bdag cag gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bstan pa mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-5: 'di la bdag cag gnyis gang gi dad pa'am yid ches pas 'gro bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-6: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-7: tshe dang ldan pa gnyis ci khyed gnyis lha dang mi rnams gcig tu yongs su btang zhing sems can dmyal ba dang yi dvags dang dud 'gro rnams su gcig tu gnas sam ci na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-8: dge slong dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam par ston pa de la khyed gnyis gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur ba 'debs par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-10: tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni bdag cag gnyis kyis mnyes kyi 'di ltar bdag cag gnyis kyi mig dag gis mthong bas mig dbyung bar bya grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ltar de gnyis la ci zhig mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-14: khyed gnyis don ci zhig la der son pas der mthong zhes legs par rab tu gleng bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399a-15: brtag par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399b-0: dge slong @399b rnams kyis de gnyis la ci zhig mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399b-3: khyed gnyis ci'i phyir der son pas der mthong zhes legs par rab tu glengs shing brtags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399b-4: dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis legs par rab tu glengs shing brtags pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399b-6: tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog la mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos ma brten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399b-7: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis bdag cag gnyis gang dag zos na rjud par 'gyur ba shin tu yid du mi 'ong ba'i zas ngan pa dag gis lan gsum gyi bar du mtho btsams pas bdag cag gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pa pham par 'gyur pa'i chos kyis skur ba btab par zad kyi tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog la mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos ma bsten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399b-8: 'di ltar dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399b-9: dge slong don nyung ngu dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pa pham par 'gyur pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399b-11: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dag dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:399b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin @400a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-1: no; ;nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-2: yang dge slong gang khros shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-3: ci nas kyang 'di tshangs par spyod pa dang dbral lo snyam nas dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pa pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa las de dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung ma dris kyang rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-4: rtsod pa de yang gzhan gyi cha ma yin la rtsod pa de gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pas bag tsam las bsams pa tsam gyi chos 'ga' zhig blangs par gyur la; dge slong yang zhe sdang la gnas pas zhe sdang gis smras so zhe na dge 'dun lhag ma'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-5: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-6: mdza' bo dang sa las skyes sam gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-7: khros shing zhes bya ba ni 'khrugs shing ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-8: zhe sdang bar gyur nas zhes bya ba ni yid mi dga' bar gyur nas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-10: ci nas kyang 'di tshangs par spyod pa dang dbral lo snyam nas zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-11: ci nas kyang 'di dge sbyong gi tshul dang dbral lo snyam nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-12: dge slong dag pa zhes bya ba ni gyad bu nor ram gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-13: ltung ba med pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhi de'i ltung ba med pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-14: gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pa zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400a-15: gzhan zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-0: de'i cha dang mthun @400b pa ma yin pa ni pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi po dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-1: pham par 'gyur ba'i zhes bya ba ni bzhi po gang yang rung ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-2: chos kyis zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgrar gsungs pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-3: skur pa las zhes bya ba ni skur ba btab pa las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-4: de dus gzhan zhig na zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-5: dris kyang rung zhes bya ba ni gzhan dag gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-6: ma dris kyang rung zhes bya ba ni rang nyid 'gyod pa dang; cung zad 'gyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-8: rab tu 'gyod par gyur nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-9: rtsod pa de yang zhes bya ba rtsod pa bzhi po 'gyed pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-10: mi gdams pa'i phyir rtsod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-11: ltung ba'i phyir rtsod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-13: gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pa yin la zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-14: mya ngan las 'das pa'i cha ma yin pa dang mthun par pham par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba yin la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-15: rtsod pa de gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pas bag tsam las bsam pa tsam gyis chos 'ga' zhig blangs par gyur la zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-16: bag tsam las bsam pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni ri dvags dang ri dvags mo'i 'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-17: chos zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa de chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-18: blangs par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni bzung bar gyur la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-19: dge slong yang zhe sdang la gnas pas zhes bya ba ni skur ba 'debs par 'dod pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-20: zhe sdang gis smras so zhe na zhes bya ba ni skur pa btab par gyur to zhes zer na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:400b-21: dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:401a-2: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:401a-3: dge slong gis dge slong pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin par mthong zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:401a-4: de de la ltung ba med pa'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:401a-5: 'dod pa dang blo gros dang rtog pa dang lta ba bsgyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:401a-6: 'di skad ces bdag gis dge slong pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong ngo zhes zer na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:401a-7: dge slong gis dge slong pham par 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'byin pa mthong zhing de de la dge 'dun lhag ma'i lta ba thob par gyur nas des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:401a-8: 'dod pa dang blo gros dang rtog pa dang lta ba bsgyur te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:401a-11: des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang 'dod pa dang blo gros dang rtog pa dang lta ba sgyur te //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:402b-0: des 'du shes bsgyur cing bzod pa dang 'dod pa dang blo @402b gros dang rtog pa dang lta ba bsgyur te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404a-7: dril bsgrags pa la ni ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404a-8: ngos la ri mor bris pa phan chad kyang ltung ba med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404a-9: ji ltar bdag gis shes pa de bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang shes so snyam na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404a-11: myos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404a-12: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404a-13: gzhan gyi cha ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404a-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so; ;de'i tshe na mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo pas bsod snyoms rnyed par dka' ba byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404a-16: de na dge slong gang dag rdzu 'phrul thob pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-0: gang gi ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar @404b shes pa'i shing 'dzam bu de las 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu lhags pa kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-1: de'i nye 'khor na skyu ru ra'i tshal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-4: de dag gi 'bras bu lhags pa kha dog dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-5: khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-6: lhag ma yod na dge slong rnams la yang bgo bsha' byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-8: nub kyi ba lang spyod du yang song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-9: byang gi sgra mi snyan du yang song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-10: ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras s'a lu'i 'bru dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-11: lhag ma yod na dge slong rnams la bgo bsha' byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-12: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-13: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du yang song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-14: lha'i bdud rtsi dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-15: lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-16: yul gang dag 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-17: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba de dag tu yang song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:404b-18: bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang ba bsod pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par byed /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:405b-3: bdag gis kyang gang gi ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar shes pa'i shing 'dzam bu'i 'bras bu lhags pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:405b-9: lhag ma yod na dge slong rnams la yang bgo bsha' bya /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:405b-18: lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:405b-19: yul gang dag 'byor pa rgyas pa lo legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba de dag tu yang song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-1: bza' ba gtsang ba bsod pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste khyer nas bdag nyid kyang yongs su longs spyod par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-2: lhag ma yod na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-3: de'i phyir bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par nus pa su yod snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-4: de nas lhas byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-8: bcom ldan 'das la lhas byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung bar thugs su chud nas lhas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-11: go'u ta ma'i bu khyod kyis lhag pa'i tshul khrims la mngon par brtson par gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-12: khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-13: go'u ta ma'i bu khyod kyis lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab la mngon par brtson par gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-14: khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-15: de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam mi ston to snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya @406b ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-1: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-2: gnas brtan gyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-3: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la yang rnam par bltas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-4: lhas byin la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung bar yang rig nas lhas byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-5: lhas byin khyod kyis gzugs tshul bzhin yid la gyis shig dang khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-6: lhas byin khyod kyis tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-7: rnam par shes pa tshul bzhin yid la gyis shig dang khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-8: de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-9: gnas brtan kun shes ko'u di n+ya yang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par mi byed do snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-17: lag bzang la sogs pa gnas brtan lnga brgya po dag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-18: gnas brtan lnga brgya po dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-19: gnas brtan dag gis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:406b-20: de nas gnas brtan lnga brgya po bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi thugs yid la rnam par bltas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-0: lhas byin la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung bar yang rig @407a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-1: nas lhas byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-2: lhas byin khyod kyis gzugs tshul bzhin yid la gyis shig dang khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-3: lhas byin khyod kyis tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa tshul bzhin yid la gyis shig dang khyod la rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-4: de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-5: gnas brtan lnga brgya po dag kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam mi ston te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-6: 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag gis sngar bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par bgros par gyur pas des na 'ga' yang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-7: bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par nus pa gzhan su yod snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-8: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa rgyal po'i khab na sde can ma'i phug na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-9: de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-10: gnas brtan 'od srung stobs bcu pa 'di ni yun ring po nas g-yo med pa sgyu med pa drang po drang po'i rang bzhin can bdag gi phu nu bo rgan pa kun dga' bo'i mkhan po yin pas gnas brtan 'od srung stobs bcu pas bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam ston par nus so snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407a-12: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407b-0: mtha' gcig @407b tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa la lhas byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407b-1: gnas brtan gyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407b-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407b-3: bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi thugs yid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407b-4: lhas byin la sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de byung ba la rnam par ma bltas par lhas byin la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407b-5: de nas lhas byin gyis nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas spyod cing bsam gtan dang po la brten nas 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:407b-7: mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:411b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyang tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas thugs las chung ngur gnas par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems bskyed ma thag tu de rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:411b-9: yongs su nyams kyang bdag yongs su nyams so snyam du mi shes par gyur gyis btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der bzhud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:411b-10: byon nas don de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol na legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:411b-11: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:411b-12: de nas tshangs pa nog can gyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:411b-13: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:411b-14: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:411b-15: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can song nas ring po ma lon par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-1: ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na 'di lta ste dper na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-2: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag ngar bskums pa las brkyang pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-3: brkyangs pa las bskum par byed pa de bzhin du; tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ngan spong gi bu dag nas mi snang bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-4: rgyal po'i khab tu 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas su gnas par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-7: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos de la tshangs pa nog can dang lhan cig par du gtam brjod pa ci byung bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-8: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-10: mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyis ches sngar lhas byin gyi sems la sems kyis khyab par byas te rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-11: de'i 'og tu tshangs pa nog can gyis ma brjod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412a-13: bdag gis ches sngar lhas byin gyi sems la sems kyis khyab par bgyis te rig nas de'i 'og tu tshangs pa nog can gyi brjod lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-0: bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po @412b dang thabs cig bar du bka' mchid 'di gsung ba'i skabs su lhas byin grogs dge slong bzhi po ko ka li dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-2: ka ta mo ra ka ti shya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-3: rgya mtshos byin dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas byin thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-5: gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-6: mo'u 'gal gyi bu lhas byin de 'ong zhing da mi gti mug can de nga'i mdun du bdag nyid kyi bdag nyid lung ston par byed kyis da tshig srungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-8: ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na 'di lta ste dper na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-9: skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag ngar bskums pa las brkyang ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-10: brkyangs pa las bskum par byed pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas nas mi snang bar gyur cing ngan spong gi bu dag na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal ri dvags kyi nags su gnas par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-11: de nas lhas byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:412b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-0: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la lhas byin gyis 'di skad ces @413a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-2: da ltar bcom ldan 'das bgres po bgres pa dgog tu gyur pas 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-5: dge bsnyen ma la 'doms pas bsnyel bar gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la btang na legs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-7: bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su drang bar bgyi zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyang tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas thugs las chung ngur gnas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-9: mi gti mug can sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-10: mo'u 'gal gyi bu tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-11: des pa des pa dag la yang re zhig dge slong gi dge 'dun gtong bar mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-12: ro dang 'dra ba mchil ma za ba khyod la gtong re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-13: de nas lhas byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-15: mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis kyi bsngags pa brjod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-16: bdag la ro dang 'dra ba mchil ma za ba zhes brjod pas kun tu spyad do snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-17: de na lhas byin gyis de'i dang por bcom ldan 'das la kun nas mnar sems dang mi bzod pa dang yid mi ches pa byas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-18: de nas lhas byin gyis sdod cig ces brjod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-005-002:413a-19: mgo lan gsum lcogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo ////
